EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Improved Dilettante I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Dilettante feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Artificer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your knowledge of magical items has improved, and now extends to potions. For item purposes you are now treated as a second level Artificer (or your character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Barbarian
EnhancementSelection.Description: You become more resilient and gain +10 Hit Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Bard
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Bard (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Cleric
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Cleric (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Druid

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Fighter
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your skill with arms is improved and you gain +1 to hit and +1 weapon damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Monk
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your defensive skills have improved, and at level 2 or higher you are able to add up to 3 points of your Wisdom bonus to your armor class.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Paladin
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Lesser Divine Grace has improved and at level 2 or higher you may add up to 3 points of your charisma bonus to your saves. For item use purposes you are now treated as a second level Paladin (or your total character level, whichever is lower)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Ranger
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Lesser Bow Strength has improved and at level 2 or higher are able to add up to 4 points of your strength bonus to attacks with bows. For item use purposes you are now treated as a second level Ranger (or your total character level, whichever is lower)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Rogue
EnhancementSelection.Description: You practice stealthy attacks and gain +2 to hit with Sneak Attacks

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Sorcerer
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Sorcerer (or your total character level, whichever is lower.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Warlock
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Warlock (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Dilettante: Wizard
EnhancementSelection.Description: For item use purposes you are now treated as a third level Wizard (or your total character level, whichever is lower). +30 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain abilities from your Dilettante Class Enhancements

EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Armor Class and +2 Maximum Dexterity Bonus when wearing Armor. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Armor Mastery enhancement from the Stalwart Defender tree

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjure Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to create a stack of returning +1 arrows. These arrows are destroyed when you log out. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Conjure Arrows enhancement from the Arcane Archer tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Damage Reduction I
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Dilettante: Barbarian DR damage reduction is increased by 1/-. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Resistance enhancement from Occult Slayer tree.

EnhancementSelection.Description: +10% Positive Energy Healing. This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Bastion of Purity enhancement from the Shintao Monk tree.

EnhancementSelection.Description: You are immune to Natural diseases, and gain +4 to saving throws against Magical disease and do not automatically fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sly Flourish
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: Deals +1[W] damage with +1 critical threat range, and reduces your threat with nearby enemies by 100. On Sneak Attack: Intelligent target also gains a -1 penalty to Balance, Reflex, and Will saves for 20 seconds. (Stack 5 times.) This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Sly Flourish enhancement from the Thief-Acrobat tree. (Cooldown: 12 seconds)

You cannot spend action points in both the Ranger: Arcane Archer and Elf: Arcane Archer trees.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Elf: Power of the Storm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark activate: Your attacks gain Shocking, +25 Electrical Spell Power, and you gain 10 temporary spell points any time you take electrical damage from a spell. You also gain +2 bonus to Reflex save, but suffer a -2 penalty to Caster Levels of Earth spells and -2 to your Fortitude Saves. This effect lasts for 2 seconds per point of Concentration skill you have. (Cooldown: 1 minute)

This enhancement cannot be taken if you possess the Tanglefoot enhancement from the Mechanic tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to hit and damage when using two handed melee weapons and +1 to hit and damage when using one handed melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Action Boost: Orcish Rage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: You become enraged, and gain gain +40 Melee Power and a +2 Primal Bonus to Strength. Using this ability prevents spellcasting and uncenters you. This Action Boost shares a cooldown with other Action Boosts. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Greater Dragonmark of Finding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Greater Dragonmark Spell: Treasure Finding. Activate this ability to harness the bloodline of House Tharashk to cast Treasure Finding once per rest. Also allows you to use your Least and Lesser Marks of Finding an extra time per rest. Treasure Finding lets you target an unopened chest and twist fate for a chance at better rewards for the entire party. Chests can only be improved in this way once time, and there is a chance of failure based on your Charisma. (Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Great Weapon Aptitude
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Glancing blows produced by your two-handed weapon attacks have a [2/4/6]% increased chance of producing magical weapon effects such as flaming.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Improved Power Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Power Attack feat does 1/2/3 additional point(s) of bonus damage but also has an additional -1/-2/-3 to your attack bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Orcish Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to hit and damage when using two handed melee weapons and +1 to hit and damage when using one handed melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Raging Crush
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: +4[W] This attack is guaranteed to be a Critical Hit. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Brutality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your melee attacks deal an additional 20% damage to helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Weapon Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to hit and damage when using two handed melee weapons and +1 to hit and damage when using one handed melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Half-Orc: Power Rage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When raging, you gain an additional +1/2/3 Strength, but also get an additional -1/2/3 penalty to AC.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Accuracy I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks. Your Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range is increased by 2 meters for each Elven Core Ability you possess from this tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Intelligence I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Accuracy II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Intelligence II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Accuracy III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Rejuvenation of Dawn
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Heals 10,000 hit point damage, and removes all ability damage, death penalty effects, negative levels, and the conditions blinded, dazed, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, feebleminded, insanity, nauseated, poisoned, and stunned. This ability can be used once per rest. Tier 2: This ability can be used on yourself or an ally, and you get an additional use per rest. (Cooldown: 3 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Bane of the Restless
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Turn Undead ability now also deals 6d6/12d6/18d6 light damage to nearby undead (no save). You also count as 2/4/6 levels higher when turning undead. This increases the maximum level of creature you can turn and also increases the total number of hit dice you can turn. In addition, you add an additional 2/4/6 to the number of hit dice you can turn.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Keen Senses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Listen, Search, and Spot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Weapon Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Morningstars, Maces, and one-handed Hammers. +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Mauls.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Arcane Fluidity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your arcane spell failure chance while wearing armor is decreased by 5%/10%/15%. (This has no effect on arcane spell failure from shields.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Blessing of Amaunator
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Amaunator blesses those in the area of effect with the following for 1 minute per caster level (3 uses per rest): Tier 1: Aid Tier 2: Aid and Spell Resistance Tier 3: Aid, Spell Resistance, and Death Ward

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Enchantment Lore
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2/+4/+6 saves vs. Enchantments. Rank 3: You also gain +1 Enchantment spell DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Nothing Is Hidden
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your senses are so acute that you no longer need to spend time searching for the obvious. You will automatically perform a Search check to locate traps and secret doors when you are in range to Spot them, although this Search check occurs at a -12/-8/-4 penalty.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Weapon Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Morningstars, Maces, and one-handed Hammers. +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Mauls.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25/+50/+100 spell points and +1/+2/+3 spell penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Light of the Sun God
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +10/+20/+30 Light spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Fey Energy Tap
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: A drop of blood lets you tap into the endless energy of the realm of the fey, giving yourself or an ally temporary spell points, 10% incorporeality, and a -2 penalty to Will saving throws while they last. This ability can be used one/three/five times per rest. (Activation Cost: 1 HP. Cooldown: 2 minutes) (24 Spell points +6 per level)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Fey Sight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you have 100 or more spell points, you can see things as they truly are. You are able to see invisible creatures and pierce illusions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Morningstars, Maces, and one-handed Hammers. +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Mauls.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Arcane Archer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain access to the Arcane Archer enhancement tree. (The Elf: Arcane Archer tree uses your total character level instead of Ranger level, but advances Core Abilities at a slower rate. You cannot spend action points in both the Ranger: Arcane Archer and Elf: Arcane Archer trees.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Amaunator's Brilliance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Sunburst (Cooldown: 60/45/30 seconds, Cost: 25 SP)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Aura of Radiance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The light of Amaunator shines perpetually upon you, protecting you and damaging those who would do you harm. You gain a light shield effect that deals 2d6/2d8/2d10 light damage to enemies each time they attack you in melee. This applies to enemy misses as well as hits. You also gain a +3/+6/+9 sacred bonus to Armor Class against attacks from shadows and other undead creatures.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Grace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You may use your Dexterity modifier to determine the damage you deal with Morningstars, Maces, and Hammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Weapon Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with Morningstars, Maces, and one-handed Hammers. +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Mauls.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Morninglord: Skill
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3% Doublestrike, +3% Doubleshot, +3% dodge, and bypass 3% dodge.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spell Power Boost

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Purple Dragon Knight: Cormyrean Knight Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You now use Charisma or Strength, whichever is higher, for attack and damage with shortswords, longswords, bastard swords, and Great Swords. In addition, as long as your Charisma remains higher than your Strength and you are wielding one of the above weapons, you receive a bonus to the DCs of your Tactical Feats equal to 1/3 your Charisma modifier.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Once per rest, you can heal to full. If you are below 50% health when this ability is used, you and all nearby allies gain a Morale bonus to weapon damage equal to your Charisma modifier for two minutes.

Stance.Name: Divine Purpose
Stance.Description: Scourge: You gain the furious aura of the Scourge of the Undead. For one minute, your weapon attacks deal 3d6 extra Light damage that scales with the higher of your Melee or Ranged Power. On Vorpal, enemies are Blinded.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Divine Resolve
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Scourge: +1/2/3 Constitution while your Divine Purpose is active.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Greater Scourge Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While dual-wielding Clubs, Light Maces, Heavy Maces, and Morningstars, you gain 5% chance to make off-hand attacks and 5% chance to doublestrike with your off-hand. Passive: +2 Melee and Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Strike Down the Dead
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3[W], single-target attack.. 15 second cooldown. On hit: Deals 1d4+4 per Character Level (scales with 100% Melee Power) in Positive Damage to Undead creatures.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 Purpose Charges

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Destroyer of the Dead
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Clubs, Light Maces, Heavy Maces, and Morningstars you wield gain a +1 Sacred Bonus to Critical Multiplier. Passive: Grants +4 Melee and Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Divine Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: 30sp, toggles off on rest. Must have your Bond Feat active to use. Mutually exclusive with Form feats (PM, Druid, etc). Stage 1: When this stance is enabled, you gain +1 to Hit and Damage, 1% Doubleshot, and 1% Doublestrike. Stage 2: After 20 seconds of this stance being active, these bonuses double. Stage 3: After 40 seconds of this stance being active, you also gain a 10% Action Boost Bonus to Attack Speed, 10% Action Boost bonus to Melee Power, and 5% Action Boost bonus to Ranged Power, but you take your Character Level in Light damage every second until the stance is toggled off. Stage 4: After 60 seconds of this stance being active, all of your bonuses from this stance double once more, but you take one stack of Vulnerability every second. Stage 5: After 70 seconds of this stance being active, your movement speed will drop dramatically. Stage 6: After 75 seconds of this stance being active, you can no longer contain the radiance within, and it will consume you.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Aasimar Scourge: Improved Recovery III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Grit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to your Fortitude saves. In addition, when you are uncounscious and have stabilized, you get up ten seconds faster than normal.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Shadow Phase
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You become invisible and are able to move through monsters as if you were ethereal for six seconds. (Cooldown: 1 minute)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Shadow Jaunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You become invisible and charge forward. During the jaunt, you are able to move through monsters as if you were ethereal. These effects last for six seconds. (Cooldown: 1 minute)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Empowered Jaunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The cooldown of your Shadow Jaunt and Shadow Phase abilities is reduced to 30 seconds. In addition, when you use either ability, nearby allies become partially incorporeal for six seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Spiked Chain Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Perform an AOE melee attack for 1d6+4 damage plus 1d6 additional damage per level to all nearby enemies. Targets can attempt a reflex save for half damage. The DC is based on your level and Dexterity modifier.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Keen Senses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Listen, Search, and Spot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Bold
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You overcome fear quickly - fear and shaken effects are removed from you after 12/6/3 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Student of Pain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you take damage, you have a 5%/10%/15% chance to gain a +10 bonus to AC for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Hide and Move Silently. Tier 3: Throw attacks you perform while sneaking deal +1[W] damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Vicious Chain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Spiked Chain Attack now has a chance to cause enemies to bleed. Some enemies are immune to bleeding.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Improved Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1%/+2%/+3% Dodge when wearing light or no armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Ghostly Essence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you are below 50% hit points and get hit by an attack, you gain 25% incorporeality for 6/12/18 seconds. This can occur once every two minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Guile I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak Attack die.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Shadow Smoke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Use an Action Boost charge. All nearby allies gain +5/+10/+15 to Hide and Move Silently for twenty seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Slashing Chain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Spiked Chain Attack now does an aditional 1d10+10 slashing damage to all nearby enemies it hits.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Forceful Chain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Spiked Chain Attack now has a chance to knock enemies down.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Improved Ghostly Essence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When your Ghostly Essence triggers, all nearby allies becomes partially incorporeal for 6/12/18 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Guile II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak Attack die.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Whirling Chain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Perform a 20 seconds long chain attack that deals constant damage to foes in the area around you and increases your defense against incoming attacks with 10 Physical Resistance while active. Every 4 to 5 seconds that you continue to whirl your chain, you deal an extra burst of damage to those in the area. The amount of this extra damage increases over time up to 10d10 + 60 damage. If you move while using Whirling Chain, the attack will be interrupted. (Cooldown: 3 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Nothing is Hidden
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your senses are so acute that you no longer need to spend time searching for the obvious. You will automatically perform a Search check to locate traps and secret doors when you are in range to Spot them, although this Search check occurs at a -12/-8/-4 penalty.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Winter Favored
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Your sneak attacks deal 1d6 extra Cold damage, and you gain 5 Cold resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadar-Kai: Gloom Stalker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While sneaking, your melee weapons gain the ability to envelop their targets in darkness, making them briefly vulnerable to sneak attacks. Your weapons also have a chance to blind their targets for a short time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Bloodhunt I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4 Fire damage to enemies under 75% HP. This damage scales with 100% Spell Power.
Passive: +5 Fire Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Charisma I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Bloodhunt II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d6 Fire damage to enemies under 50% HP. This damage scales with 100% Spell Power.
Passive: +10 Fire Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Charisma II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Bloodhunt III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d8 Fire damage to enemies under 25% HP. This damage scales with 100% Spell Power.
Passive: +20 Fire Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Hellish Rebuke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enveloped in a cloak of infernal flame, you have a chance to deal fire damage to foes that strike you in melee range. Enemies have a chance to take 1d10 Fire Damage +1 per Caster Level. This damage scales with Fire Spell Power. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Infernal Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 Bluff, Diplomacy and Balance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Innate Protection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 to Saves vs Spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25/50/75% damage and healing of your wands, scrolls and other items that cast spells. Adds +1/2/3 to the save DCs of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Obscuring Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can channel your fiendish nature to manifest a zone of Obscuring Darkness at will. Activation cost: 10 Spell Points Cooldown: 30 Seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Ferocious Rebuke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Hellish Rebuke is active, enemies that strike you have a chance to be tripped with no save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Infernal Resistance I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tieflings are naturally immune to certain elements.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Acid)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Acid Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Cold)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Cold Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2/4/6 Magical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Traditionalist Caster
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3/6/10 Universal Spell Power while wielding an Orb or Staff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Lasting Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies that enter your Obscuring Darkness have a chance to be blinded with no save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Scorch
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can cast the spell Scorch as a Spell Like Ability, with its Caster Level based on your Character Level. Subsequent ranks in this ability reduce the cooldown and Spell Point cost. Activation cost: 8/6/4 Spell Points Cooldown: 20/15/10 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Infernal Resistance II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tieflings are naturally immune to certain elements.

EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Acid Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Resistance (Cold)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Cold Resistance equal to your Character Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Inceneration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Spell Critical Chance with all spells, plus an additional 2% with Fire Spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Student of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Obscuring Darkness, you gain +3 Saving Throws, +3 Magical Resistance Rating and +15 Magical Resistance Cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Improved Scorch
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies affected by you Scorch spell increase Fire damage that take by 5%. When cast on a creature that is immune to Fire, it makes them vulnerable to that element for a short period of time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Infernal Sovereign
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Fire mastery conquers other elements.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Sovereign (Acid)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You use your Fire Spell Power in place of your Acid Spell Power if it is higher.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Sovereign (Cold)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You use your Fire Spell Power in place of your Cold Spell Power if it is higher.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Infernal Sovereign (Electric)
EnhancementSelection.Description: You use your Fire Spell Power in place of your Electric Spell Power if it is higher.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Incineration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Spell Critical Chance with all spells, plus an additional 2% with Fire Spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling: Servant of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Obscuring Darkness, you gain +10/20/30 Universal Spell Power and +1/2/3 Evocation and Conjuration DCs

Your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4 Sonic damage to enemies under 75% HP. This damage scales with 100% Spell Power.
Passive: +5 Fire and Sonic Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 to Heal, Listen and Spot

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 Balance, Bluff and Spellcraft

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Disarming Coda
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The target of your Fiendish Arpeggio has -4 Armor Class and -25% Fortification for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Greater Dashing Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Hit and Damage with your Dashing Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Infernal Songs
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: All Sonic damage in this Enhancement Tree (and from your Fiendish Arpeggio) is instead Fire damage, scaling with Fire Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Dance in the Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Obscuring Darkness, you gain +3 Saving Throws, +3 Magical Resistance Rating, and +15 Magical Resistance Cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Grand Chord Works
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Enchant your Fiddle to cast this spell. If the target is not under the effect of Fiendish Arpeggio, they must save or be put to sleep for 12 seconds (Will Save vz 1d20 + Perform Skill).
If the target is under the effect of Fiendish Arpeggio (and made of flesh), they must save or be turned to stone (Will Save vs 1d20 + Perform Skill) as if they were subject to a Flesh to Stone spell. The Flesh to Stone lasts for 60 seconds plus 10 seconds per character level, but the target has a chance to save again every 24 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Charm Hearts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies that attack you have a 10% chance to be subjegated to a Fascinate effect (Will Save vs 1d20 + Perform Skill negates).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Dark Weapons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Hit and Damage, as well as +1 Sneak Attack Die, with your Dashing Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Magic of Melodies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Enchantment DC, +1 Caster Level and +1 Max Caster Level with Sonic Spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel: Sonata of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Obscuring Darkness, you gain Displacement, +5% Dodge, +5 Dodge Cap, and +5 Max Dex Bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Improved Fortification I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your base fortification is increased to 50%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Constitution I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Improved Fortification II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your base fortification is increased to 75%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Constitution II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Improved Fortification III

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Great Weapon Aptitude
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Glancing blows produced by your two-handed weapon attacks have a [2/4/6]% increased chance of producing magical effects such as flaming.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Warforged: Damage Reduction

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves Mithral or Adamantine Body feats.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mithral Fluidity

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to cause your melee attacks to generate [25/50/75]% more hate, making enemies more likely to attack you. (Cooldown: 2 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Accuracy I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2% to hit with all attacks. Your Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range is increased by 2 meters for each Elven Core Ability you possess from this tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Adept of Trees
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Tumble and Hide skills +[1/2/3] to Saves versus Poison and Disease

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Child of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are able to produce an Entangle effect using a drop of your blood (1 HP) and 10 spell points. Primal magic awakens plants and vines to grasp at the caster's enemies. Entangled creatures suffer a 90% penalty to movement speed, a 50% attack speed penalty and a -1 penalty to attack rolls, AC and Reflex. A successful Reflex save (DC: 10 + Half Character Level + Wisdom Modifier) negates the effect. Entangled creatures may leave the affected area to escape it's effects, or attempt to make a Strength check every 2 seconds to negate. Area of effect fire spells will destory these vines and free any entangled creatures. Incorporeal creatures and oozes are naturally immune. Fire elementals and other fire creatures are immune because they burn through the plants.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Keen Senses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Listen, Search, and Spot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Weapon Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, Shortbows, and Longbows, as well as +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Arcane Fluidity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your arcane spell failure chance while wearing armor is decreased by 5%/10%/15%. (This has no effect on arcane spell failure from shields.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Wild Step
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +5 to Tumble. When you tumble, you gain a +10% Action Boost bonus to movement speed and a 10% Action Boost bonus to Missile Deflection for 10 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Enchantment Lore
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2/+4/+6 saves vs. Enchantments. Rank 3: You also gain +1 Enchantment spell DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Nothing is Hidden
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your senses are so acute that you no longer need to spend time searching for the obvious. You will automatically perform a Search check to locate traps and secret doors when you are in range to Spot them, although this Search check occurs at a -12/-8/-4 penalty.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Weapon Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, Shortbows, and Longbows, as well as +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25/+50/+100 spell points and +1/+2/+3 spell penetration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Forest Origins
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an option:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Faith of the Forest
EnhancementSelection.Description: You now count Rapiers, Falchions, and Shortbows as Favored Weapons, regardless of your Deity, for the purpose of everything in the Warpriest tree, the War Soul tree, Favored Soul Grace/Knowledge of Battle feats. (Your basic Deity Feats do not add hit+damage with these weapons).

EnhancementSelection.Name: Oath of the Wild
EnhancementSelection.Description: You take an oath to forgo metal armor, metal shields, and Rune Arms. As long as you do not have these equipped, you gain +10 PRR.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Rugged Upbringing
EnhancementSelection.Description: While raging, you gain +5% Doublestrike with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars and Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Fey Energy Tap
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: A drop of blood lets you tap into the endless energy of the realm of the fey, giving yourself or an ally temporary spell points, 10% incorporeality, and a -2 penalty to Will saving throws while they last. This ability can be used 1/3/5 times per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Fey Sight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you have 100 or more spell points, you can see things as they truly are. You are able to see invisible creatures and pierce illusions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, Shortbows, and Longbows, as well as +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Arcane Archer

EnhancementSelection.Name: Drive Them Back
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10% Chance of Shield Bash with non-metal shields.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ferocity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +3 to Damage while using Two Handed Weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Like a Leaf
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 to Attack and Damage while Single Weapon Fighting.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Through the Branches
EnhancementSelection.Description: +3% Doubleshot with Longbows and Shortbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Vigor
EnhancementSelection.Description: Vigor SLA: A positive energy conjuration that heals 1d6, +1 per 3 caster levels (max +3 at caster level 9), every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. When the initial effect expires, a smaller healing effect that heals 1 HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds is applied.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wild Swings
EnhancementSelection.Description: +5% Offhand Strike Chance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Forest's Finesse
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You may use Dexterity to determine the damage you deal with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, Falchions, Shortbows and Longbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Weapon Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 to hit and damage with Longswords, Rapiers, Scimitars, Shortbows, and Longbows, as well as +1 to hit and +2 to damage with Falchions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wood Elf: Skill
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3% Doublestrike, +3% Doubleshot, +3% dodge, and bypass 3% dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Electric Spell Power. Every point spent in the Arcanotechnician tree provides you with +1 Universal Spell Power.

Effect.DisplayName: Arcanotechnician: Spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Palliative Admixture
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Creating an infused potion of magical energy, you hurl it towards your target in an arc. The potion explodes in a small area that provides nearby allies with 20 Temporary Hit Point + 1 per Artificer level and 10 Temporary Spell Points +1 per two Artificer levels. These last one minute, or until affected creatures rest. (Activation Cost: 5 Spell Points. Cooldown: 30 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Thaumaturgical Battery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast an infusion or spell, you capture a portion of that infusion or spells' energy as 1 Temporary Spell Point. These Temporary Spell Points last for one minute, until consumed by another infusion or spell, or until you rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Lightning Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Lightning Bolt Activation Cost: 6 Spell Points. Cooldown: 7 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Runic Efficacy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +1 Evocation DC, +2 to Caster Level and Max Caster Level of electric spells, +2 to Rune Arm DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Arcane Empowerment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The patterns of the most complex magical formulae are like children's drawings to you. You gain +4 Intelligence and +5 Spellcraft. You treat any non-scroll activated equipped item that casts spells (such as wands, rods, armor, or other activated items) as if they were staves, increasing their caster level to equal yours as well as increasing Save DCs to (10 + your Intelligence bonus + level of spell) if it would be an improvement. These increases are applied after Artificer Knowledge, so do not stack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Static Shock
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Static Shock Cost: 4/3/2 spell points. Cooldown: 12/8/4 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Energy of Creation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your studies have increased your maximium Spell Points by 30/60/90.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Arcane Skills
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 Spell Craft and Use Magic Device

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Spell Critical I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric, Fire, and Force spells have an additional 1% to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Wand And Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75] to the effectiveness of your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Efficient Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of the following Metamagic feats. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Imbue Defender
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Iron Defender gains +[5/10/15] PRR and [5/10/15]% doublestrike. Your experience imbuing your Iron Defender grants you a passive +[5/10/15] Electric Spell Power and +[2/4/6] Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Spell Critical II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric, Fire, and Force spells have an additional 1% to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Shocking Vulnerability
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each Electric spell you cast has a 5% chance of applying 1/1d2/1d3 stack[s] of Vulnerable to each affected enemy. Vulnerable - Target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Lightning Sphere
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Lightning Sphere Activation Cost: 8/6/4 spell points. Cooldown: 15/10/5 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Efficient Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of the following Metamagic feats. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Automated Repairs
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have installed automated repair systems in your Iron Defender. It repairs 4d4+1 hit points of damage to itself every 18/12/6 seconds, to you every - /6/6 seconds, and to nearby allies every - / - /6 seconds. NOTE: Recipients must be Warforged, Bladeforged or possess the Construct Essence feat to benefit. Giving your pet Repair boosting gear does not appear to increase the repair done by this ability. It is affected by Repair Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Spell Critical III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric, Fire, and Force spells have an additional 1% to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Intelligence I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Blast Rod
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Blast Rod Activation Cost: 12/8/6 spell points. Cooldown: 18/12/6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Efficient Heighten
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Heighten Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2 fewer Spell Point(s) per heightened level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Arcane Engine
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have carved arcane symbols on the core engine of your Iron Defender, allowing you to channel Arcane energies through him. As long as you remain near your Iron Defender, he will provide you with 3/6/10 Universal Spell Power. Your experience imbuing your Iron Defender grants you a passive +[5/10/15] Electric Spell Power and +[2/4/6] Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Spell Critical IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric, Fire, and Force spells have an additional 1% to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Intelligence II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Lightning Motes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Lightning Motes Activation Cost: 12/8/6 spell points. Cooldown: 18/12/6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Master Defender
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Iron Defender gain +2/+4/+6 to Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution. In addition, as long as you remain near your Iron Defender, he will provide you with 1%/2%/3% Dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Evocation Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have trained extensively in Evocation magic, granting a +1/+2/+3 bonus to your spell DCs of that school.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcanotechnician: Arcane Mechanism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wielding a Rune Arm, +10/+15/+20 Electric Spell Power, +5/+10/+15 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your equipped rune arm grants you +8 Universal Spell Power when it is charged to Charge Tier 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Infused Weapons I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your equipped weapon in your main hand gains +1 to its Enhancement bonus. Additionally, you gain +1 bonus to your attack roll to confirm a critical hit, and a +1 bonus to the damage of your critical hits (before multipliers). Your equipped rune arm gains +1 stable charge tier. In addition, it grants you an additional +8 Universal Spell Power when it is charged to Charge Tier 2, for a total of +16.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Infused Armor I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your equipped armor gains +1 to its Enhancement bonus. Additionally, your equipped armor or docent grants you +5 PRR and -10% ASF. (Artificer Infusions are not affected by ASF, but this assists with scroll use.) Your equipped rune arm grants you an additional +8 Universal Spell Power when it is charged to Charge Tier 3, for a total of +24.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Infused Weapons II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your equipped weapon in your main hand gains an additional +1 to its Enhancement bonus, for a total of +2. You also gain an additional +1 bonus to your attack roll to confirm a critical hit, and a +1 bonus to the damage of your critical hits (before multipliers), for a total of +2. Your equipped rune arm gains +1 stable charge tier. In addition, it grants you an additional +8 Universal Spell Power when it is charged to Charge Tier 4, for a total of +32.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Infused Armor II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your equipped armor gains an additional +1 to its Enhancement bonus, for a total of +2. Your equipped armor or docent also grants you an additional +5 PRR for a total of +10 and an additional -10% ASF for a total of -20%. (Artificer Infusions are not affected by ASF, but this assists with scroll use.) You gain an additional +15 PRR and MRR innately, regardless of your Armor. Your equipped rune arm grants you an additional +8 Universal Spell Power when it is charged to Charge Tier 5, for a total of +40.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Master Engineer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +4 Intelligence. The Enhancement bonus of your armor and your equipped weapon in your main hand are each increased by an additional +1, for a total of +3. You gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Multiplier with Crossbows, Bastard Swords, Dwarven Axes, Light Hammers, Warhammers, and Morningstars. Your equipped weapon in your main hand is now a Spellcasting Implement, providing a +3 Implement bonus to Universal Spell Power for every +1 Enhancement bonus on the weapon.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Weapon Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Crossbows or Hand and a Half Weapons. Gain bonuses to Attack and Damage Rolls with the selected weapon types.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Crossbow Training I
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls with all crossbows. +1 to damage with non-repeating crossbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hand and a Half Training I
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Bastard Swords and Dwarven Waraxes. Your Glancing Blows with these weapons also have a +2% chance of producing magical weapon effects such as Flaming.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hammer and Morningstar Training I
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls with Light Hammers, Warhammers and Morningstars.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Field Engineer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration, Disable Device and Open Locks. Rank 3: +1 to Reflex Saves vs. Traps.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Field Scrapper
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 to your Sunder DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Thaumaturgical Conduits
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have made improvements to the efficiency of your rune arms. Your rune arms build charge [10/20/33]% faster.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a 25%/50%/75% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Weapon Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Crossbows or Hand and a Half Weapons. Gain bonuses to Attack and Damage Rolls with the selected weapon types.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Crossbow Training II
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls with all crossbows. +1 to damage rolls with all repeating crossbows, +2 to damage rolls with non-repeating crossbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hand and a Half Training II
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Bastard Swords and Dwarven Waraxes. Your Glancing Blows with these weapons also have a +4% chance of producing magical weapon effects such as Flaming.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hammer and Morningstar Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls and +2 damage rolls with Light Hammers, Warhammers and Morningstars.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Wrack Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one either a Melee or Ranged attack. (Cooldown: 12/8/4 seconds):

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wracking Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: On Damage: Deals 1d6/3d6/5d6 extra damage to constructs and living constructs, and applies Wracked: This construct or living construct fortification is reduced by 10% and loses its inherent immunity to sneak attack. This effect stacks up to five times.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wracking Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: On Damage: Deals 1d6/3d6/5d6 extra damage to constructs and living constructs, and applies Wracked: This construct or living construct fortification is reduced by 10% and loses its inherent immunity to sneak attack. This effect stacks up to five times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Caustic Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Perform either a melee or ranged attack that does extra acid and rust damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Caustic Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Crossbow Attack +0.5/1/1.5[W]: On Damage deals 3d6 extra Acid damage and 6d6 extra Rust damage. Damage scales with 200% ranged power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Caustic Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack +1/2/3[W]: On Damage deals 3d6 extra Acid damage and 6d6 extra Rust damage. Damage scales with 200% melee power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Extra Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use each of your action boost 1/2/3 additional times per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Action Boost Selector
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an action boost type

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Boost: Power
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +10/20/30 Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Boost: Attack
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to gain a +4/?/? Action Boost bonus to your attack rolls for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Crossbows or Hand and a Half Weapons. Gain bonuses to Attack and Damage Rolls with the selected weapon types

EnhancementSelection.Name: Crossbow Training III
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls with crossbows. +1 to damage with non-repeating crossbows

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hand and a Half Training III
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Bastard Swords and Dwarven Waraxes. Your Glancing Blows with these weapons also have a +6% chance of producing magical weapon effects such as Flaming.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hammer and Morningstar Training III
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Light Hammers, Warhammers and Morningstars.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Disable Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Target construct or living construct is dazed for 10/20/30 seconds. This effect is removed on damage. Using this ability on a target already affected by it will extend the duration. (Cooldown: 25 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Shatter Defenses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Melee or Ranged attack that also applies a Trauma effect.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shatter Defenses (Crossbow)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Tactical Ranges Crossbow Attack +0.5[W] On Hit: Reduce the target's Armor Class by 5 and lowers fortification by 10%. A successful fortitude save negates this effect. (DC 10 + 1/2 Artificer Level + INT mod + Sunder Bonuses). Regardless of saving throw result target will suffer the Trauma effect, -3 penalty to Fortitude saves due to shock, stack 5 times. Lasts 24 seconds. This ability shares a cooldown with sunder.

DC.Name: Battle Engineer: Shatter Defenses (Crossbow)
DC.Description: Tactical Ranges Crossbow Attack +0.5[W] On Hit: Reduce the target's Armor Class by 5 and lowers fortification by 10%. A successful fortitude save negates this effect.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shatter Defenses (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Tactical Melee Attack +1[W] On Hit: Reduce the target's Armor Class by 5 and lowers fortification by 10%. A successful fortitude save negates this effect. (DC 10 + 1/2 Artificer Level + INT mod + Sunder Bonuses). Regardless of saving throw result target will suffer the Trauma effect, -3 penalty to Fortitude saves due to shock, stack 5 times. Lasts 24 seconds. This ability shares a cooldown with sunder.

DC.Name: Battle Engineer: Shatter Defenses (Melee)
DC.Description: Tactical Melee Attack +1[W] On Hit: Reduce the target's Armor Class by 5 and lowers fortification by 10%. A successful fortitude save negates this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of Strength, Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Weapon Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Crossbows or Hand and a Half Weapons. Gain bonuses to Attack and Damage Rolls with the selected weapon types.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Crossbow Training IV
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls with all crossbows. +1 to damage rolls with all repeating crossbows, +2 to damage rolls with non-repeating crossbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hand and a Half Training IV
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Bastard Swords and Dwarven Waraxes. Your Glancing Blows with these weapons also have a +8% chance of producing magical weapon effects such as Flaming.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hammer and Morningstar Training IV
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls and +2 to damage rolls with Light Hammers, Warhammers and Morningstars.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Battle Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Endless Fusilade
EnhancementSelection.Description: Action Boost: You may activate this ability to enchant your crossbow to instantly reload itself for 6 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Haste Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to receive a 30% Action Boost attack speed bonus for 20 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Agility Engine
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: 3/6/10% Doublestrike and Doubleshot while wearing a Rune Arm.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of Strength, Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Reconstructed Armaments
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain Critical Threat Range with your chosen set of weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reconstructed Crossbows
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with with crossbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reconstructed Edges
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with Bastard Swords and Dwarven Axes

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reconstructed Arms
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with with Light Hammers, Warhammers and Morningstars.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Weapon Attachment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to attach your currently equipped weapons to yourself, giving you superior control over them. Until you unequip these items or rest, they deal +0.5[W] damage. (Cooldown: 15 seconds; Induction time: 2 seconds.) (Note: Selecting this locks out Warforged/Bladeforged Weapon Attachment)

Stance.Name: Weapon Attachment
Stance.Description: You current weapon is attached to you giving better control. You deal +0.5[W] damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Thunder Shock Weapon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Chosoe between a Melee or Ranged attack that also deals additional electric damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thunder-Shock Weapon (Crossbow)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Tactical Ranged Crossbow Attack +1.5[W] On Damage: Deals 6d6 extra Electric damage that scales with 200% Ranged Power and Trips the target. A successful Strength check negates the Trip effect. (DC 14 + 1/2 Artificer Level + INT mod + Sunder bonuses)

DC.Name: Battle Engineer: Thunder-Shock Weapon (Crossbow)
DC.Description: Tactical Ranged Crossbow Attack +1.5[W] On Damage: Deals 6d6 extra Electric damage that scales with 200% Ranged Power and Trips the target. A successful Strength check negates the Trip effect.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thunder-Shock Weapon (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Tactical Melee Attack +3[W] On Damage: Deals 6d6 extra Electric damage that scales with 200% Melee Power and Trips the target. A successful Strength check negates the Trip effect. (DC 14 + 1/2 Artificer Level + INT mod + Sunder bonuses)

DC.Name: Battle Engineer: Thunder-Shock Weapon (Melee)
DC.Description: Tactical Melee Attack +3[W] On Damage: Deals 6d6 extra Electric damage that scales with 200% Melee Power and Trips the target. A successful Strength check negates the Trip effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Unlock Potential
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Ranged and Melee power while wielding a Rune Arm.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Tactical Mobility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: 10% Action Boost bonus to Movement Speed while wearing a Rune Arm.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Renegade Defender
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each core ability in this tree grants you +10 Maximum Hit Points, +5 Positive Spell Power and +5 Repair Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Alchemical Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, or Adamantine Body, your equipped armor grants you a +4 Alchemical bonus to AC and immunity to Magic Missiles.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Curative Admixture: Cure Serious Wounds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Cure Serious Wounds SLA Activation Cost: 4 Spell Points. Cooldown: 8 seconds Passive: Your Admixture spells gain +4 to their Maximum Caster Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Constructive Conduit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +30 Repair Amplification. +50 Maximum Hit Points. While in Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, or Adamantine Body, +2 Max Dex Bonus. Your Admixture spells gain +6 to their Maximum Caster Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Radiant Forcefield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Radiant Forcefield SLA. Activation Cost: 30 Spell Points Cooldown: 3 minutes Your target is surrounded in a sphere of magical force that reduces all damage (except from untyped damage) they take by 25% for a short period of time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Mass Unbreakable Forcefield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Mass Unbreakable Forcefield Activation Cost: 30 Spell Points Cooldown: 3 minutes. For 6 seconds, your party takes -95% damage from all sources (except untyped damage). Only works inside dungeons. Passive: +2 CON, +2 INT. +10 PRR, +10 MRR While in Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, or Adamantine Body, +3 to Max Dex Bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Curative Admixture: Cure Light Wounds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Cure Light Wounds SLA. Activation Cost: 4/3/2 Spell Points. Cooldown: 12/8/4 seconds Infuses a Cure Light Wounds potion with magical energy, hurling it towards your target in an arc. The potion explodes in a small AOE that deals 1d6+2 plus 1 per caster level (maximum caster level 5) positive energy damage to nearby living allies and enemy undead. This infusion is affected by Artificer Knowledge: Potions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Easily Fixed
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Healing Amp, +20 Repair Amp

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Supporting Construction
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Medium or Heavy Armor, or Adamantine Body, +2/4/6 PRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Well-Rounded Maker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 Repair, Heal and Balance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Toughness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5/10/15 Maximum Hitpoints

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Kinetic Discharge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Melee Cleave Attack: On hit: +1/2/3[W] and 2d6 Force damage. This damage scales with 200% Melee Power. 10 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Mighty Slam
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Single Target Melee Attack. Melee Attack: +1/2/3[W]. You may stun the target for 6 seconds. Stunned creatures are considered helpless. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect. (DC: 10 + 1/2 Artificer level + INT modifier + Sunder Modifiers). This ability shares a cooldown with Stunning Blow. Requires an equipped Rune Arm to use.

DC.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Mighty Slam
DC.Description: Single Target Melee Attack. Melee Attack: +1/2/3[W]. You may stun the target for 6 seconds. Stunned creatures are considered helpless. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Armor Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 Armor Class and Armor Maximum Dexterity Bonus

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Converter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Converter Spell Point Cost: 4 spell points. Cooldown: 3 minutes. Target player, hireling, or pet takes 100% base healing from Repair spells for the next three minutes, or until the target dies. Has no effect on Constructs or NPC allies. This overrides their innate base healing from Repair spells for the duration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: Defense OR Action Boost: Saving Throws

EnhancementSelection.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Action Boost: Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +5/10/15 Action boost bonus to Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 30 Seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Action Boost: Saving Throws
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +2/4/6 Action boost bonus to all Saving Throws for 20 seconds. While under this effect you do not automatically fail Saving Throws on a roll of a Natural 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Conjure Component
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Conjure Component Activation Cost: 10 Spell Points Cooldown: 12 seconds. You conjure a large number of components that stand in for the Potion requirements in all of your Admixture spells. These expire on logout.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Battlefist
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You've attuned your Rune Arm to deal a devastating strike. Single Target Melee Attack: +3[W], if the target is under the effect of Mighty Slam, it takes 1d3 Sonic Damage per Artificer level, 1d3 Force Damage per Artificer level, and is knocked down for 10 seconds with no save. This damage scales with 100% Melee Power. Requires an equipped Rune Arm to use.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Reinforced Armor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The Armor Class bonus you gain from armor or docents is increased by [15/30/50]%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Shielding Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shielding Construct Activation Cost: 4 Spell Points Cooldown: 1 minute You create a drone set to shield your allies. When activated, you and your allies nearby (at the time of activation) gain the effects of the shield spell for 2 minutes, granting a +4 Shield bonus to Armor Class and protection from Magic Missiles. The force shield created by this reduces grazing hits by 10%, as if it were a small shield. This effect is dispelled by death and antimagic.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose wither Constitution or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Kinetic Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Kinetic Charge Passive: Any time you hit an opponent in melee, you have a chance of gaining a stack of Kinetic Charge. Each stack grants +1 Sheild Bonus to Armor Class for every three Artificer levels you have. This stacks up to five times. Stacks decay by one every 15 seconds, and gaining a new stack resets the duration. Toggle: When this ability is toggled on, using Kinetic Discharge will clear all stacks of Kinetic Charge and slow (both movement and attack speed) all affected non-boss enemies by 10% per stack cleared for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Reconstruct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Reconstruct Activation Cost: 35/30/25 Spell Points. Cooldown: 30/15/6 seconds Greatly repairs an ally construct, restoring 10 hit points per caster level (max 150hp), while simultaneously granting it an increase in attack speed for a shrot time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Embed Component
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5/10/15 MRR and +2/4/6 Constitution. You can no longer use Evasion, Druid Wild Shape feats, or Primal Avatar's Tree form.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Warding Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activation Cost: 4 spell points Cooldown: 1 minute You create a drone set to counter magical spells. Every 10 seconds, you and nearby allies gain a +3 Alchemical bonus to Saving Throws vs. Magic and +3 Alchemical bonus to Saving Throws vs. Traps that lasts for 10 seconds. This effect is dispelled by death and antimagic.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Curative Admixture: Cure Critical Wounds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Cure Critical Wounds SLA. Activation Cost: 5 Spell Points Cooldown: 12 seconds Infuses a Cure Critical Wounds potion with magical energy, hurling it towards your target in an arc. The potion explodes in a small AOE that deals 4d6+8 plus 1 per caster level (maximum caster level 20) positive energy damage to nearby living allies and enemy undead. This infusion is affected by Artificer Knowledge: Potions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Unbreakable Forcefields
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Unbreakable or Automatic Forcefield

EnhancementSelection.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Unbreakable Forcefield
EnhancementSelection.Description: Unbreakable Forcefield Activation Cost: 30 Spell Points Cooldown: 3 minutes For 6 seconds, your target takes -95% damage from all sources (except Untyped damage). (This is a separate cooldown from the Mass version).

EnhancementSelection.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Automatic Forcefield
EnhancementSelection.Description: Passive: When your HP drops below 50%, you take -95% damage from all sources (except Untyped damage) for 5 seconds. This effect may trigger once every 90 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Paragon Body
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You no longer suffer Arcane Spell Failure from armor. You gain +4 to Fortitude Saves and +20% Racial bonus to maximum hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Regeneration Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Regenerating Construct Activation Cost: 30 Spell Points Cooldown: 1 minute You are surrounded by arcane energy capable of repairing damage. Allies (equal to your Artificer level) are Repaired for 1 hit point per 3 Artificer levels as long as they are near you. This lasts for 30 minutes, but is dispelled death and antimagic.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Renegade Mastermaker: Mastermaker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Repair Wounds spells have no maximum caster level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Die Hard
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Die Hard feat, automatically stabilizing when incapacitated.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Frenzied Toughness I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 hit points and +10 Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Frenzy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enter a frenzy, increasing your strength by +2 and adding Vicious to your melee weapons (+2d6 damage). This damage scales with 100% Melee Power Passive: +5 Melee Power Activation Cost: 10 Hit Points. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Frenzied Toughness II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +60 maximum HP, +20 Healing Amplification and +10 Physical Resistance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Death Frenzy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Expend 20 hit points to enter a Death Frenzy for one minute: +4 strength, +1 critical damage multiplier on rolls of 19-20. Your melee weapons gain 'Greater Vicious'. +4d6 damage to your attacks. This damage scales with 100% Melee Power Passive: +10 Melee Power Activation Cost: 20 Hit Points. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Storm's Eye
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: You gain 25 stacks of Storm's Eye. Storm's Eye: +1 melee damage. One stack fades away every three seconds. Passive: +4 Constitution, +10 Melee Power. When raging your melee attacks have a 5% chance to deal 400 bludgeoning damage. This damage scales with 100% Melee Power. Activation Cost: 100 Hit Points. Cooldown: 2.5 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Extra Rage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2/4/6 Rage use per rest

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Cracking Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: Deals +1/2/3[W] extra damage. Reduces enemy fortification by 5/10/20% Damaging enemies reduces their AC by -1/2/3 for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Die Harder
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your range of unconsciousness extends +5/10/15 HP. When you drop below 1 health, you gain 10/20/30 temp hitpoints. This can only trigger once every five minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Power Rage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 Strength while raging

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Athletics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Balance, Jump, Swim. Rank 3: When you activate Barbarian Rage, you gain +35% Action Boost bonus to movement speed for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Angry Arms
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3% chance of triggering weapon effects on glancing blows and +3/4/5% glancing blow damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Body Blow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Damaging enemies with Cracking Attack reduces their Fortitude saving throws by 1/2/3 for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Blood Tribute
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +50/100/150 Temporary Health for one minute. Each epic level adds +25 temporary hitpoints. You have a stacking -1 penalty to constitution until you rest or die. (Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Extra Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 additional Action Boost use per rest

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Sprint Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +35/40/50% Action Boost bonus to movement speed for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Mad Munitions
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3% chance of triggering weapon effects on glancing blows and +3/4/5% glancing blow damage

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Blood Trail
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Supreme Cleave costs 3/6/10 fewer hitpoints to activate. Rank 3: Supreme Cleave gives +1 Temp HP per hit, up to +10. (Hidden Effect)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Supreme Cleave
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tactical Melee Cleave: Attack enemies all around you. (Activation Cost: 10 Hit Points. Cooldown: 9/6/3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Constitution I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Crazy Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you hit with Cracking Attack, for 12 seconds you gain +0.5/+0.1/+2[W] damage and 1/2/3 Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Exhausting Blow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: Deals +2/3/4[W], 1d6/2d6/3d6 Strength, and 1d6/2d6/3d6 Dexterity damage. (Cooldown: 20 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Wade In
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you Supreme Cleave, you gain +1 Primal bonus to Attack and -1 AC per enemy damaged, up to 3/6/10 maximum. Lasts for 4 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Constitution II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Focus Wide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you score a vorpal hit, you increase your chance of triggering weapon effects with glancing blows by +10% and gain +10% glancing blow damage for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Focused Wrath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2 Competence bonus to Critical Multiplier.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Lash Out
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Supreme Cleave has a 50/75/82% chance to bleed damaged enemies, inflicting up to 1/2/3 stacks. This can stack up to 5 times. Your Supreme Cleave also reduces the AC of enemies by 1/2/3 for six seconds. This stacks up to five times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Healing or Hurt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Accelerated Metabolism or Raging Blows:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Accelerated Metabolism
EnhancementSelection.Description: While barbarian raging, you gain 20 healing amplification and heal 3d6 hit points every 4 seconds. This healing scales with 100% Melee Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Raging Blows
EnhancementSelection.Description: While barbarian raging, you gain +5 Melee Power and your melee attacks gain +1[W] to damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Frenzied Berserker: Tantrum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tactical Melee Cleave: Expend 25 hit points to activate this ability and attack enemies around you. This deals +5[W] damage and has a 50% chance to knock down each damaged enemy briefly on a failed Fortitude save vs. (10 + Strength modifier + Barbarian Level). Abilities that trigger on Supreme Cleave also trigger on Tantrum. (Blood Trail, Wade In, Lash Out, Sundering Spin, Storm's Eye) Activation Cost: 25 Hit Points. Cooldown: 30 seconds

DC.Name: Tantrum
DC.Description: Tactical Melee Cleave: Expend 25 hit points to activate this ability and attack enemies around you. This deals +5[W] damage and has a 50% chance to knock down each damaged enemy briefly on a failed Fortitude save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Occult Slayer: Weapon Bond
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You build a psychic bond with your weapons. You strengthen this bond by damaging enemies with attacks. Each attack adds 1 to your weapon bond, up to a maximum of 200. Dying resets your weapon bond to zero. Active: +5 to attack for 20 seconds. Cost: 1 weapon bond. Cooldown: 20 seconds. Switching weapons activates a 30 seconds cooldown timer.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Occult Slayer: Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to all saving throws. Improve your barbarian damage reduction by +1%, +10 Hit Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Occult Slayer: Elemental Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When enemy spells deal elemental damage to you, there's a 25% chance you'll gain 25 temporary hitpoints for 30 seconds. This can trigger up to once every 12 seconds. Improve your barbarian damage reduction by +1%. +30 Hit Points +20 Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Occult Slayer: Blank Thoughts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Slippery Mind feat and improve your barbarian damage reduction by 1%. +60 Hit Points +5 Magical Resistance Rating +20 Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Occult Slayer: Force Ward
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain immunity to magic missiles and +5% Competence bonus to entirely avoid incoming Force damage. Improve your barbarian damage reduction by +1%. +100 Hit Points +5 Magical Resistance Rating +20 Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Occult Slayer: Mind Over Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have Spell Resistance equal to your Constitution score. +4 Constitution +150 Hit Points +10 Magical Resistance Rating +40 Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Occult Slayer: Extend Rage
