EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Cometfall
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Abaility: You conjure a bright, glowing comet, which appears in midair above your target, then strikes the ground with tremendous force. This area of effect spell does 2d3+6 points of bludgeon damage for every 2 caster levels. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. The force of this comet can knock some creatures prone. Another successful Reflex save negates the knockdown portion. Spell point cost: 35/30/25 Cooldown: 20/15/12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Unstoppable Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies within your Aura of Menace suffer a -1/-2/-3 penalty to Spell Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Evocation Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have trained extensively in Evocation magic, granting a +1 bonus to your spell DCs of that school.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Zealous Faith
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The maximum caster level of your Fire, Force, Light, and Physical damage spells are increased by 1/2/3.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Archon's Fury
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Your Lantern Archon's attacks will add a stack of Archon's Fury. Archon's Fury: 1d6+1 Fire damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds, stacks up to 20 times. While toggled on, every shot from your Archon costs 12 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Pleasant Disposition
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For each Core ability you gain, +1% Positive Spell Critical Chance, +10 Healing Amp, and +5 Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Beacon of Grace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and allies ahead of you heal for 1 point of Positive Energy per Favored Soul level. Undead enemies ahead of you take the same amount of damage (Will save for half). Both scale with your Positive Spell Power. 6 second cooldown. This ability is considered a 1st Level Favored Soul spell of the Conjuration school. Spell Point Cost: 6 Spell points Cooldown: 6 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Shining Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast one of your Beacons or use Flight of Glory, you and affected allies gain a Sacred bonus to Healing Amplification equal to your Favored Soul level for 12 seconds. Enemies in the zone of effect are dazzled and take a -1 penalty to attack, spot, and search. Targets are illuminated by Shining Light, dispelling stealth, invisibility, blur and displacement, for 10 seconds, and giving a -40 penalty to hide. Sightless enemies are immune to the dazzle effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Beacon of Hope
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and allies ahead of you take the dispelling effects of a Panacea, Restoration and Dispel Paralysis spell, and heal for 5 points of Positive Energy per Favored Soul level. Undead enemies ahead of you take the same amount of damage (Will save for half). Both scale with your Positive Spell Power. This ability is considered a 5th Level Favored Soul pell of the Conjuration school. Spell Point Cost: 30 Spell points Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Flight of Glory
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you use your Leap of Faith, nearby allies gain Temporary Hit Points equal to triple your character level, plus an additional 50 Hit Points. Cost 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: True Resurrection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain True Resurrection as a Spell Like Ability Spell Point Cost: 25 SP Cooldown: 10 seconds
Passive: Choose either Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +3 Maximum Caster Level with all Positive spells. Your Hope and Beacon abilities that scale with Favored Soul level now add Epic Levels as well. Passive: +4 Wisdom.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +3 Maximum Caster Level with all Positive spells. Your Hope and Beacon abilities that scale with Favored Soul level now add Epic Levels as well. Passive: +4 Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Good Hope
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell-Like Ability: This area of effect spell instills powerful hope to the recipients, granting a +2 morale bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks and weapon damage rolls. Good Hope counters and dispels Crushing Despair. Spell Point Cost: 10/5/2 SP. Cooldown: 3 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Confidence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration, Diplomacy and Heal. Rank 3: You also gain +10 Positive Energy Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Divine Durability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2/4/6 Competence Bonus to Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Spell Critical Chance I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Positive Healing spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Spell Points
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +30/60/90 Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Close Wounds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Spell Like A Ability: Positive energy is quickly channeled to heal light wounds of your target or damage undead for 2/2/3 to 4 hit points plus an additional 1/2/3 for every caster level up to caster level 5. This spell has faster than normal casting speed and minimal cooldown. Spell Point Cost: 6/4/2 Spell Points Cooldown: 3/2/1 seconds
D&D Dices: Heals 1d3+1/2d3+2/3d3+3 per caster level (max 5).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Hope for Inspiration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target ally gains a Sacred bonus to all Skills equal to 1 + 1/4 your Favored Soul level for 18 seconds. 6 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Divine Durability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2/4/6 Competence bonus to Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Spell Critical Chance II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Positive Healing spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Might's Reward
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multiselector, Choose your bonus:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Might's Reward: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain an Sacred bonus to Positive Spell Power equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier for 30/60/120 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Might's Reward: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain an Sacred bonus to Positive Spell Power equal to 5 + your Strength modifier for 30/60/120 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Might's Reward: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain an Sacred bonus to Positive Spell Power equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier for 30/60/120 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Hope for Protection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target ally gains a Sacred bonus to PRR and MRR equal to 3 + Favored Soul level for 20 seconds. 6 Second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Efficient Empower Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Empower Healing Spell Metamagic costs you 4 fewer Spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Spell Critical Chance III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Positive Healing spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Death Ward
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Grants an ally immunity to death spells and effects, energy drain and negative energy effects. Spell point Cost: 10/8/5 Spell points Cooldown: 4 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Hope for Victory
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target ally gains a Sacred Bonus to Melee and Ranged power equal to 3 + half your Favored Soul level, and Universal Spell Power equal to 6 + your Favored Soul level. This lasts for 18 seconds, 6 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Optimism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every time you cast one of your Hope abilities, you gain a stack of Rising Beacon, giving yourself +2 PRR, +2 MRR and +1 AC. This stacks up to 10 times, and stacks fade once every 12 seconds. Hope for Success grants 3 stacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Spell Critical Chance IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Positive Healing spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Raise Dead
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Resurrects the target, restores 10% of the target's hit points and preserves current spell points. 15 Spell Points, 9 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Hope for Success
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target ally's main hand weapon (at the time of casting) gains +1 to Critical Threat Range and Muliplier for 20 seconds. 1 Minute cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Heal
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Channels powerful positive energy into allies to wipe away injury and afflictions, restore 10 Hit Points per caster level (Maximum caster level 15.), removes the conditions or effects: Ability Damaged, Blinded, Confused, Dazed, Dazzled, Deafened, Diseased, Exhausted, Fatigued, Feebleminded, Insanity, Nauseated and Poisoned. Against Undead this spell acts as Harm. Undead who make a successful Will save reduce the damage by half. 40 Spell Points. 6 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Undying Beacon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Allies affected by your Beacons gain Unconsciousness Range equal to 10x your Favored Soul level. This effect lasts for 12 seconds, and is refreshed if the target is affected by another Beacon spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Beacon of Hope: Flame of the Favored
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Creates a wall that persists for 30 seconds. Allies within the aura are healing 1 hit point per 3 Favored Soul levels as long as they remain within it. Undead enemies are damaged for the same amount. Costs 40 Spell Points. 30 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Kensei Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a group of weapons as your Kensei focus. You gain +1 to hit with these weapons, and many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Archery
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of bows. You gain +1 to hit with longbows and shortbows. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Axes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of axes. You gain +1 to hit with battleaxes, greataxes, handaxes, and throwing axes. Dwarves also receive this bonus with dwarven waraxes. (The Exotic Weapon Mastery enhancement will add dwarven waraxes to this list of weapons if you are not a dwarf.) Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Crossbows
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of crossbows. You gain +1 to hit with heavy crossbows, and light crossbows. (The Exotic Weapon Mastery enhancement will add great crossbows and repeating crossbows to this list of weapons.) Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Druidic Weapons
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of druidic weapons. You gain +1 to hit with clubs, daggers, darts, quarterstaves, scimitars, sickles, and when using unarmed combat. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Heavy Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of heavy blades. You gain +1 to hit with falchions, greatswords, longswords, and scimitars. (The Exotic Weapon Mastery enhancement will add bastard swords and khopeshes to this list of weapons.) Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Light Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of light blades. You gain +1 to hit with daggers, kukri, rapiers, shortswords, and throwing daggers. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Maces and Clubs
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of maces and clubs. You gain +1 to hit with clubs, light maces, heavy maces, greatclubs, morningstars, and quarterstaves. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Martial Arts
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of monk weapons. You gain +1 to hit with handwraps, kama, quarterstaves, shuriken and when using unarmed combat. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of picks and hammers. You gain +1 to hit with light picks, heavy picks, light hammers, warhammers, mauls, and throwing hammers. Many Kensei abilities require that you use one of these weapons. (These are labelled 'Focus' abilities.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Spiritual Bond
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spiritual Bond: When you have a weapon equipped in your main hand that is part of your Focus, it gains On Vorpal: If this weapon has fewer stacks of Battle Meditation than the number of Kensei cores Abilities you possess, it gains one stack of Battle Meditation: This weapon gains a +1 Insight bonus to Enhancement bonus for 20 seconds. This stacks up to 10 times. On timer expiration, 1 stack of Meditative Focus is removed at a time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Strike With No Thought
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Passive: Your weapons gain +1 competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier. When you have a weapon equipped in your main hand that is part of your Focus, you gain 1% Doublestrike or 1% Doubleshot (depending on whether your Focus is melee or ranged). Each additional Core Ability you acquire from this tree increases this bonus by 1%.
Doublestrike: Your mainhand melee attacks gain a percent chance to strike twice.
Doubleshot: Your ranged attacks, including thrown attacks, gain a percent chance to attack with an extra projectile. Repeating Crossbows have a reduced chance to produce extra shots.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Power Surge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: You gain +8 Psionic bonus to all attributes for 60 seconds. If you possess the ability to generate Ki, you gain On Hit: +2 Ki. You may use this 5 times per rest.

Stance.Name: Kensei: Power Surge
Stance.Description: You gain +8 Psionic bonus to all attributes for 60 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: One Cut
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Your currently equipped primary weapon gains x1 Critical Damage Multiplier for 15 secs.(Cooldown: 1 minute) Passive: +20 Melee Power and Ranged Power. +1 use of Power Surge per Rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Alacrity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to all ability scores, 15% doublestrike and doubleshot, +4 additional action boost uses and +2 to the DCs of all tactical feats. +2 uses of Power Surge per Rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Extra Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 extra action boost

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Weapon Group Specialization I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with your selected Weapon group.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Archery
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of bows. You gain +1 to hit and damage with bows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Axes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of axes. You gain +1 to hit and damage with axes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Crossbows
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of crossbows. You gain +1 to hit and damage with non-repeating crossbows. If you possess Exotic Weapon Mastery, you gain +1 to hit with repeating crossbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Druidic Weapons
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of druidic weapons. You gain +1 to hit and damage with druidic weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Heavy Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of heavy blades. You gain +1 to hit and damage with heavy blades.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Light Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of light blades. You gain +1 to hit and damage with light blades.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Maces and Clubs
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of maces and clubs. You gain +1 to hit and damage with maces and clubs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Martial Arts
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of monk weapons. You gain +1 to hit and damage with martial arts weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of picks and hammers. You gain +1 to hit and damage with picks and hammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Exotic Weapon Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds exotic weapons to your Kensei Focus. Axes: Adds dwarven axe if you are not a dwarf. (This has no effect if you are a dwarf.) Crossbows: Adds great crossbows, heavy repeating crossbows, and light repeating crossbows. Heavy Blades: Adds bastard swords and khopesh. Note: This enhancement does not grant exotic proficiency.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an action boost, cooldown 30 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain +4/+6/+8 Action Boost bonus to hit and damage for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Haste Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain +10%/+20%/+30% Action Boost bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Reed In The Wind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Focus Melee Attack: Deals +1/2/3[W] damage. If you successfully damage your target you gain a +3%/6%/9% Insight bonus to Dodge for 6 seconds. (Cooldown: 15 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Tactics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 to the DC's of your Tactical abilities.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Weapon Group Specialization II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with your selected Weapon Group.

RequiresOneOf.DisplayDescription: Weapon Focus Feat for Kensei specialization selection

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Archery
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of bows. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with bows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Axes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of axes. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed axes, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed axes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Crossbows
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of crossbows. You gain +1 to hit and +3 to damage with non-repeating crossbows. If you possess Exotic Weapon Mastery, you gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with repeating crossbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Druidic Weapons
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of druidic weapons. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed druidic weapons, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed druidic weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Heavy Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of heavy blades. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed heavy blades, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed heavy blades.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Light Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of light blades. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with light blades.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Maces and Clubs
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of maces and clubs. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed maces and clubs, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed maces and clubs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Martial Arts
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of monk weapons. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed martial arts weapons, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed martial arts weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of picks and hammers. You gain +1 to hit and +2 to damage with one handed picks and hammers, and +1 to hit and +3 damage with two handed picks and hammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Improved Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1%/+2%/+3% Dodge when wearing light or no armor. Note: Does not stack with Tempest: Improved Dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Ascetic Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your rigorous training gives you various benefits.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Agility
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration, Reflex Saves, and Dodge cap (in light or no armor).

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conditioning
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2/+3 Fortitude Saves, +5/+10/+15 HP and +5/10/15% Fortification

EnhancementSelection.Name: Contemplation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration and Will Saves. Rank 3: Your passive ki regeneration is increased by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Critical Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 to confirm critical hits and critical hit damage (before weapon multipliers)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Weapon Group Specialization III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with your selected Weapon Group.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of picks and hammers. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with picks and hammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Athletic Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Maximum Dexterity bonus and Dodge cap. -1/-2/-3 Armor Check Penalty.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Shattering Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a melee or ranged special attack that deals extra damage and reduces an opponent's fortification.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shattering Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Focus Ranged Attack: Deals +1/+2/+3[W] damage. On Damage: Target loses 15% fortification for 10 seconds. (no save)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shattering Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Focus Melee Attack: Deals +1/2/3[W] damage. On Damage: Target loses 15% fortification for 10 seconds. (no save)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select +1 to either Strength, Dexterity or Wisdom.

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Opportunity Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: 2 Charges. Melee attack: Deals +3[W] Damage, comsumes 1 charge. On Damage: You gain 20 Melee Power for 6 Seconds. There is a 10% chance to regain an expended charge of this enhancement.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Weapon Group Specialization IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants bonuses to hit and damage with your selected Weapon Group.

RequiresOneOf.DisplayDescription: Greater Weapon Focus Feat for Kensei specialization selection

EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of bows. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with bows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Axes

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Crossbows
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of crossbows. You gain +1 to hit and +4 damage with non-repeating crossbows. If you possess Exotic Weapon Mastery, you gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with repeating crossbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Druidic Weapons
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of druidic weapons. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with one handed druidic weapons, and +1 to hit and +4 damage with two handed druidic weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of heavy blades. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with one handed heavy baldes, and +1 to hit and +4 damage with two handed heavy blades.

EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of light blades. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with light blades.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Maces and Clubs
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of maces and clubs. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with one handed maces and clubs, and +1 to hit and +4 damage with two handed maces and clubs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kensei Focus: Picks and Hammers
EnhancementSelection.Description: You focus your Kensei training in the use of picks and hammers. You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with one handed picks and hammers, and +1 to hit and +4 damage with two handed picks and hammers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Liquid Courage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: After drinking, you will receive a +50 Healing and Repair Amplification for 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Strike at the Heart
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your weapon attacks have the Improved Destruction effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select +1 to either Strength, Dexterity or Wisdom.

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Kensei: A Good Death
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a melee or ranged special attack that deals extra damage to targets at low health.

EnhancementSelection.Name: A Good Death (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Focus Melee Attack: Perform a melee attack with +1 Critical Damage Multiplier. On Damage: If the target is below 30% health, deal 500 damage that scales with 400% Melee Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: A Good Death (Ranged)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Ki Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Spell-Like Ability: Ki Bolt Passive: +3 Melee Power +2 Fire Resistance +3 PRR Enemies have -2 Fire Resistance against your spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Sounding Staff
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Quick Draw feat, which reduces the time between using Spell-Like Abilities and attacking. In addition, while you are centered and wielding a quarterstaff, you gain +2 Ki each time you hit a creature. This stacks with all other sources of Ki generation. Passive: +3 Melee Power +2 Fire Resistance +3 PRR Enemies have -2 Fire Resistance against your spells.

While wielding a quarterstaff inside your Cauldron of Flame, you gain +5 to hit and damage, and a +1 Critical Multiplier. +15% attack speed with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Elemental Words I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four attacks that increase elemental damage taken by your opponent: (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: All-Consuming Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fire Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to light up like tinder. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more fire damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Porous Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: Earth Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to draw acid in like a sponge. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more acid damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Static Charge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Air Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the fury of the sky. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more electrical and sonic damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Winter's Touch
EnhancementSelection.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the chill of death. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more cold damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 to the DC's of your monk finishing moves

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Negotiator
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Bluff, Diplomacy, and Haggle. Rank 3: The cooldown for your Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate are reduced by 10%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Animal Forms
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You emulate a creature of nature in your training.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Clever Monkey
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a monkey, no trap in the world can catch you. You gain +1 to your haggle skill and all saves against traps, as well as energy resistance 2. At monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the skill and save bonuses increase by 1 and energy resistance increases by 2.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Elegant Crane
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a crane, you strike with precision and elegance. You gain +1 to your Diplomacy skill, and generate 1 additional Ki on critical hits. Your training has left you more fragile than normal, however, and have a -1 penalty to Fortitude saves. At monk levels 3, 9, and 15, these bonuses and penalties increase by 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Faithful Hound
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a hound, you are ever vigilant and at home amidst the pack. You gain +1 to your Listen skill and a +2 bonus to hit flanked opponents. At monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the bonuses increase by 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Patient Tortoise
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a tortoise, you are calm at heart and worries wash over you. You gain +1 to your Concentration skill and 5 additional hit points. At monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the skill bonus increases by 1 and hit point bonus increases by 5.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Tenacious Badger
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a badger, you are most dangerous when grievously injured. You gain +1 to your Intimidate skill, and whenever you are below 50% health, your passive Ki regeneration is increased by 1 and you deal +0.25[W] additional damage. Your patience has suffered, however, and you generate Ki slower when meditating. At monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the skill bonus increases by 1 and the damage bonus increases by +0.25[W].

EnhancementSelection.Description: Earth Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to draw acid in like a sponge. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more acid damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Static Charge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Air Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the fury of the sky. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more electrical and sonic damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementSelection.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the chill of death. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more cold damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and +2 to damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Quarterstaff Attack: Deals +1/+2/+3[W] damage. You gain a 5%/15%/25% Morale bonus to melee doublestrike for 10 seconds. (Cooldown: 18/15/12 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Elemental Ki Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four attacks that have secondary after effects: (Activation Cost: 5 Ki. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Eagle Claw Attack
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fire Ki Melee Attack: Your attacks can shatter objects. You strike at weak points in your opponents armor or hide, dealing +2[W] damage and apply four stacks of Armor Destruction. (Each stack reduces Armor Class by 1 and Fortification by 1% for 20 seconds. This effect can stack up to 15 times.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fists of Iron
EnhancementSelection.Description: Earth Ki Melee Attack: You have imbued your attacks with extra force. Performs a melee attack with +3[W] damage, +1 critical threat range, and +1 Critical Damage Multiplier.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knock on the Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: Air Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent, deflecting their momentum. Performs a melee attack with +1[W] damage, and your enemy deals 4% less physical damage for 30 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Unbalancing Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, dealing +3[W] and throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks. A successful Reflex save negates this effect (DC 10 + Half Monk Level + Wisdom modifier + Trip modifiers). The target receives periodic saves to attempt to break free of this effect.

DC.Name: Henshin Mystic: Unbalancing Strike
DC.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, dealing +3[W] and throwing them off balance for a short period of time. EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four attacks (not previously selected) that increase elemental damage taken by your opponent:

EnhancementSelection.Name: All-Consuming Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fire Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to light up like tinder. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more fire damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Porous Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: Earth Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to draw acid in like a sponge. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more acid damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Static Charge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Air Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the fury of the sky. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more electrical and sonic damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Winter's Touch
EnhancementSelection.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the chill of death. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more cold damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Staff Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Lighting the Candle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Weapon Stance: While you are centered, you enhance your attacks with Ki flame. Two handed weapons gain: On Hit: 2d4/2d6/2d8 Fire damage On Critical: 2d10/4d10/6d10 Force damage. One handed weapons and handwraps gain: On Hit: 2d2/2d3/2d4 Fire damage On Critical: 2d6/4d6/6d6 Force damage. This damage scales with Melee Power. Your Ki generation on hit is reduced by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Embrace the Void
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain 1/2/3 Meditation use per rest, +1/+2/+3 to Dodge Cap, and regenerate Ki faster while meditating. While you are meditating, you generate a protective shield which can absorb up to 25/50/100 damage, and is refreshed every 3 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Menshin Mystic: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to an Ability of your choice:

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Elemental Words IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four attacks (not previously selected) that increase elemental damage taken by your opponent:

EnhancementSelection.Name: All-Consuming Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fire Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to light up like tinder. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more fire damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Winter's Touch
EnhancementSelection.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to feel the chill of death. On Hit: Target takes +1[W] damage, 10% more cold damage for 30 seconds, and gains 2 stacks of Vulnerable.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Staff Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and +2 to damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants a passive bonus to the Monk and nearby allies that grants +10 Exceptional bonus to Spellpower and +5 Exceptional Bonuses to both Melee and Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to an Ability of your choice:

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Void Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Void Ki Melee Attack: You have learned to make attacks backed by pure Ki energy. On Hit: +3[W], +1 to Critical Threat Range and Multiplier, and 10d6 Force damage that scales with Melee Power. On Vorpal: Your enemy is erased from existence. (Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Staff Training V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to hit and damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Staff Specialization
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier and Threat Range with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Balance in Dawn
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a melee attack that opposes your philosophy:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Henshin Mystic: Every Light Casts a Shadow
EnhancementSelection.Description: Dark Ki Melee Attack: Perform an attack with +2[W] damage. On Damage: Target suffers 1d4 Negative Levels. All nearby enemies suffer 1d2 Negative Levels. (Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 12 seconds)

Requirement.Feat: Path of Harmonious Balance: Fists of Light

EnhancementSelection.Name: Henshin Mystic: Shadows Cannot Exist Without Light
EnhancementSelection.Description: Light Ki Melee Attack: Perform an attack with +2[W] damage. On Damage: Target suffers 1d6 Light damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. This can stack up to 10 times. All allies around you receive 100 Positive Energy healing. (This healing effect is unaffected by Spell Power.) (Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 6 seconds)

Requirement.Feat: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Basic Ninja Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are centered, you can use your Dexterity modifier to hit. You are proficient with short swords and treat them as Ki weapons. If another ability allows you to remain centered while wielding other types of melee weapon, then those weapons will also get the benefit of Ninja Training.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Advanced Ninja Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are centered, you can use your Dexterity modifier for damage. You also gain a chance based on your Dexterity score to throw an extra shuriken per attack. If another ability allows you to remain centered while wielding other types of melee weapon (including unarmed/handwraps), then those weapons will also get the benefit of Advanced Ninja Training.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Shadow Veil
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: You focus your Ki and draw shadows around you. You become invisible and 25% incorporeal for one minute. Actions that break invisibility do not remove the incorporeality portion of this effect. (Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 6 seconds). Note: Becoming uncentered for any reason immediately removes both components of the buff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Poisoned Darts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: You spit poisoned darts in a cone before you. Nearby enemies are affected by between 1 and 8 stacks of Ninja Poison. Magical Poison: Target takes 1d4 points of Poison damage, which scales with melee power; every 3 seconds for 15 seconds. The Target's vulnerability to poison is increased by 5%. This ability can stack up to 20 times. On timer expiration, 5 stacks of Ninja Poison are removed at a time. Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Diversion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: You turn yourself invisible and create a dummy that attracts the attention of nearby enemies. For the next 20 seconds, gain +5 Sneak Attack Dice. Activation Cost: 50 Ki. Cooldown: 3 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Ninja Master
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 Dexterity and +2 Wisdom, +5 Sneak Attack Dice. While you are centered, you gain a +1 Competence bonus to you Critical Multiplier. Any weapon you wield while centered gains the Vorpal ability. If another ability allows you to remain centered while wielding other types of melee weapon, then those weapons will also gain these effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Ninjutsu I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four toggles that modify your Touch of Despair finisher: (Cooldown: 3 seconds)

Requirement.Feat: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ninja Spy: Impending Doom
EnhancementSelection.Description: If the enemy affected by your Touch of Despair dies within the next 30 seconds, you gain 25 Ki and 25 temporary hit points. Enemies immune to your Touch of Despair cannot be Doomed. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Poison Exploit
EnhancementSelection.Description: On a failed saving throw, your Touch of Despair finisher purges an enemy of Ninja Poison, dealing 1d20 poison damage per stack of Ninja Poison removed. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Poisoned Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: On a failed saving throw, your Touch of Despair finisher also causes your opponent to gain a stack of Ninja Poison every 6 seconds for 30 seconds. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wave of Despair
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Touch of Despair finisher also causes all nearby enemies to suffer one negative level. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Hide and Move Silently. +20%/+35%/+50% movement speed while sneaking. Rank 3: While centered and Sneaking, your passive ki regeneration is increased by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Sneak Attack Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Subtlety
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -20%/-30%/-40% threat generation with melee attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Acrobatic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Balance, Jump, and Tumble. +1%/+2%/+3% Dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Ninjutsu II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four toggles (not previously selected) that modify your Touch of Despair finisher.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Impending Doom
EnhancementSelection.Description: If the enemy affected by your Touch of Despair dies within the next 30 seconds, you gain 25 Ki and 25 temporary hit points. Enemies immune to your Touch of Despair cannot be Doomed. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Poison Exploit
EnhancementSelection.Description: On a failed saving throw, your Touch of Despair finisher purges an enemy of Ninja Poison, dealing 1d20 poison damage per stack of Ninja Poison removed. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Description: On a failed saving throw, your Touch of Despair finisher also causes your opponent to gain a stack of Ninja Poison every 6 seconds for 30 seconds. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wave of Despair
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Touch of Despair finisher also causes all nearby enemies to suffer one negative level. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Agility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration, Reflex Saves, and Maximum Dodge bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Sneak Attack Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Elemental Ki Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four attacks that have secondary after effects: (Activation Cost: 5 Ki. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Eagle Claw Attack
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fire Ki Melee Attack: Your attacks can shatter objects. You strike at weak points in your opponents armor or hide, dealing +2[W] damage and apply two stacks of the Armor Destruction effect. (Each stack reduces Armor Class by 1 and Fortification by 1% for 20 seconds. This effect can stack up to 4 times.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fists of Iron
EnhancementSelection.Description: Earth Ki Melee Attack: You have imbued your attacks with extra force. Performs a melee attack with +3[W] damage, +1 critical threat range, and +1 Critical Damage Multiplier.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knock on the Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: Air Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent, deflecting their momentum. Performs a melee attack with +1[W] damage, and your enemy deals 2% less physical damage for 30 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Unbalancing Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks. A successful Reflex save negates this effect (DC 10 + Half Monk Level + Wisdom modifier + Trip modifiers). The target receives periodic saves to attempt to break free of this effect.

DC.Name: Ninja Spy: Unbalancing Strike
DC.Description: Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, dealing +3[W] and throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Action Boost: Melee/Ranged Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: [+10/+20/+30] Action Boost bonus to Melee/Ranged Power for 20 seconds. Usable 5 times per rest. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Ninjutsu III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four toggles (not previously selected) that modify your Touch of Despair finisher:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Impending Doom
EnhancementSelection.Description: If the enemy affected by your Touch of Despair dies within the next 30 seconds, you gain 25 Ki and 25 temporary hit points. Enemies immune to your Touch of Despair cannot be Doomed. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Poison Exploit

EnhancementSelection.Name: Poisoned Soul
EnhancementSelection.Description: On a failed saving throw, your Touch of Despair finisher also causes your opponent to gain a stack of Ninja Poison every 6 seconds for 30 seconds. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wave of Despair
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Touch of Despair finisher also causes all nearby enemies to suffer one negative level. Passive: +1 to Hit and Damage while Centered, does not apply to Handwraps or Quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Flash Bang
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Bomb Spell-Like Ability: Throws a fragile eggshell imbued with ninja magic that explodes into light, blinding opponents for 6 seconds on a failed reflex save and momentarily dazing opponents on a failed fortitude save. Both saving throws have DC equal to (10/14/18 + Monk Level + Wisdom Modifier). (Activation Cost: 20 Ki. Cooldown: 30 seconds)

DC.Name: Ninja Spy: Flash Bang (Blind)
DC.Description: Ki Bomb Spell-Like Ability: Throws a fragile eggshell imbued with ninja magic that explodes into light, blinding opponents for 6 seconds on a failed reflex save and momentarily dazing opponents on a failed fortitude save.

DC.Name: Ninja Spy: Flash Bang (Daze)
DC.Description: Ki Bomb Spell-Like Ability: Throws a fragile eggshell imbued with ninja magic that explodes into light, blinding opponents for 6 seconds on a failed reflex save and momentarily dazing opponents on a failed fortitude save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Sneak Attack Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Sting of the Ninja
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Weapon Stance: You poison your weapon with a secret mixture. While you are centered, your piercing and slashing melee weapons (and shuriken) inflict your foes with a stack of Ninja Poison on critical hits. (Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Deadly Exploits
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Poison Exploit now deals 1d30/1d40/1d50 poison damage per stack of Ninja Poison removed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Sneak Attack Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: No Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You deal 10%/20%/30% additional damage to helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Touch of Death
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Dark Ki Melee Attack: You strike a living opponent down with twisted Ki, dealing 500 additional negative energy damage. Your opponent takes half damage on a successful Fortitude save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your monk level). (Activation Cost: 50 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

Requirement.Feat: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness

DC.Name: Ninja Spy: Touch of Death
DC.Description: Dark Ki Melee Attack: You strike a living opponent down with twisted Ki, dealing 500 additional negative energy damage. Your opponent takes half damage on a successful Fortitude save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Deadly Striker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are centered with any weapon (other than Handwraps or a Quarterstaff), you gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Threat Range. Kamas and Shuriken gain double this bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Crippling Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Rogue ability, Crippling Strike. (On Sneak Attack: 2 Strength damage.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Ninja Spy: Shadow Double
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack with +2[W] and gain 100% melee doublestrike for 6 seconds. (Activation Cost: 30 Ki. Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Bastion of Purity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For each Core Ability you claim in this tree, you gain 10 Positive Energy Spell Power, which affects your monk finishing moves and spell-like abilities. Your Positive Healing Amplification is also increased by 10% for each Shintao Monk Core Ability you possess.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Protection from Tainted Creatures
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class and a +1 bonus to saving throws against attacks from tainted creatures (aberrations, extraplanar creatures that are not Lawful Outsiders, and undead). These bonuses stack with all other bonuses to armor class and saving throws. Your unarmed attacks now bypass Byeshk damage reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Iron Hand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your unarmed attacks now bypass Cold Iron damage reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Argent Fist
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain an additional +1 bonus to Armor Class and a +1 bonus to saving throws. Your unarmed attacks and attacks with Handwraps now bypass Silver damage reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Touch the Void Dragon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: Spend 30 ki to gain a 1d4+1 bonus to all ability scores for one minute (Cooldown: 3 minute). Passive: +5 Melee Power, +1[W] with handwraps or while unarmed

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: To Seek Perfection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You continually seek physical and spiritual betterment, reaping many benefits. You gain +4 Wisdom. +15 Melee Power, +2[W] with handwraps or while unarmed. You gain an additional +1 bonus to Armor Class and a +1 bonus to saving throws. You no longer suffer penalties from Meditation of War.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Elemental Curatives I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four toggles that modify your Healing Ki finisher:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Difficulty at the Beginning
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also applies a Lesser Restoration effect. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lifting the Veil
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes blindness. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Restoring the Balance
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes curses. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: The Receptive Earth
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes disease. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Reed in the Wind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: Deals +1/2/3[W] damage. If you successfully damage your target you gain a +3%/+6%/+9% Insight bonus to Dodge for 6 seconds. (Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Deft Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +3%/+6%/+10% chance to make offhand attacks while centered and wielding two weapons or fighting unarmed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Ki Shout
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: Intimidates nearby enemies, encouraging them to attack you. This ability uses your Concentration skill, and shares a cooldown with the Intimidate skill. (Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Exemplar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Heal and Intimidate. Rank 3: You also gain +10% threat generation.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Elemental Curatives II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four toggles (not previously selected) that modify your Healing Ki finisher.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Difficulty at the Beginning
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also applies a Lesser Restoration effect. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lifting the Veil
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes blindness. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Restoring the Balance
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes curses. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: The Receptive Earth
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes disease. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Smite Tainted Creature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You have the ability to expend Ki to deal devastating blows in melee against tainted creatures. You gain twice your Wisdom modifier to your attack roll and a damage bonus based on your monk level. A tainted target will be locked in a tomb of jade on vorpal attacks (attack roll of 20 followed by critical confirmation) on a failed Will save DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your monk level + stun bonuses. Extraplanar Aberrations or Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid their fate. (Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

DC.Name: Shintao: Smite Tainted Creature
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You have the ability to expend Ki to deal devastating blows in melee against tainted creatures. A tainted target will be locked in a tomb of jade on vorpal attacks on a failed Will save. Extraplanar Aberrations or Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid their fate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Iron Skin
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While centered, you gain an additional 5/10/20 PRR.

This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Conditioning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration and Fortitude Saves, +5/+10/+15 HP.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Elemental Curatives III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four toggles (not previously selected) that modify your Healing Ki finisher:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Difficulty at the Beginning
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also applies a Lesser Restoration effect. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lifting the Veil
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes blindness. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Restoring the Balance
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes curses. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementSelection.Name: The Receptive Earth
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing Ki finishing move also removes disease. Passive: +1 to hit and damage with handwraps while centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Jade Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that is anathema to tainted creatures, that increases their physical damage vulnerability by 10% and reduces their fortification by 25%. A successful Will save negates this effect (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + monk level + stun bonuses). This ability only functions on aberrations, extraplanar creatures that are not classified as 'Lawful Outsiders', and undead. Creatures that are both extraplanar and either aberrations or undead receive double this effect. On critical hits, a tainted target will be locked in a tomb of jade on a failed Will save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your monk level). Extraplanar Aberrations or Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid their fate. (Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

DC.Name: Shintao: Jade Strike
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that is anathema to tainted creatures, that increases their physical damage vulnerability by 10% and reduces their fortification by 25%. A successful Will save negates this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Dismissing Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that attempts to force an extraplanar enemy back to its proper plane. A successful Will save negates this effect (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your monk level). (Activation Cost: 25 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

DC.Name: Shintao: Dismissing Strike
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that attempts to force an extraplanar enemy back to its proper plane. A successful Will save negates this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Ability I

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: The Receptive Earth

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Tomb of Jade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform an attack that encases a tainted target in a tomb of jade on a failed Will save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + monk level + stun bonuses). Extraplanar Aberrations or Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid this fate. (Activation Cost: 25 Ki. Cooldown: 1 minute)

DC.Name: Shintao: Tomb of Jade
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform an attack that encases a tainted target in a tomb of jade on a failed Will save. Extraplanar Aberrations or Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid this fate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Instinctive Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You take 5%/10%/15% less extra damage when struck while helpless. (Additional damage while helpless varies by difficulty setting from 5% to 25%.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Empty Hand Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are centered and wielding Handwraps, you gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Threat Range and Multiplier.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Kukan-Do
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: You lock gazes with an enemy, stunning them for a short period of time on a failed Will save (DC 10 + Wisdom modifier + Monk level). Any effects that modify your Stunning Blow or Stunning Fist DC's also affect this ability. Sightless creatures are unaffected by this ability. (Activation Cost: 25 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds)

DC.Name: Shintao: Kukan-Do
DC.Description: Ki Activate: You lock gazes with an enemy, stunning them for a short period of time on a failed Will save. Any effects that modify your Stunning Blow or Stunning Fist DC's also affect this ability. Sightless creatures are unaffected by this ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Violence Begets Violence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Earth Stance is active, when an opponent misses you in melee, you gain +1 critical threat range for 6 seconds. This stacks up to 5 times and is reset if you critically hit. Minor bug: The in-game description states that this effect only takes place while Earth Stance is active. It has been tested to work in Ocean Stance, and presumably also works in the other stances.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Meditation of War
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Air Stance: +2 to hit +10% bonus to off-hand attack chance You take 10% more physical and elemental damage. Fire Stance: +2 bonus to damage and to the DC's of your Stun, Sunder, and Trip abilities -5 Armor Class Earth Stance: +10 to Physical Resistance +3% to Maximum Hit Points -5% Dodge Cap. Water Stance: +5 Maximum Dodge Bonus You deal 10% less damage with attacks. Note: Mutually exclusive with Stalwart stance and Sacred stance.

Stance.Name: Meditation of War
Stance.Description: Air Stance: +2 to hit +10% bonus to off-hand attack chance You take 10% more physical and elemental damage. Fire Stance: +2 bonus to damage and to the DC's of your Stun, Sunder, and Trip abilities -5 Armor Class Earth Stance: +10 to Physical Resistance +3% to Maximum Hit Points -5% Dodge Cap. Water Stance: +5 Maximum Dodge Bonus You deal 10% less damage with attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Rise of the Phoenix
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate While Dead: The spirit of a phoenix burns within you. You may bring yourself back from death's door, as if affected by the Resurrection spell. This ability may only be used once per rest. (Cooldown: 15 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Slayer of Evil I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to hit evil and undead creatures. Your attacks deal 1d4 additional Light damage. You resist evil influences particularly well, gaining a +2 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures. All Light damage from core abilities scale with 100% Melee Power. Note: The light damage procs on both weapons when two weapon fighting and all glancing blows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Courage of Heaven
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura of Courage grants an additional +2 Sacred bonus to saves against Fear and now also grants a +2 Sacred bonus to saves against Enchantment. You gain +1 to hit for all attacks. Your attacks now deal 1d8 additional Light damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Slayer of Evil II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You now gain +2 to hit evil and undead creatures. Your attacks now deal 2d6 additional Light damage. All your attacks are considered to be Ghost Touch. You resist evil influences particularly well, gaining a +3 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Improved Courage of Heaven
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Increases the Aura bonuses granted by Courage of Heaven by an additional +2. You now gain +2 to hit for all attacks. Your attacks now deal 3d6 additional Light damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Slayer of Evil III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You now gain +3 to hit evil and undead creatures. Your attacks now deal 5d6 additional Light damage. You resist evil influences particularly well, gaining a +4 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures. Your vorpal hits against undead do an additional 500 damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Champion of Good
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +4 Charisma and 10 Melee Power. The bonuses granted by Courage of Heaven are increased by an additional +2. Your attacks now deal 7d6 additional Light damage. Any weapon you wield is considered Good aligned for purposes of bypassing damage reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Extra Turning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1/2/3 use of Turn Undead per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Divine Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Turn Undead ability now also deals 6d6/12d6/18d6 light damage to nearby undead. Scales with 200% Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Extra Remove Disease
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2/4/6 Remove Disease uses per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Extra Smite
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 2/4 additional use of Smite Evil per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Attack Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +4/6/+8 Action Boost to hit for 20 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Improved Turning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You count as 1/2/3 level higher when turning undead and add 2/4/6 to the number of hit dice turned.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Divine Might
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: You gain an Insight bonus to Strength equal to your Charisma modifier for 30/60/120 seconds. (Activation Cost: 1 use of Turn Undead. Cooldown: 20 seconds)

Stance.Name: Divine Might
Stance.Description: You gain an Insight bonus to Strength equal to your Charisma Modifier for 30/60/120 seconds. (Activation Cost: 21/18/15 spell points. Cooldown: 20 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Rally
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: Remove fear from nearby allies. You and the affected allies gain a +2/+4/+6 Morale Bonus to Will Saves vs. Fear effects and a +1/+2/+3 Morale Bonus to Attack and Damage for 60 seconds. (Coodown: 3 miniutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Exalted Cleave
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Make a sweeping weapon attack against all nearby enemies for +1/+2/+3[W] damage. Shares its cooldown with the Cleave feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Melee/Ranged Power Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +10/+20/+30 Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged Power for 20 Seconds. (Cooldown: 30 Seconds)

Stance.Name: Power Boost
Stance.Description: Activate to gain a +10/+20/+30 Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged Power for 20 Seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Improved Restoration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Paladin Remove Disease ability now also appiles a Lesser Restoration/Restoration/Greater Restoration effect to your target.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Divine Sacrifice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Giving up some of your life force to win the battle, you empower your next blow against your foe. This attack deals an additional (5/7/9)d6 Light damage and increases the critical multiplier of your weapon by 1 against evil opponents, but costs you 5 hp and 1 sp, whether or not the attack is successful. Light damage scales with 100% Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Vigor of Life I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Positive Healing Amplification is increased by 20%, and you take 10% less damage from Negative Energy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Exalted Smite
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active: An improved smite that adds +1/+1/+2 to your weapon's critical damage multiplier and 0/+1/+2 to your weapon's critical threat range.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Censure Demons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain On Vorpal: Stun Chaotic Evil outsiders for 3 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Passion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Divine Sacrifice ability gains: On Damage: Gain 5/10/15 temporary spell points if you strike an undead or evil outsider with this attack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Vigor of Life II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Positive Healing Amplification -10% less damage from Negative Energy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Empowered Smite
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active: Your Smite Evil and Exalted Smite abilities increases Melee Power by 5 for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Censure Outsiders
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Censure Demons ability now applies to all Chaotic or Evil outsiders. You also gain 5 Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Holy Retribution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Channel Divinity: Executes 3 powerful holy strikes against all targets around you (same AoE as Cleave) that deals +1/+3/+5[W] damage. On Damage: Evil creatures with less than 1,000 HP have a 50%/75%/100% chance to be forced to make a Will save (DC 10 + Paladin Level + Charisma Mod) or be destroyed. On a successful save, the affected creatures take 100 holy damage from this attack as well as -6 to all ability scores for ten seconds. (Cooldown: 6 seconds) This ability also recharges one Smite Evil.

DC.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Holy Retribution
DC.Description: Melee Channel Divinity: Executes 3 powerful holy strikes against all targets around you (same AoE as Cleave) that deals +1/+3/+5[W] damage. On Damage: Evil creatures with less than 1,000 HP have a 50%/75%/100% chance to be forced to make a Will save or be destroyed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Vigor of Life III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 Positive Healing Amplification -10% less damage from Negative Energy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Avenging Cleave
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Make a sweeping weapon attack against all nearby enemies for +1/+3/+5[W] damage. Damaged enemies gains one stack of Vulnerability. Shares its cooldown with the Great Cleave feat. Vulnerability: You take 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Sealed Life
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are immune to Energy Drain.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Holy Bastion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 Hit Point and 1 Positive Energy Spell Power for each action point you spend in this tree. Each Sacred Defender Core Ability you possess grants +2% Fortification.

Sacred Defender: Positive spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Divine Righteousness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: You gain temporary hit points equal your Charisma score and a 200% Sacred bonus to threat generation for 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Redemption
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The following spells are added to the Paladin spell list: Level 2: Raise Dead Level 3: Resurrection Level 4: True Resurrection Passive: You gain +5 to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Glorious Stand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: For a short duration you gain DR 20/Epic, take reduced damage from elemental and negative energy, receive double healing from positive energy, and are immune to secondary effects of attacks such as 'wounding' or 'vorpal'. Passive: You gain +5 to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Eternal Defender
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain +2 Charisma, +2 Constitution, + 10 to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating and your range of unconsciousness extends by 40 hitpoints. Toggle: While Eternal Defender is active, if you drop below 0 hit points but are not killed, two uses of Turn Undead are immediately expended and you receive a reactive heal for 250 points of Positive Energy healing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a [25/50/75]% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Extra Lay on Hands
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Lay on Hands use per rest.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Resilient Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain a +[1/2/3] Sacred bonus to all Saving Throws.
