EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Saves Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[2/4/6] Action Boost bonus to all saving throws for 20 seconds. While under this effect you do not automatically fail saving throws on a roll of a natural 1. (Cooldown: 30 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Defense Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[5/10/15] Action Boost bonus to Armor Class, Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Resistance Aura

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +3 Melee Power, Ranged Power, Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating. You gain +2 to Spot and Listen.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Master Falconer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to all ability scores and benefit from the spell Freedom of Movement. Your active Falcon attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown on Death From Above.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Rugged
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +2/4/6 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Practiced Accuracy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1/2 to hit with weapons and +1/2 to confirm critical attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Hunter's Knowledge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Animals as a favored enemy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Out in Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +5/10/15 to Healing Amplification

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Wanderlust
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1/2/3 bonus to Balance, Jump and Swim. Rank 3: You gain +1 to Fortitude saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Killer Instinct I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Wisdom modifier to hit with Melee and Missile weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Watch the Center
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants a +1/2/3 bonus to Assassinate DC's.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Diving Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Choose between a Melee and Ranged attack. You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +1/2/3[W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Trip DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Diving Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +1[W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Trip DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Diving Shot
DC.Description: Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +1[W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless.

Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Trip DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also trips the target, causing them to become Helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Meticulous Weaponry
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Protect your items or increase your chance of recovering ammunition.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Meticulous Fletching
EnhancementSelection.Description: You are skilled at enhancing, salvaging, and re-purposing your arrows, bolts and throwing weapons. Your ammunition gains a 50/65/80% chance of returning.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Meticulous Weaponry
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have a 25/50/75% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Action Boost: Sprint
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: 30/35/45% Action Boost bonus to movement speed for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Killer Instinct II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Wisdom modifier for damage with Melee and Missile weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Tear Flesh
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your bird attacks now also cause a bleed effect. Bleed: Do 1d6 damage every 2 seconds for 60 seconds. This stacks up to 10 times and scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Strike for the Eyes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a melee or ranged attack that will cause your bird to strike the target for damage, blind them and make them helpless.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shoot for the Eyes
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +1/2/3[W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3/6/10d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Shoot for the Eyes
DC.Description: Ranged Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +1/2/3[W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional /6/10 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strike for the Eyes
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Melee Falconer Attack: You and your Hunting Bird attack as one against a single target. Activate this ability to attack for +1[W] against a single target. Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless. Your target is slowed by 30% for 10 seconds whether they make the saving throw or not.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

Your Hunting Bird will follow up for an additional 3d6 damage that scales with 200% of melee or ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to Blind the target, causing them to become Helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Conditioning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5% to your hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Eyes of the Eagle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain True Seeing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Deadly Instinct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for 30/60/120 seconds. 5 Charges per rest. Each attack from your Hunting Bird has a chance to reset 1 charge.
Antirequisite: This ability can not be trained if you have any other Trance abilities.

Stance.Name: Deadly Instinct
Stance.Description: Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for 30/60/120 seconds. 5 Charges per rest. Each attack from your Hunting Bird has a chance to reset 1 charge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: No Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You deal +10/20/30% additional damage to helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Coordinated Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a melee or ranged attacks that will cause your bird to rain attacks over an area, damaging and blinding all foes in the area.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Coordinated Cleave
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Melee Falconer Cleave Attack: You cleave all opponents near you for +2[W], as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Coordinated Cleave
DC.Description: Melee Falconer Cleave Attack: You cleave all opponents near you for +2[W], as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shoot and Destroy
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Ranged Falconer Cleave Attack: You cleave all opponents near you for +2[W], as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck.
Blind DC: 10 + Character Level + Wisdom Modifier + Assassinate bonuses.

DC.Name: Falconry: Shoot and Destroy
DC.Description: Ranged Falconer Cleave Attack: You cleave all opponents near you for +2[W], as your Hunting Bird descends to frenzy in a large area for an additional 10d6 damage that scales with Melee and Ranged power, whichever is higher. Your Hunting Bird also attempts to blind each opponent struck.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Expose Weakness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Attacks from your Hunting Bird also reduce your target's fortification by 50%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Shared Vision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are immune to Blindness effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Dangerous
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +10 Melee and Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Death From Above
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and Ranged attack that will cause your bird to attempt to slay your foes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Death From Above
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life. You make an attack for +1/3/5[W], and your Hunting Bird also attacks for 10/100/200 points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies. DC: 10 + Character level + Wisdom bonus + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown one minute, with a 4.5 second shared cooldown with other Hunting Bird attacks. Choose One: Death from Above Shot (Ranged Falconer Attack) or Death from Above: (Melee Falconer Attack).

DC.Name: Falconry: Death From Above
DC.Description: Melee Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life. You make an attack for +1/3/5[W], and your Hunting Bird also attacks for 10/100/200 points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Death From Above Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life. You make an attack for +1/3/5[W], and your Hunting Bird also attacks for 10/100/200 points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies. DC: 10 + Character level + Wisdom bonus + Assassinate bonuses. Cooldown one minute, with a 4.5 second shared cooldown with other Hunting Bird attacks. Choose One: Death from Above Shot (Ranged Falconer Attack) or Death from Above: (Melee Falconer Attack).

DC.Name: Falconry: Death From Above Shot
DC.Description: Ranged Falconer Attack: Your Hunting Bird swoops down and attempts to end someone's life. You make an attack for +1/3/5[W], and your Hunting Bird also attacks for 10/100/200 points of damage that scales with 200% of Melee or Ranged Power, whichever is higher. The target struck makes a Fortitude Saving Throw, and on a failed save, dies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Thrill of the Hunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee and Ranged attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thrill of the Hunt
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Falconer Attack: You strike your target for +1/3/5[W]. If you hit, you also heal for 5/10/20% of your total hit points in Positive Healing. Cooldown: 30 Seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thrill of the Hunt Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Falconer Attack: You strike your target for +1/3/5[W]. If you hit, you also heal for 5/10/20% of your total hit points in Positive Healing. Cooldown: 30 Seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Falconry: Mark the Prey
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a melee or ranged attack that causes your bird to strike the target and mark them, making them more vulnerable to damage for a short period of time.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mark the Prey
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: You have learned how to spot weaknesses in even the mightiest of foes. You make an attack for +5[W], marking it as prey. The marked target takes 10% extra damage from you and your allies for 10 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mark the Prey Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: You have learned how to spot weaknesses in even the mightiest of foes. You make an attack for +5[W], marking it as prey. The marked target takes 10% extra damage from you and your allies for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Enchant your weapon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose how you would like to enchant your weapon: +1 and Improved deception +10 universal spell power +3 to hit and damage, +2 vs evil, weapon bypasses Good damage reduction

EnhancementSelection.Name: Harper Enchantment of Deception
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapon gains an additional +1 to its Enhancement bonus and Improved Deception.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Harper Enchantment of Magic
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapon gains a +10 Harper bonus to Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Harper Enchantment of Righteousness
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapon gains stacking +3 Enhancement bonus to attack and damage, an additional +2 to attack bonus and damage against evil creatures, and your weapon is considered Good-aligned.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Versatile Adept IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: [+2/+4/+6] Melee Power, Ranged Power, and Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Magic of Patience
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your spells benefit from the Extend Spell metamagic feat. This does not increase their Spell Point cost. (This does not stack with the actual Extend metamagic feat.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Harper Agent: Moment of Clarity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: For the next 10 seconds the DC of your spells and your tactical feats is increased by +10. Cooldown: 5 minutes. Passive: +1 DC for your spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Inquisitive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack with all weapons. +1 to Diplomacy, Intimidate and Bluff

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Hit the Streets
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain an additional copy of Diplomacy on a separate cooldown timer. This timer is shared with Half-Elven Social Grace's Diplomacy. Diplomacy allows you to attempt to encourage enemies to find targets other than yourself.
Passive: +2% Dodge, +3 Diplomacy skill. If you are a Half-Elf, this Diplomacy bonus is instead +10. Cooldown: 1 Minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Mind Like Iron
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to Will Saving Throws. You no longer automatically fail Saving Throws for Fear, Enchantment or Illusion effects on a Natutal 1. You will automatically perform a Search check to locate traps and secret doors when you are in range to Spot them, although this Search check operates at a -4 penalty. In addition, you gain +2 Damage dice with Law on you Side.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: True Seeing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You permanently gain the effects of the True Seeing spell. You gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range and Multiplier with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows. In addition, you gain +2 Damage dice with Law on your Side.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Undaunted
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Ranged Power, +3 to all Saving Throws, +4 to the Max Dex Bonus of equipped armor. You gain the Slippery Mind feat (you can wriggle free from magical effects that would otherwise control or compel you. You gain a second saving throw versus enchantments). In addition, you gain +2 Damage dice with Law on your Side.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Master Inquisitive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to all Ability Scores. +10 Ranged Power. While wielding a Light or Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow, your Vorpal hits will knock down targets hit on a natural 20 + confirmation for 6 seconds without a saving throw, as a Great Crossbow. In addition, you gain +3 Damage dice with Law on your Side.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Dual Shooter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you have a Light or Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow equipped, you instead fight with a Hand Crossbow in each hand, with each mimicking the damage and effects of your equipped Crossbow. +1 to Attack and Damage with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Eye for Accuracy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 to Attack with weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Conjure Bolts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Conjures a stack of 1000 bolts for use with a crossbow. These bolts have a +1 enhancement bonus. These bolts dissolve into nothingness after logout. Spell Point Cost: 30/20/10

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Law on your side
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Your Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow attacks deal 1d8 Law damage on hit to non-Lawful creatures, scaling with 200% Ranged Power. Lawful creatures take 1d4 Law damage, scaling with 200% Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Inquisitive Skills
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 to Diplomacy, Intimidate and Bluff. Rank 3: +1 to Will Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Crossbow Adept
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and +2 to Damage with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25/50/75% damage and healing of your wands, scrolls and other items that cast spells. Adds +1/2/3 to the save DC's of your offensive wands. Taking Wand and Scroll Mastery in one enhancement tree will block its availability in other enhancement trees.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Observation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you use Diplomacy on an enemy, you gain one stack of Observation (+2 to Armor Class, +2 to PRR, +2 to MRR). Each stack lasts 12 seconds before being removed. This stacks up to 5 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Improved Law
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 Damage dice with Law on your Side.

When you use Diplomacy on an enemy while this is active, you gain a stack of Preparation (+2% Dodge that ignores Dodge Cap). Each stack of Preparation lasts 12 seconds, and acquiring a new stack rests the duration. Preparation can stack up to 5 times. Cooldown: 2 Minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Inquisition Style
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: How do you interrogate?

EnhancementSelection.Name: Arcane Inquisition
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +15 Universal Spell Power while you have a Light or Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow equipped.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dashing Inquisition
EnhancementSelection.Description: You can Swashbuckle while wielding a Light (non-repeating) Crossbow.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Inquisition
EnhancementSelection.Description: You count Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows as Favored Weapons, regardless of your Deity.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Martial Inquisition
EnhancementSelection.Description: +5% Doubleshot with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Greater Law
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 Damage dice with Law on your Side.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Ability Score II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an Ability Score.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: No Holds Barred
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: You may activate this ability to enchant your Light of Heavy (non-repeating) crossbow to instantly reload itself for 18 seconds. This shares charges and a cooldown with Endless Fusilade. If you also have Endless Fusilade, you gain +10 Ranged Power while No Holds Barred is active. Passive: +5 Ranged Power, +10% Doubleshot. Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Arresting Assault
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate Ability: All nearby enemies take -10 Melee, Ranged, and Spell Power for 20 seconds and 5 stacks of Vulnerability. In addition, nearby enemies must save (DC Diplomacy + d20 vs. Will) or be subjected to a 10-second Daze. (Bosses are immune to Daze, but not the Power reduction or Vulnerability). Daze is removed on hit. Cooldown: 1 minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Improved Uncanny Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants the Improved Uncanny Dodge feat. Activate this ability to gain a temporary 50% Dodge bonus and a +6 reflex save bonus. This feat also grants you a 1% passive bonus to Dodge at levels 4, 6, 8, 12, 16 and 20.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Inquisitor's Path
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Which path will you follow?

EnhancementSelection.Name: Jaded
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your damage dice with Law on your Side are now d8s for all enemies, regardless of alignment. +10 Ranged Power, +30% Alacrity with non-Repeating Crossbows

EnhancementSelection.Name: Optimistic
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Damage Dice with Law on your Side. +10 Ranged Power, +30% Alacrity with non-Repeating Crossbows

EnhancementSelection.Name: Vigilante
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Damage Dice with Law on your Side. Damage from Law on your Side is now Chaos damage, with non-Chaotic creatures taking d8s of damage, and Chaotic creatures taking d4s of damage. +10 Ranged Power, +30% Alacrity with non-Repeating Crossbows

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Diplomatic Immunity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: While active, your attacks with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows have a chance to automatically trigger Diplomacy around you.

Requirement.Feat: Keepers of a Feather Favor Rewards

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Knife Expertise
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to hit and damage with daggers and throwing daggers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Knife Juggler
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5% to speed with throwing daggers. You gain the benefits of the Deflect Arrows feat, knocking aside one incoming projectile that would have struck you every 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Knife Specialist
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Quickdraw as a bonus feat. You gain +5% Doublestrike (main and off hand), and Doubleshot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: One With Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Threat Range and +1 to Critical Damage Multiplier with daggers and throwing daggers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Fortune
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain +10 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating. Activate to gain one random Vistani fortune. Cooldown 60 seconds. Coins: You gain 10% Doublestrike and 10% Doubleshot for 60 seconds. Glyphs: You gain 10 PRR and 20 MRR for 60 seconds. Stars: You gain +2 to all ability scores for 60 seconds. Swords: You gain 15 Melee Power and Ranged Power for 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Knife Master
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to all ability scores. You gain +5% attack speed when using two daggers or throwing knives. You gain 20 Melee Power and 20 Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Knife Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When using a dagger in each hand, you now fight in melee using the Vistani style, with both daggers held point down. You gain +1 to hit and damage with daggers and throwing daggers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Undead Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You resist evil influences particularly well, gaining a +2 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures. Undead are automatically considered as a Favored Enemy for you.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +25% negative energy absorption. You gain +3 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Acrobatic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 Balance, Jump, and Tumble. Rank 3: +1 to Reflex Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Rapid Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain both of the following: Rapid Slash: Requires dagger. Melee Attack: Deals +3[W] damage. You gain a 20% Morale bonus to (main hand) doublestrike for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 10 seconds. Rapid Throw: Requires throwing knife. Missile Attack: Deals +3[W] damage. You gain a 20% Morale bonus to doubleshot for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 10 seconds. This puts Ten Thousand Stars and Manyshot on a 10 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Knife Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with daggers and throwing daggers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Bleeding Cuts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you score a Vorpal hit with a dagger or throwing knife you add a stack of Blood of Vengeance to your opponent. Blood of Vengeance: You deal 1d6 damage per two seconds for 30 seconds. This damage scales with 200% Melee Power. This stacks up to 10 times, with new stacks refreshing the duration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to Will saving throws. You gain +3 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Weapon Versatility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While using daggers and throwing daggers, your melee and missile attacks use the higher of Melee Power or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Haste Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a 10%/20%/30% Action Boost bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Knife Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with daggers and throwing knives.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Fan of Knives
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: On activation: You throw a hail of throwing knives in a cone in front of you. Enemies caught in the cone take 5 to 8 per character level of damage and take 1 stack of Blood of Vengeance. This damage scales with 100% Ranged Power. Cooldown: 15 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are immune to Fear effects. You gain +3 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Deadly Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your daggers and throwing daggers do an additional +1[W] of damage. You are centered when fighting with daggers. (Note: not centered with throwing daggers).

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an ability to increase.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Celerity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5% Doublestrike (main and off hand), and Doubleshot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain immunity to Energy Drain. You gain +3 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Single Dagger
EnhancementSelection.Description: When fighting single weapon style with a dagger: +20 Melee Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Double Daggers
EnhancementSelection.Description: When fighting with a dagger in each hand: +20% stacking chance to make off-hand attacks when dual wielding weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Knife Training V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +3 to hit and damage with daggers and throwing knives.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Whirling Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Requires throwing knife. Missile Attack: +5[W] damage. Your throwing knife gains 100 doubleshot for 15 seconds. Cooldown one minute. (Shares cooldown with 10K Stars.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain +20% Dodge and Maximum Dodge, +30 PRR, and +30 MRR for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

Stance.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker
Stance.Description: Activate to gain +20% Dodge and Maximum Dodge, +30 PRR, and +30 MRR for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Blessed Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain both of the following: Blessed Blades: Requires dagger. Melee attack. +5[W] damage, plus one stack of Blood of Vengeance. Your equipped daggers gain a +10 Enhancement bonus for 10 seconds. They also gain Silver, Good, and Ghost Touch. 10 second cooldown. Blessed Knives: Requires throwing knife. Missile attack. +5[W] damage, plus one stack of Blood of Vengeance. Your throwing knife gains a +10 Enhancement bonus for 10 seconds. It also gains Silver, Good, and Ghost touch. 10 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vendetta
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a unique +1 Critical Threat Range and +1 to Critical damage multiplier to your equipped daggers or throwing knife for 15 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

Stance.Name: Vendetta
Stance.Description: Activate to gain a unique +1 Critical Threat Range and +1 to Critical damage multiplier to your equipped daggers or throwing knife for 15 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Equipped bows gain a +1 Enhancement bonus for each Arcane Archer core ability you possess. (This does not stack with the bow's existing Enhancement bonus.) All bows are treated as Implements in your hands, granting Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Morphic Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: Your arrows deal bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Morphic Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows deal bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Metalline Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: Your arrows bypass all metallic damage reduction. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Metalline Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows bypass all metallic damage reduction

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Aligned Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: Your arrows bypass all alignment based damage reduction. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Aligned Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows bypass all alignment based damage reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Shadow Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: +5% Doubleshot chance with bows. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds. Passive: Equipped bows gains a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier.

Stance.Name: Shadow Arrows
Stance.Description: +5% Doubleshot chance with bows

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Master of Imbuement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +4 Dexterity, +20% Doubleshot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Conjure Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to create a stack of returning +1 arrows. These arrows are destroyed when you log out for an extended period of time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: True strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Perform a ranged attack with +20 to-hit. Rank 2/3: You receive a +2/+4 Insight bonus to hit for 6/12 seconds. Activation cost: 2 spell points. Cooldown: 3 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Energy of the Wild
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +30/+60/+100 maximum spell points. Rank 3: You gain the Magical Training feat. Antirequisite: Cannot take Rank 3 if you already have the Magical Training feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Elemental Arrows I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues. (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 Seconds) Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Elemental Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows are imbued with elemental damage of your choice

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frost Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost ability, dealing 1d8 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shock Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Awareness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Listen, Search, Spot and to-hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Dispelling Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack that deals +1/+2/+3[W] damage and dispels 1/2/3 beneficial effects from your target. (Activation Cost: 5 SP. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Force Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with magical force. Your arrows gain On Hit: 1d4/1d6/1d6+(1d10-3d10 on crit) force damage and the Ghost Touch ability. (Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Gaining additional Elemental Damage dice in the Arcane Archer tree increases Force Arrows dice. This damage also scales with Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Force Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows gain On Hit: 1d4/1d6/1d6 (1d10-3d10 on crit) force damage and the Ghost Touch ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Inferno Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +0/+1/+2[W] damage. On Hit: Target gain 1 stack of Inferno (target takes 1d6 fire damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds. This effect can stack 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.) (Activation cost: 6 SP. Cooldown 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Elemental Arrows II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues (Can't choose the same type again, deal +1 Damage dice with Elemental Arrows), or:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frost Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost ability, dealing 1d8 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shock Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Damage dice with Elemental Arrows (Corrosive, Frost, Shock, Flaming, Force)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select Attack or Energy Resistance boost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +4/6/8 action boost bonus to hit for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Resistance Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +5/+10/+15 action boost bonus to Energy Resistance for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Shattermantle Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +1/+2/+3[W] damage. On hit: Target gains 1/2/3 stack of Reduced Spell Resistance (-1 Spell Resistance. This effect can stack 100 times) on Vorpal Hit: Shattermantle (-100 spell Resistance for 10 seconds. Will DC 10/14/18 + Half Ranger Level + Wisdom Modifier negates.) (Activation Cost: 4 SP. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

DC.Name: Arcane Archer: Shattermantle Shot
DC.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +1/+2/+3[W] damage. On hit: Target gains 1/2/3 stack of Reduced Spell Resistance (-1 Spell Resistance. This effect can stack 100 times) on Vorpal Hit: Shattermantle (-100 spell Resistance for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Terror Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with negative energy. (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) On Hit: Target is feared. (Will save vs. DC: 20 + Wisdom Modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Vorpal: Target is subject to a Phantasmal Killer effect. Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells

DC.Name: Arcane Archer: Terror Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with negative energy. (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) On Hit: Target is feared. On Vorpal: Target is subject to a Phantasmal Killer effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Soul Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every time you strike an enemy with your bow, you have a 15% chance to gain 10 temporary spell points that last for one minute. +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues (Can't choose the same type again), or Elemental Damage. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Banishing Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Banish an extraplanar creature back to their home plane. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell bonuses) On hit: Inflict Pull of Reality (-1 PRR/MRR, stacks up to 25 times. 5 stacks fade away every 3 seconds). Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells Instant kill does not affect bosses.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer: Banishing Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Banish an extraplanar creature back to their home plane.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Paralyzing Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Save: -10% Movement and Attack speed. Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer: Paralyzing Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Smiting Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses). Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells. On Hit: Inflicts Deconstructed (Reduced attack speed, -25% Fortification, -25% healing from Repair) Instant kill does not affect bosses.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer: Smiting Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct.

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Moonbow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wielding a bow, once every 30 seconds you gain 20 temporary spell points for 10 seconds. +10 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Arrow of Slaying
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +250 damage. (This damage can be multiplied by critical hits.) (Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 20 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Final Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The first enemy hit triggers an area attack that inflicts Vulnerability and deals damage. More injured enemies receive increased damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Improved Elemental Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Elemental Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your elemental arrow imbues gain On Critical: 1d10-3d10 elemental damage based on critical multiplier and an additional effect:
Corrosive Arrows: Your arrows gain the Destruction ability. Flaming Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Target gains 1 stack of Burning (Target takes 1d6 fire damage every 2 seconds for 6 second. This effect can stack 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.) Frost Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Target gains 1 stack of Lethargy (You have -1 to all Saving throws. Non-bosses also move and attack 5% slower. This effect stacks up to 5 times.) Shock Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Vulnerable (Target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Damage dice with Elemental Arrows (Corrosive, Frost, Shock, Flaming, Force) Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer: Runebow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Bows you wield gain an additional +2 enhancement bonus. This is considered a Magic Weapon effect. (Does not stack with the spell Enchant Weapons.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Far Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak Attack Die. +10 Positive Spell Power. Your Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range is increased by 5 meters for each Deepwood Stalker Core Ability you possess.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Sneak Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak Attack Die. +10 Positive Spell Power. +1 Use of Wild Empathy. Each Deepwood Stalker Core Ability you acquire after this one also grants +1 use.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Called Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Positive Spell Power. Select a melee or ranged attack that deals extra damage and renders a target vulnerable to sneak attacks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Exposing Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: Performs a melee attack with +2[W], a +4 bonus to-hit, +1 to critical threat range, and +1 to Critical Damage Multiplier. On Damage: The target will become momentarily confused and rendered vulnerable to sneak attacks for four seconds as if affected by the bluff skill. (Cooldown 6 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sniper Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +2[W], a +4 bonus to-hit, +2 to critical threat range, and +2 to Critical Damage Multiplier. On Damage: The target will become momentarily confused and rendered vulnerable to sneak attacks for four seconds as if affected by thebluff skill. (Cooldown 6 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Advanced Sneak Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak Attack Die. +10 Positive Spell Power. You gain a +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with your equipped weapons. (This does not apply to Shields or Unarmed). Your attacks now bypass 10% fortification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Mark of the Hunted
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Expend a use of Wild Empathy. Your currently selected enemy receives -25% Fortification, -10 Armor Class, -10 Spell Resistance, and suffers a -4 penalty to all ability scores for 3 minutes. This effect also works on bosses and Raid bosses. Passive: Your attacks bypass an additional 10% Fortification. You also gain +2 Damage when attacking Favored Enemies. Passive: +10 Positive Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Horizon Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +4 Dexterity and +3 Sneak Attack Dice. You are always considered to be in Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range. +20 Positive Spell Power +20 Melee Power +20 Ranged Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Favored Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2/+4/+6 Armor Class when attacked by Favored Enemies. You gain +1/+2/+3 to Saving Throws against spells or effects from Favored Enemies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Hide and Move silently. Rank 3: You gain +1 additional Sneak Attack Die.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Increased Empathy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Diplomacy and Wild Empathy uses per rest. +4/+8/+12 Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Versatile Empathy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Wild Empathy ability now also pacifies Vermin/Elementals and Vermin. +4/+8 Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Tendon Cut
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: Deals +1/2/3[W] damage. On Sneak Attack: Slow your enemy's movement by 50% for 10 seconds. (Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Survivalist I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 10 hit points. While wearing light armor you gain 3 Physical Resistance Rating. PRR bonus does not apply to cloth or no armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Faster Sneaking
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20%/+35%/+50% movement speed while sneaking.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Empathic Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell-like ability: You may expend a use of Wild Empathy to produce a Lesser Vigor/Mass Lesser Vigor effect. Metamagic: Empower, Empower Heal, Maximize, Quicken, Enlarge, Intensify.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Improved Weapon Finesse
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Dexterity modifier for damage when wielding bows, thrown weapons, and melee weapons with which you can use your Dexterity modifier to hit. The Weapon Finesse feat is NOT required to take this enhancement. Note: Handwraps are Unarmed strikes, not Melee Weapons. Weapon Finesse makes this explicit distinction. Does not apply to crossbows. Applies to Thrown weapons. Applies to Scimitar, if it is considered a light weapon for your character.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select Damage or Skill Boost

EnhancementSelection.Name: Melee/Ranged Power Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +10/+20/+30 Action Boost bonus to Melee/Ranged Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Skill Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +2/+4/+6 Action Boost bonus to all skills for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Survivalist II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain an additional 20 hit points. While wearing Light Armor you gain an additional 4 Physical Resistance Rating. Survivalist I and II are cumulative: +30 HP and +7 PRR for both. PRR bonus does not apply to cloth or no armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Thrill of the Hunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1/2/3 damage for six seconds after damaging an opponent beneath 50% health.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Favored Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1/2/3 to hit and damage when attacking a Favored Enemy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Aimed Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +10 to hit and +1 Critical Damage Multiplier. On Damage: If you are in the Archer's Focus stance and Manyshot is not active, gain three stacks of Archer's Focus. (Cooldown: 10 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Survivalist III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain an additional 30 hit points. While wearing Light Armor you gain an additional 5 Physical Resistance Rating. Survivalist I, II and III are cumulative: +60 HP and +12 PRR for all three. PRR bonus does not apply to cloth or no armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Killer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you kill a target, you gain a 5% Morale bonus to Melee Doublestrike and Extra Shot Chance for 15 seconds. Weak enemies will not always produce this effect. The Killer buff can stack up to 2/3/4 times. Stacks are reduced one at a time. (Repeating Crossbows have a reduced chance to produce Extra Shots.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Merciful Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged attack: Deals +3[W] damage. On Sneak Attack: If the target is below 50% health, deal 500 damage. This damage scales with 100% Ranged Power (Cooldown: 15 seconds.) Taking this enhancement also grants Merciful Strike, a Melee version of the exact same ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Leg Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Attack: +2[W]. On Damage: Slow your enemy's movement by 50% for 10 seconds. (Cooldown: 10 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Heavy Draw
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: While Heavy Draw is active, you deal +5 damage but have -5 to attack rolls with archery and thrown attacks. Effects that modify the attack penalty and bonus of the Power Attack feat also modify this ability (but other effects related to Power Attack do not). This ability has no effect when using a crossbow. Can be used simultaneously with precision and (improved) precise shot stances.

Stance.Name: Heavy Draw
Stance.Description: While Heavy Draw is active, you deal +5 damage but have -5 to attack rolls with archery and thrown attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Strikes Like Lightning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +10% Doublestrike and +20% Doubleshot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Head Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Attack. +5[W] attack that is automatically considered a critical threat. On hit, blinds the opponent for 6 seconds. (Fortitude save negates, 14 + Ranger level + Dexterity Mod + Tactical Feat DCs) Cooldown: 12 seconds. Taking this ability also grants Head Strike, a Melee version of the exact same ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Improved Archer's Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Archer's Focus Stance can now stack up to 25 times instead of 15. Passive: +5 Melee Power and +5 Ranged Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Shield of Whirling Steel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are dual wielding weapons, you gain a +2 Shield bonus to Armor Class, Physical Resistance Rating, and Magical Resistance Rating. This increases by +1 for each additional Tempest Core Ability you acquire.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Tempest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10% stacking chance to make off-hand attacks when dual wielding weapons. You now treat Scimitars as if they were light melee weapons. While you are dual wielding, you can use your dexterity modifier to hit with light melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Graceful Death
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are dual wielding weapons, you can use your Dexterity modifier for damage with light melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Deflect Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the benefits of the Deflect Arrows feat while dual wielding, knocking aside one incoming projectile that would have struck you every 6 seconds. +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier while dual wielding weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Whirlwind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5% Melee Doublestrike when dual wielding, +5% Incorporeality (stacking), +10% stacking chance to make off-hand attacks when dual wielding.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Dervish
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +4 Dexterity. +25% chance to doublestrike with your off-hand while dual wielding. While wearing light or no armor: +10 Melee Power, Physical Resistance Rating, and Magical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a 25%/50%/75% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Improved Reaction
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 Reflex saves and an additional +1/2/3 saves against traps.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Improved Defence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Shield of Whirling Steel Grants +1/2/3 additional Armor Class, Physical Resistance and Magical Resistance. If you possess Deflect Arrows it can trigger once every 4/3/2 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Whirling Blades I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage while dual wielding.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Acrobatic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 Balance, Jump, and Tumble. Rank 3: +1 to Reflex Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Improved Parry
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +3/+6/+10 Physical Resistance Rating when dual wielding.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Improved Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1%/+2%/+3% dodge when wearing light or no armor. Does not stack with Kensei improved dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Bleed Them Out
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee attack - Deals +1/+2/+3[W] damage and on successful damage causes your opponent to bleed. The bleed effect can stack up to 5 times. (Cooldown: 6 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Whirling Blades II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage while dual wielding.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Elaborate Parry
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For the next 6/12/18 seconds, you gain Dodge, Maximum Dodge, and Maximum Dexterity Bonus to light armor, equal to your Dexterity Modifier. (Cooldown: 90 seconds).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: The Growing Storm

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Whirling Blades IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage while dual wielding.

EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Evasive Dance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Evasion ability so on a failed Reflex saving throw against an attack that normally deals half damage on a successful save, you only take 85/70/50% damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tempest: Cuts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one:

EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Dual Wielding Attack: Deals +1/3/5[W] damage. You gain +10/20/30 Melee Doublestrike and +10/20/30 Melee Power for 15 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf)
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Equipped bows gain a +1 Enhancement bonus for each Arcane Archer core ability you possess. (This does not stack with the bow's existing Enhancement bonus.) All bows are treated as Implements in your hands, granting Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Morphic Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: Your arrows deal bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Paralyzing Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Save: -10% Movement and Attack speed. Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Paralyzing Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Smiting Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses). Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells. On Hit: Inflicts Deconstructed (Reduced attack speed, -25% Fortification, -25% healing from Repair) Instant kill does not affect bosses.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Smiting Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Elemental Arrows IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues (Can't choose the same type again), or Elemental Damage. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frost Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost ability, dealing 1d8 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shock Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Damage dice with Elemental Arrows (Corrosive, Frost, Shock, Flaming, Force)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Moonbow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wielding a bow, once every 30 seconds you gain 20 temporary spell points for 10 seconds. +10 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Arrow of Slaying
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +250 damage. (This damage can be multiplied by critical hits.) (Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 20 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Final Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The first enemy hit triggers an area attack that inflicts Vulnerability and deals damage. More injured enemies receive increased damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Improved Elemental Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Elemental Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your elemental arrow imbues gain On Critical: 1d10-3d10 elemental damage based on critical multiplier and an additional effect:
Corrosive Arrows: Your arrows gain the Destruction ability. Flaming Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Target gains 1 stack of Burning (Target takes 1d6 fire damage every 2 seconds for 6 second. This effect can stack 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.) Frost Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Target gains 1 stack of Lethargy (You have -1 to all Saving throws. Non-bosses also move and attack 5% slower. This effect stacks up to 5 times.) Shock Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Vulnerable (Target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Damage dice with Elemental Arrows (Corrosive, Frost, Shock, Flaming, Force) Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Runebow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Bows you wield gain an additional +2 enhancement bonus. This is considered a Magic Weapon effect. (Does not stack with the spell Enchant Weapons.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Knife in the Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain proficiency with Kukris. You can also use your Dexterity modifier to hit with Daggers and Kukris

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Dagger in the Back
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can now use your Dexterity for damage with Daggers and Kukris. If you possess the Weapon Finesse feat, this also applies to melee weapons with which you can use your Dexterity modifier to hit. This enhancement does not work with handwraps or unarmed attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Assassin's Trick
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Target opponent loses 25% of their fortification and 25% of their immunity to sneak attacks for 15 seconds. (Cooldown: 6 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Nimbleness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: On Hit: Up to once every 2 seconds, you gain 1% dodge for 6 seconds. This effect can stack up to 10 times. +5 Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Lethality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wearing light or cloth armor you gain +1 to your Critical Damage Multiplier for any one-handed weapon you are wielding. Two Weapon Fighters will get the bonus for both weapons provided they qualify.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Deadly Shadow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 Dexterity and +2 Intelligence. You gain 10 Melee Power and +4 Sneak Attack dice. You gain +4 to Reflex Saving Throws. You gain +2 to the DC of your Assassinate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Poison Strikes I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of three poisonous attacks. These attacks apply an "Assassin's Mark" to an opponent for 10 seconds on hit, enabling Weakening Strikes and Deadly Strikes (see below) to effect that opponent. (Cooldown: 6 seconds):

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heartseeker Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 fort save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Con damage, On vorpal: Heartseeker (-5% hit points, Fort save to negate DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Heartseeker Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Heartseeker

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ice Chill Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 reflex save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Dex damage, On vorpal: Paralysis (Fort DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier negates) 25% chance for additional save when the affected creature is damaged.

DC.Name: Assassin: Ice Chill Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Paralysis

EnhancementSelection.Name: Soulshatter Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 Will save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Wis damage, On Vorpal: Shattermantle (-100 Spell Resistance for 10 seconds; Will save to negate, DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Soulshatter Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On Vorpal: Shattermantle

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Toxin Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Fortitude saves vs. Poisons and to the save DC of your Poison attacks

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Shiv
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: +1/+2/+3[W] damage. On hit: Makes a Bluff check, using your Bluff skill, for one second + .25 seconds per Rogue level. On Sneak Attack: Target also gains a -2 Fortitude Save against Poisons for 20 seconds. (Stacks 5 times.) (Cooldown: 12 seconds) Passive: Reduces the threat of all your attacks by 5/10/15%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Sneak Attack Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing sneak attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Hide and Move Silently. +25/50/75% movement speed while sneaking.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Poison Strikes II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of three poisonous attacks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heartseeker Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 fort save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Con damage, On vorpal: Heartseeker (-5% hit points, Fort save to negate DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Heartseeker Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Heartseeker

EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 reflex save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Dex damage, On vorpal: Paralysis (Fort DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier negates) 25% chance for additional save when the affected creature is damaged.

DC.Name: Assassin: Ice Chill Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Paralysis

EnhancementSelection.Name: Soulshatter Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 Will save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Wis damage, On Vorpal: Shattermantle (-100 Spell Resistance for 10 seconds; Will save to negate, DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Soulshatter Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On Vorpal: Shattermantle

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Venomed Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Poison Stance: On hit: 1d4/1d6/1d8 poison damage with weapon attacks. This damage scales with 200% Melee Power.

Stance.Name: Venomed Blades
Stance.Description: On hit: 1d4/1d6/1d8 poison damage with weapon attacks. This damage scales with 200% Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Bleed Them Out
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: Deal +1/+2/+3[W] damage and on successful damage causes your opponent to bleed. The bleed effect can stack up to 5 times. (Cooldown: 6 seconds) Note: Bleed deals 1d6 damage every 2 seconds for 14 seconds. This damage scales with 200% Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Sneak Attack Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Damage Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a 10/20/30 Action Boost bonus to Melee Power and Ranged Power for 20 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Poison Strikes III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of three poisonous attacks.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heartseeker Poison
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 fort save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Con damage, On vorpal: Heartseeker (-5% hit points, Fort save to negate DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Heartseeker Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On vorpal: Heartseeker

EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 reflex save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Dex damage, On vorpal: Paralysis (Fort DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier negates) 25% chance for additional save when the affected creature is damaged.

EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On damage: -1 Will save (stacks 5 times), On Crit: 1d6 Wis damage, On Vorpal: Shattermantle (-100 Spell Resistance for 10 seconds; Will save to negate, DC 10 + half Rogue level + INT modifier)

DC.Name: Assassin: Soulshatter Poison
DC.Description: Melee Poison Attack: On Vorpal: Shattermantle

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Critical Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 bonus to critical damage and to confirm critical hits.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Shadow Dagger
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Throw a dagger made of solidified shadows at your enemy. Deals 4d8/6d8/8d8 unholy damage and blinds the target (Fort DC 10/14/18 + Rogue Level + the greater of Intelligence or Dexterity bonus + bonuses to Assassinate Negates blindness). This damage scales with 400% Melee Power. (Cooldown: 30/20/10 seconds)

DC.Name: Assassin: Shadow Dagger
DC.Description: Throw a dagger made of solidified shadows at your enemy. Deals 4d8/6d8/8d8 unholy damage and blinds the target.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Sneak Attack Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing sneak attacks

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Execute
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Assassinate attack: +3[W] damage. If the target is below 30% health, deal 500 damage. This damage scales with 400% Melee Power. (Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Killer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you kill a target, gain +5% morale bonus to Doublestrike and Doubleshot for 15 seconds. Weak enemies will not always produce this effect. The killer buff can stack up to 2/3/4 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Weakening Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks reduce the Melee and Ranged Power of opponents by (10 + Rogue Level/2) for 10 seconds if you attack an enemy with an "Assassin's Mark." (Applied by Poison Strikes.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Sneak Attack Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants +1 Sneak Attack die and +1 to hit when performing sneak attacks

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Assassinate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stealth Melee Assassinate Attack: +10 Sneak Attack dice. On Sneak Attack: Kills a target instantly, Fortitude save (10 + Rogue level + the greater of Intelligence or Dexterity bonus + bonuses to Assassinate) negates. (Cooldown: 12 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Measure the Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +6 Melee Power, +2 Dodge, +2 Maximum Dodge, +1 to hit and +1 to the DC's of your Assassinate abilities for every 4/2/1 seconds you remain stealthed. This effect stacks up to five times, and lasts 10 seconds after you come out of stealth.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Deadly Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 damage against enemies with an "Assassin's Mark". (Applied by Poison Strikes.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Knife Specialization
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier with daggers and kukris. Daggers also gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Threat Range.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Assassin: Light Armor Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 1/2/3 to Maximum Dodge. While wearing light armor, gain 2/4/6 to the Maximum Dexterity Bonus of your armor, -2/4/6 armor check penalty, and gain 2/4/6 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Staff Control
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can also use your Dexterity modifier to hit with Quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Stick Fighting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can now use your Dexterity modifier for damage with Quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Tumbler
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can pass through enemies when you tumble. +2 maximum dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Kip Up
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are immune to most knockdown effects and slippery surfaces. +2 to maximum dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Cartwheel Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: After tumbling, you gain a +2 Morale bonus to Strength and Dexterity for 12 seconds. Passively provides: +2 to maximum dodge, and +20% Doublestrike.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Followthrough
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 Strength and Dexterity, +1 to hit and +2 damage with quarterstaves, +5% attack speed with quarterstaves, +2 critical hit damage with all weapons, +2 Balance, Jump, and Tumble, +2 Sneak Attack dice and +2 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks. After tumbling, for 6 seconds your basic attacks with two handed weapons strike two targets per swing instead of one and gain On Vorpal: Your target is knocked down.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Acrobat Staff Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Thief Acrobatics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Balance, Jump, and Tumble, +5%/+10%/+15% attack speed with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Charming
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle, and Intimidate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Sly Flourish
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: +1/2/3[W] with +1/2/3 critical threat range. On Sneak Attack: Intelligent targets also gains a -1 penalty to Balance, Reflex, and Will saves for 20 seconds. (Stacks 5 times.) (Cooldown: 8 seconds) Passively provides: Reduces the threat of all attacks by 5/10/15%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Fast Movement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You run 1% faster for each of your Rogue levels if you are wearing cloth or light armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Acrobat Staff Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and +2 damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Trip Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 to the save DC's of Trip Attacks

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Subtlety
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -20%/-30%/-40% threat generation with melee attacks. (This enhancement cannot be combined with other Subtlety enhancements.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Quick Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Quarterstaff Attack: Deals +1/+2/+3[W] damage. You gain a 5%/15%/25% Morale bonus to melee doublestrike for 10 seconds. (Cooldown: 18/15/12 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Haste Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a 10%/20%/30% Action Boost bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Acrobat Staff Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Improved Glancing Blows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Glancing blows produced by your two-handed weapon attacks get an additional 4%/8%/12% chance of producing secondary weapon effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Shadow Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 to Dodge, and Dexterity. +1/2/3 Maximum Dexterity while wearing light armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Sweeping Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Quarterstaff Trip Cleave Attack: +1/2/3[W] to all nearby enemies and trips them. (Listed DC: Balance DC 10 + Rogue Level + Dexterity Modifier Negates trip). Cooldown: 30/25/20 seconds.

DC.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Sweeping Strikes
DC.Description: Melee Quarterstaff Trip Cleave Attack: +1/2/3[W] to all nearby enemies and trips them.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief Acrobat: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Acrobat Staff Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and +2 damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Improved Defensive Roll
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Defensive Roll now triggers at 30%/40%/50% or below health.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: No Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You deal 10%/20%/30% additional damage to helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Staff Lunge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Quarterstaff Attack: Deals +2/4/6[W] damage as you dive through enemies in a line and to nearby enemies when you finish. (Cooldown: 30/25/20 seconds)
