EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Acrobat Staff Training V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to hit and +3 damage with quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Staff Specialization
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier and Threat Range with Quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Spinning Staff Wall
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain 50 PRR for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds. Passively provides: While wearing cloth or light armor, gain 5% Dodge, 5% maximum dodge, and 5 Maximum Dexterity Bonus with Light Armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Thief-Acrobat: Vault
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Quarterstaff Action: Use your quarterstaff to propel yourself forward at great speed. Requires you to have a quarterstaff equipped. (Cooldown: 15 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Arbalester
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Increases your ranged sneak attack and Point Blank Shot range by 5 meters for every trained Mechanic Core enhancement. You also gain proficiency with great crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Tanglefoot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Activate: Throws a flask of caustic liquid at your enemy, which explodes into a sticky mess. Enemies caught within by the goo puddle take 4d6 acid damage every 2 seconds, Reflex DC (10 + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier) halves, and are slowed, Reflex (DC 10 + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier) negates. This damage scales with 200% Ranged Power. Cooldown: 30 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Tanglefoot
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Activate: Throws a flask of caustic liquid at your enemy, which explodes into a sticky mess. Enemies caught within by the goo puddle take 4d6 acid damage every 2 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Targeting Sights
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can now use your Intelligence modifier for damage modifier with all crossbows and thrown weapons. You also gain proficiency with light repeating crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Improved Detection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can detect traps and search from 50% further away. You also gain proficiency with heavy repeating crossbows. +1 to-hit, +1 damage, and 1 extra Sneak Attack die with bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Expert Builder
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Critical Multiplier for bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. Great Crossbows instead gain +2 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier. Cooldowns of Alchemical Trap attacks are reduced by 20%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: HipFlask
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +2 Dexterity and Intelligence, +1 to hit with all crossbows, +1 damage with all repeating crossbows, +2 damage with non-repeating crossbows, +2 Sneak Attack dice and +2 to hit when performing Sneak Attacks Action Boost: You drink a potion that you've been saving for a special occasion. Heals you for 10d3+30 (scales with 200% Ranged Power) and adds +10 to Dodge and Maximum Dodge for 10 seconds. For the next 60 seconds, you gain +1d6 to all ability scores, and +2d6 to attack and damage. (Cooldown: 3 minutes) "A little something of your own creation. Potent stuff, drink sparingly."

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. Non-repeating crossbows increase the damage to +2 and +1 SA dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Lacerating Shots
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have upgraded your Great Crossbow to shoot more forcefully that its construction would normally allow. Your Great Crossbow attacks have a 33%/66%/100% chance of putting a stack of Bleed on enemies. The bleed effect can stack up to 5 times. Note: Bleed deals 1d6 damage every 2 seconds for 14 seconds. This damage scales with 200% Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Thunderstone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Throws an alchemical charge at your enemy. Deals 4d6/6d6/8d6 damage and dazes in area. Fort DC (12/16/20 + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier) Negates daze. The damage scales with 200% Ranged Power Cooldown: 12 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Thunderstone
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Throws an alchemical charge at your enemy. Deals 4d6/6d6/8d6 damage and dazes in area. The damage scales with 200% Ranged Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Mechanics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Disable Device, Open Lock, and Repair. +1/+2/+3 to Saving Throws you make against traps.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Awareness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Listen, Search, and Spot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. Non-repeating crossbows increase the damage to +2 and +1 SA dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Improved Traps
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 to the save DC's of Alchemical Trap Attacks and Magical Traps. Elemental Traps that you place now have a DC equal to 65%/80%/100% of your Disable Device Skill instead of 50%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25%/+50%/+75% damage and healing of your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells. Adds +1/+2/+3 to the save DC's of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Skill Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +2/+4/+6 Action Boost bonus to all skills for 20 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to-hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. Non-repeating crossbows increase the damage to +2 and +1 SA dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Wrack Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one (Cooldown: 12/8/4 seconds):

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wracking Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Melee Attack: +1[W]. On Damage: Deals 3d6/6d6/9d6 extra damage (scales with 200% Melee Power) to constructs and living constructs, and -25% fortification and immunity to sneak attack for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wracking Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ranged Attack: +1[W]. On Damage: Deals 3d6/6d6/9d6 extra damage (scales with 200% Melee Power) to constructs and living constructs, and -25% fortification and immunity to sneak attack for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Ooze Flask
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: You throw a flask at your enemy that contains concentrated grey ooze secretions. Deals 4d8/8d8/12d8 acid damage (scales with 200% Melee Power), no save, and reduces the Armor Class and PRR of your opponent by 2/4/8 for 30 seconds, Fort DC 10 + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier) negates. Cooldown: 12 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Ooze Flask
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: You throw a flask at your enemy that contains concentrated grey ooze secretions. Deals 4d8/8d8/12d8 acid damage (scales with 200% Melee Power), no save, and reduces the Armor Class and PRR of your opponent by 2/4/8 for 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Use Magical Device
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Use Magic Device

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to-hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. Non-repeating crossbows increase the damage to +2 and +1 SA dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Disable Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Target construct or living construct is dazed for 10/20/30 seconds. This effect is removed on damage. Using this ability on a target already affected by it will extend the duration. (Cooldown: 25 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Fletching
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are skilled at enhancing, salvaging, and re-purposing your arrows, bolts, and throwing weapons. +3/6/10 Ranged Power and your ammunition gains a 50/65/80% chance of returning.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Leg Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Attack: +2[W]. On Damage: Slow your enemy's movement by 50% for 10 seconds. (Cooldown: 10 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sharpshooter V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to-hit and damage with all bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. +3 additional damage with all non-repeating crossbows and +1 SA dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Rapid Fire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3%/6%/10% Doubleshot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Time Bomb
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Quickly creates an alchemical charge at your feet. Deals 10/25/50 sonic and 10/25/50 fire damage per rogue level to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds, and knocks them to the ground. Reflex (DC [10/14/18] + Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier + Trap Bonus) for half damage. Balance DC (Disable Device check) (Listed Balance DC (10 + Half Rogue Level + Intelligence Modifier + Trap Bonus) to Negate knockdown. Cooldown: 20 seconds. Spell Resistance: No

DC.Name: Mechanic: Time Bomb
DC.Description: Alchemical Trap Attack: Quickly creates an alchemical charge at your feet. Deals 10/25/50 sonic and 10/25/50 fire damage per rogue level to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds, and knocks them to the ground.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Sniper
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 1 extra Sneak Attack die with bows, crossbows, and thrown weapons. Non-repeating crossbows increase this to 3 Sneak Attack dice and also gain +2[W]. Great Crossbows now vorpal on a 19-20.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Mechanic: Mechanical Reloader
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Ranged Power, +10% Ranged Alacrity with repeating crossbows and thrown weapons. +30% Ranged Alacrity with non-repeating crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Cleave Attack: Sheathe your weapon in eldritch energies, striking foes in front of you for +1[W] damage. If this attack hits, your weapon also releases a blast of magical energy, dealing an additional 1 to 2 Force Damage per character level to all nearby foes. This additional Force damage is affected by your Force Spell Power. Cooldown: 12 seconds Passive: You gain proficiency with Simple Weapons. Every Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants +10 Maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Spellsword
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain four elemental toggles that each imbue your weapon with elemental power. Only one may be active at a time, causing them to deal an additional 1d6 (element) damage on hit. You gain an additional 1d6 every 3 Sorcerer levels (at 6, 9, 12, 15 and 18). This damage scales with Spell Power. While active, your Eldritch Strike deals 1-2 additional (element) damage per Character Level which scales with Spell Power. Passive: +2% Doublestrike, +10 Universal Spell Power. You also gain proficiency in Light Armor and Martial weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Imbue the Blade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee weapons are considered Spellcasting Implements in your hands. You gain the Quick Draw feat, reducing the time between spellcasting and weapon use. -15% Arcane Spell Failure from equipped Armor, Shields, and Warforged Body feats. +2% Doublestrike, +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Subtle Force I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the benefits of the Deflect Arrows feat, knocking aside one incoming projectile that would have struck you every 6 seconds. Your Spellsword dice are now D8s instead of the original d6s -20% Arcane Spell Failure from equipped Armor, Shields, and Warforged Body feats. +6 Resistance to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire and Sonic damage. +2% Doublestrike and +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Subtle Force II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5% Stacking Incorpreality. Your Deflect Arrows now triggers every 2 seconds. Your Spellsword Dice are now d10s (Replacing previous d8s). +2% Doublestrike. +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Blade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Eldritch Strike now grants you a Power Charge. When you have 5 Power Charges, they are removed, and you gain Eldritch Power. Eldritch Power: +10% to your damage with weapon attacks, +4 Spellsword Dice, +25 Universal spellpower. Duration: 30 seconds. Passive: Your Spellsword die size is now d12 +1 Spellsword die +2 Charisma, +2 Constitution +2% Doublestrike +10 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Mage Armor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Mage Armor. You gain Mage Armor as a spell-like ability. In addition, while you are under the effect of the Mage Armor spell, you gain a +3%/+6%/+10% exceptional bonus to your total Armor Class. Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Arcane Siphon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: +1/2/3[W]: On Hit: Gain +10/20/30 Competence bonus to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a 25%/50%/75% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Toughness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5/+10/+15 maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Battlemage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration, Intimidate, and Spellcraft.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Shield You gain the Shield spell as a spell-like ability. In addition, while you are under the effect of the Shield spell, you gain +3/+6/+10 Physical Resistance Rating. Shield: +4 Shield bonus to Armor Class and Immunity to Magic Missiles. Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Mystic Wards
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3/6/10 Magical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Action Boost Spellpower
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +10/20/30 Action Boost bonus to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Shield Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency with all shields except Tower Shields, and your Arcane Spell Failure chance from equipped shields is reduced by 5%. This enhancement does not count as a prerequisite for Feats which require shield proficiency.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25%/+50%/+75% effectiveness from your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +1/+2/+3 to the save DC of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Arcane Barrier
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: When your HP drop below 50% of maximum, you are immediately protected by an Arcane Barrier that reduces all incoming damage by 25% for the next 20 seconds. This effect may only trigger once every 90 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Accuracy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You get Charisma to hit with weapons and shield bashes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Synergetic Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you activate Action Boost: Spell Power, you also gain an equal Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Critical Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 to confirm critical hits and critical hit damage (before weapon multipliers)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Dexterity or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Knight's Transformation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Toggle: While this is turned on, all your spells and SLAs that are affected by Metamagics have their range reduced to touch range. You gain +30 Universal Spell Power and +3% Spell Critical Damage. Your Base Attack Bonus equals your Character Level. You gain +5 to hit with Melee Weapons and 3% Doublestrike.
Exclusive from the Enlarge Metamagic and any Eldritch Blast shape stance. This stance works with other offensive and defensive stances, as well as Rages.

Stance.Name: Knight's Transformation
Stance.Description: While this is turned on, all your spells and SLAs that are affected by Metamagics have their range reduced to touch range. You cannot enable the Enlarge Metamagic while this is active. You gain +30 Universal Spell Power and +3% Spell Critical Damage. Your Base Attack Bonus equals your Character Level. You gain +5 to it with Melee Weapons and 3% Doublestrike.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Offhand Defenses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick between Shield and Orb bonuses.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Orb Saves
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/2/3 to saving throws and +3/6/10 Universal Spell Power while holding an Orb

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shield Striking
EnhancementSelection.Description: On Hit: +5/10/15% chance to proc an immediate Shield Bash attack with an equipped shield.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Force's Point
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you cast an offensive spell, you gain a stack of Force's Point: Martial (+1 to Hit and Damage). This stacks up to 5 times. When you hit with a melee weapon, you gain a stack of Force's Point: Magical (+2 Universal Spell Power). This stacks up to 10 times. Stacks last 12 seconds each. You may only gain each effect once per second.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Armored Arcana
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency in Medium Armor, and you no longer suffer Arcane Spell Failure from Light Armor, Medium Armor or Mithral Body.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Dexterity or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Knight's Transformation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier with Melee Weapons, +3 Damage and the Mobile Spellcasting feat, allowing yout to cast while moving at full speed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Knight's Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a focus for your spells while in Knight's Transformation

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knight's Controller
EnhancementSelection.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain: +2 Enchantment DCs, +2 Illusion DCs, +4 Spell Penetration and +20 Melee Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knight's Striker
EnhancementSelection.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain: +2 Evocation and Conjuration DCs and +20 Melee power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Force's Edge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you cast an offensive spell, you gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range for 12 seconds. When you make a Melee Attack, you gain +5% Spell Critical Chance for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Radiant Forcefield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Radiant Forcefield Activation Cost: 30 Spell Points. Cooldown: 3 Minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Tempest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Perform a spinning melee attack, dealing weapon damage +5[W] to all nearby enemies and knocking them prone for 1 second. This attack has +10 to Critical Threat Range and +3 to Critical Multiplier. Enemies affected are knocked prone for one second and Slowed by 50% for 6 seconds. If any foes are struck by Eldritch Tempest, your weapon also releases an explosion of magical force, dealing an additional 1d6 Force damage per character level to all nearby enemies. This additional force damage is affected by your spell power. Activation Cost: 25/20/15 Spell points. Cooldown: 60/45/30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every point you spend in the Air Savant enhancement tree provides +0.75 Universal Spell Power. Passive: +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells Selecting this enhancement will prevent you from spending points in the Earth Savant enhancement tree.

Effect.DisplayName: Air Savant: Spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Air Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Greater Air Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Conduction
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: On Electric or Sonic Spell Cast: Your target randomly gains zero, one, or two stacks of Vulnerable (Target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.) +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Light on Your Feet
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Immunity to most knockdown effects +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Elemental Apotheosis: Air
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to transform into an Air Elemental. While in elemental form, you gain +100% fortification. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and so are immune to Repair spells, but can be healed normally by Positive Energy spells. While in Air Elemental form, you also gain an additional +20 Electric and Sonic Spell Power, +2% Electric and Sonic Spell Critical Chance, and a +1 bonus to caster level and max caster level for Air, electrical, and sonic spells, but your water, earth, and fire spells have a -3 penalty to caster level and max caster level. You also gain a +10 racial bonus to electrical resistance, +20 Physical Resistance Rating, +3% dodge chance, and a -10 penalty to acid resistance. While in Elemental Form, your spells also cost an additional 10% Spell Points to cast. You also gain the following passive benefits, even while not in elemental form: +2 Charisma +10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. -10 Acid Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells

Stance.Name: Air Elemental
Stance.Description: While in elemental form, you gain +100% fortification. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and so are immune to Repair spells, but can be healed normally by Positive Energy spells. While in Air Elemental form, you also gain an additional +20 Electric and Sonic Spell Power, +2% Electric and Sonic Spell Critical Chance, and a +1 bonus to caster level and max caster level for Air, electrical, and sonic spells, but your water, earth, and fire spells have a -3 penalty to caster level and max caster level. You also gain a +10 racial bonus to electrical resistance, +20 Physical Resistance Rating, +3% dodge chance, and a -10 penalty to acid resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Shocking Grasp
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Shocking Grasp (Activation Cost: 4/3/2 Spell Points. Cooldown: 12/8/4 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Acrobatic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2/+4/+6 to your Tumble, Jump and Balance skills. Rank 3: In Addition, your chance to Dodge enemy attacks is increased by 1%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: One with the Storm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +3/+6/+10 bonus to your Electricity Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Spell Critical: Electric I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric and Sonic damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Electrocution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast an Electric or Sonic damage spell, you gain +5 to your Electric and Sonic Spell Power for 6 seconds. This stacks up to 1/3/5 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Efficient Metamagic I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of the following Metamagic feats. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Pierce Electric Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric and Sonic damage spells now bypass 5/10/15 points of your target's resistance to those damage types, if any.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Spell Critical: Electric II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric and Sonic damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Alternating Current
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast an Electric or Sonic damage spell, you have a 10%/20%/30% chance to gain 3 Temporary Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Efficient Metamagic II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose another Metamagic feat. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic. (You can't choose the same one you chose at Tier 2)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Spell Penetration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You add +1 to your Caster Level check to overcome an enemy's Spell Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Spell Critical: Electric III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric and Sonic damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Electric Loop
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Electric Loop. (Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell Points. Cooldown: 15/10/5 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Efficient Heighten
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Heighten Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2 fewer Spell Points per heightened level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Feather Fall
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Feather Falling, and may toggle it on or off at will. (Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Spell Critical: Electric IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Electric and Sonic damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Lightning Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Lightning Bolt. (Activation Cost: 12/8/6 Spell Points. Cooldown: 18/12/6 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Awaken Elemental Weakness: Electric
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are able to curse an enemy, increasing Electric damage they take by 15%. (Activation Cost: 5 Spell Points. Cooldown: 20 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Wind Dance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You leap through the air, propelled by a gust of wind. Uses of this ability recharge at a rate of one every 15 seconds in private areas, and 3 seconds in town. (Activation Cost: 10 Spell Points. Cooldown: 3 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Evocation Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have trained extensively in Evocation magic, granting a +1 bonus to your spell DCs of that school.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Air Savant: Elemental Diversification
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Power of Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have extensively practiced with Fire magic, granting an additional +15 Fire Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Power of Force
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have extensively practiced with Force magic, granting an additional +10 Force Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Power of Frost
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have extensively practiced with Cold magic, granting an additional +15 Cold Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every point you spend in the Earth Savant enhancement tree provides +0.75 Universal Spell Power. Passive: +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells. Selecting this enhancement will prevent you from spending points in the Air Savant enhancement tree.

Effect.DisplayName: Earth Savant: Spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Earth Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Greater Earth Affinity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Crumbling
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: On Acid Spell Cast: Your target gains one stack of Armor Destruction +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: One With Stone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Immunity to Petrification +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Earth Savant: Elemental Apotheosis: Earth
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to transform into an Earth Elemental. While in elemental form, you gain +100% fortification. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and so are immune to Repair spells, but can be healed normally by Positive Energy spells. While in Earth Elemental form, you also gain an additional +20 Acid Spell Power, +2% Acid Spell Critical Chance, and a +1 bonus to caster level and max caster level for Acid and Earth spells, but your air, fire, and water spells have a -3 penalty to caster level and max caster level. You also gain a +10 racial bonus to acid resistance, +25 Physical Resistance Rating, and a -10 penalty to electrical resistance. While in Elemental Form, your spells also cost an additional 10% Spell Points to cast. You also gain the following passive benefits, even while not in elemental form: +2 Charisma +10 Acid Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Acid and Earth spells -10 Electric and Sonic Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Electric, Sonic, and Air spells.

Stance.Name: Earth Elemental
Stance.Description: While in elemental form, you gain +100% fortification. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and so are immune to Repair spells, but can be healed normally by Positive Energy spells. While in Earth Elemental form, you also gain an additional +20 Acid Spell Power, +2% Acid Spell Critical Chance, and a +1 bonus to caster level and max caster level for Acid and Earth spells, but your air, fire, and water spells have a -3 penalty to caster level and max caster level. You also gain a +10 racial bonus to acid resistance, +25 Physical Resistance Rating, and a -10 penalty to electrical resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fire Savant

Passive: +10 Fire Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Fire spells -10 Cold Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Cold or Water spells. Selecting this enhancement will prevent you from spending points in the Water Savant enhancement tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: On Fire Spell Cast: Your target gains one stack of Burning (Target takes 1d6 fire damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds. This effect can stack 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.) +10 Fire Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Fire spells +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Fire spells -10 Cold Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Cold or Water spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fire Savant: Elemental Apotheosis: Fire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to transform into a Fire Elemental. While in elemental form, you gain +100% fortification. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and so are immune to Repair spells, but can be healed normally by Positive Energy spells. While in Fire Elemental form, you also gain an additional +20 Fire Spell Power, +2% Fire Spell Critical Chance, and a +1 bonus to caster level and max caster level for Fire spells, but your air, earth, and water spells have a -3 penalty to caster level and max caster level. You also gain a +10 racial bonus to Fire resistance, +20 Physical Resistance Rating, and a -10 penalty to cold resistance. While in Elemental Form, your spells also cost an additional 10% Spell Points to cast. You also gain the following passive benefits, even while not in elemental form: +2 Charisma +10 Fire Spell Power +1 Caster Level when casting Fire spells +1 Maximum Caster Level when casting Fire spells -10 Cold Spell Power -1 Caster Level when casting Cold or Water spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Eldritch Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stance: While this is active, your Eldritch Blast changes into an aura that deals the same damage as your Eldritch Blast to all foes in range every 5 seconds, and scales with 130% spell power. You cannot fire Eldritch Blasts while in this stance, but may attack normally with weapons and cast spells. Stance cooldown: 8 seconds.

Stance.Name: Eldritch Aura
Stance.Description: While this is active, your Eldritch Blast changes into an aura that deals the same damage as your Eldritch Blast to all foes in range every few seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Aura of Courage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain immunity to Fear, and all allies around you gain a +4 morale bonus to saving throws against fear. Cooldown: 2 seconds. Passive: +5 Healing Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Shape Vestments
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: While wearing Light Armor, you gain +10 Maximum HP and +5 Magical Resistance Rating. While wearing Medium Armor you are proficient with, you gain +20 Maximum HP and +10 MRR. Passive: Your Eldritch Aura now affects enemies every 4 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Aura of Menace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: You project a 15 meter Aura of Menace, decreasing the saving throws, attack and armor class of nearby enemies by 2. Toggle cooldown: 2 seconds. Passive: Your Eldritch Aura now affects enemies every 3 seconds and you gain proficiency with all Martial weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Celestial Spirit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: When enabled, you float above the ground, gain Feather Falling, and are immune to knockdown effects. When enabled, your Eldritch Blasts gain 3d6 Light damage. Your Eldritch Aura now affects enemies every 2 seconds. Stance cooldown: 8 seconds.

Stance.Name: Celestial Spirit
Stance.Description: You float above the ground, gain Feather Falling, and are immune to knockdown effects. When enabled, your Eldritch Blasts gain 3d6 Light damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Ultimate Enlightenment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 Constitution and +2 Charisma. While your Celestial Spirit is enabled, you gain +20% Competence Bonus to Maximum HP, full Base Attack Bonus, +10 Melee Power, +10 Ranged Power, +10 Universal Spell Power and +20 Light Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Spiritual Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While your Eldritch Aura is active, you and nearby allies get a +1/2/3 bonus to AC. You personally receive +5/+10/+15 Maximum Hitpoints (while Aura is active).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Brutality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Brutal Spellcasting
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your damaging spells generate 25%/50%/75% more hate than they normally would, making enemies more likely to attack you.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Brute Fighting
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your melee attacks generate 25%/50%/75% more hate than they normally would, making enemies more likely to attack you.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Rewards of Tribute
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Heal, Balance, and Intimidate. Rank 3: +1 Fortitude Save

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Resist Energies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gives an ally an Enhancement bonus against Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Sonic damage, reducing that type of damage taken by 10. The bonus increases to 20 at caster level 7 and 30 at caster level 11. (Activation Cost: 60/50/40 Spell Points. Cooldown: 2 seconds. Metamagic: Extend, Quicken, Enlarge. Spell Resistance: No.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Spiritual Bastion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While your Eldritch Aura is active, you get +3/+6/+10 PRR, and in addition you and nearby allies get a +1/+2/+3 Determination Bonus to PRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Power of Enlightenment: Light I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5/+10/+15 Light Spell Power and +2/+4/+6 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You permanently gain the effects of the Shield spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Action Boost: Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +5/+10/+15 second Action Boost Bonus to AC and PRR for 20 seconds. (Cooldown: 30 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Eldritch Burst
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fire your Eldritch Blast in an AOE centered on you. All enemies caught in the burst take 1d6 Light Damage, plus any other effects and damage your Eldritch Blasts produce. This ability shares a cooldown with Cleave, and the damage scales with 100% spell power. (Cooldown: 8/6/5 seconds. Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify. Spell Resistance: No).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Spiritual Ward
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While your Eldritch Aura is active, you get +3/6/10 MRR. In addition you and nearby allies get a +1/+2/+3 Determination Bonus to MRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Power of Enlightenment: Light II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5/+10/+15 Light Spell Power and +2/+4/+6 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Fortify Summons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your summoned creatures, hirelings, and pets get 25%/50%/100% fortification, +5/+10/+20 PRR, and +5/+10/+20 MRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Medium Armor Proficiency
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency in Medium Armor, and the ability to cast arcane spells in medium armor without arcane spell failure.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Spiritual Retribution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Eldritch Blasts, Melee Attacks, and Ranged Attacks gain 1d4/2d4/3d4 Light damage that scales with Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Brilliance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura provides you and nearby allies with a Determination bonus to Temporary Hitpoints equal to your Constitution score. Level 20+ characters receive twice as many hitpoints.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Imbue Summons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your summoned creatures/hirelings/pets gain +10/+20/+30 Melee, Ranged, and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Spirit Blast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fire your Eldritch Blast in an AOE centered on you. All enemies caught in the burst take 4d6 Light Damage, plus any other effects and damage your Eldritch Blasts produce. This ability shares a cooldown with Great Cleave, and the damage scales with 100% spell power. (Cooldown 8/6/5 seconds. Metamagic: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify. Spell Resistance: No).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Beacon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While your Eldritch Aura is active, you gain +10 Healing Amplification. In addition, you and nearby allies get a +10 Determination bonus to Healing Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Shining Through
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a Sacred bonus to Temporary Hitpoints equal to 12x your Constitution Score that lasts for up to 10 minutes. For 20 seconds, you gain +25 Sacred bonus to Healing Amplification. (Cooldown: 30 sec. SP Cost: 8).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Displace Summons
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your summoned creatures/hirelings/pets gain a permanent 25% Concealment, as per the item effect "Lesser Displacement", and 10% Dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Enlightened Spirit: Displacement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Displacement (Activation Cost: 6 Spell Points. Cooldown: 3 seconds).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Inhuman Understanding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 damage with melee and ranged attacks and +5 Universal Spellpower for each core ability you take in this tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Inhuman Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: As your form becomes more inhuman you gain +25% Fortification and +4 Saving Throws versus Poison and Disease.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: No Worse Fate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain immunity to Fear. Your melee, ranged and Eldritch Blast attacks cause enemies to be Shaken for 6 seconds. This can occur up to once per 2 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Inhuman Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: You gain +25% Fortification and +4 Saving Throws versus Poison and Disease. Your Consume damage over time is increased by 2d10. Your Stricken damage is increased by 4d6.

Stance.Name: Inhuman Nature
Stance.Description: You gain +25% Fortification and +4 Saving Throws versus Poison and Disease. Your Consume damage over time is increased by 2d10. Your Stricken damage is increased by 4d6.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Eldritch Seeker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5% chance to critically hit with spells and with Eldritch Blast.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Devour the Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +4 Charisma. You consume the soul of your targeted enemy, killing it instantly unless it makes a Will saving throw with a DC of 18 + Warlock level + Charisma bonus. This ability is considered a Necromancy spell. This ability works on undead, but not constructs and other creatures with no lifeforce. If the target survives then it loses 20 PRR and MRR for 6 seconds. Cooldown: 15 seconds.

DC.Name: Soul Eater: Devour the Soul
DC.Description: You consume the soul of your targeted enemy, killing it instantly unless it makes a Will saving throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Consume
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Magical Attack. Your magics consume bits of your opponent's form, disintegrating bits of them for 2d10 Chaotic damage every 2 seconds for a duration of 16 seconds. The damage scales with 125% spell power. The effect can stack up to 3 times. Your enemy is also marked with the Consumed trait.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Subtle Spellcasting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks and spells generate [20/30/40]% less hate, making enemies less likely to attack you.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Taint the Blood
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Eldritch Blast, Melee and ranged attacks reduce the Fortitude saving throw of the target by -1 for 6 seconds. The effect stacks up to 4 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Daunting Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Bluff, Haggle, and Diplomacy. Rank 3: +1 Will save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Hungry for Destruction I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] Melee Power and Ranged Power, and +[2/4/6] Universal Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Stricken
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Magical Attack. You cause [4d6/8d6/12d6]Chaotic damage and reduce the Healing Amplification of the opponent by [40/80/120] for 12 seconds. The reduction is negated by a Fortitude saving throw with a DC of 18 + Warlock level + the higher of Intelligence or Charisma modifier. The damage scales with 125% Spell Power. Your enemy is also marked with the Strickened trait. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

DC.Name: Soul Eater: Stricken
DC.Description: Ranged Magical Attack. You cause [4d6/8d6/12d6] Chaotic damage and reduce the Healing Amplification of the opponent by [40/80/120] for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Feeding Frenzy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you use Consume on an enemy the feeding increases your movement speed by 1% per Warlock level for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Taint the Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Against targets marked by your Consume attack: Your melee, ranged and Eldritch Blast attacks reduce the Spell Resistance, PRR and MRR of the target by -2 for 10 seconds. The effect stacks up to 5 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Consume Sight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can cast the spell Blindness as a Spell-Like Ability. You may use Metamagic Feats with Spell-Like Abilities at no additional cost. Blinds an enemy. Activation Cost: 10 Spell Points. Cooldown: 3 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Hungry for Destruction II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] Melee Power and Ranged Power, and +[2/4/6] Universal Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Strickened Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Against targets marked by your Stricken attack: Your Eldritch Blast, Melee and Ranged attacks reduce the target's Melee Power, Ranged Power and Spellpower by 20 for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Dark Feeding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Blood Feast
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause 1d8+2 Constitution damage to your opponent. You gain an Insight bonus of 1d8+2 Constitution for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Food for Thought
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause 1d8+2 Intelligence damage to your opponent. You gain an Insight bonus of 1d8+2 Intelligence for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: You Cannot Evade Me
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause 1d8+2 Dexterity damage to your opponent. You gain an Insight bonus of 1d8+2 Dexterity for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Your Flesh Is Weak
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause 1d8+2 Strength damage to your opponent. You gain an Insight bonus of 1d8+2 Strength for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Your Will Is Mine
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to cause 1d8+2 Wisdom damage to your opponent. You gain an Insight bonus of 1d8+2 Wisdom for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Burning Blood
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can cast the spell Burning Blood as a Spell-Like ability. Cost: 10 SP. You may use Metamagic Feats with Spell-Like Abilities at no additional cost. Cooldown: 5 seconds. An harmful enchantment that deals acid damage (1d8) and fire damage (1d8, +1 per caster level) every 2 seconds for a duration of 10 seconds. No initial tic, then 4 tics of damage

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Eldritch Blast Shape: Cone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Eldritch Blast Shape Stance: Toggle on to turn your automatic attack into a ranged magical cone dealing 1d6 force damage. While active you have -1 Pact damage die, and this spell scales with 130% Spell power. This cone attack has standard range for cone spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Strickened Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Against targets marked by your Stricken attack: Your melee, ranged and Eldritch Blast attacks inflict Vulnerability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Greater Hunger
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your melee, ranged, and Eldritch Blast attacks do 2d6 Chaotic damage when striking an opponent marked by your Consume attack. Your Consume damage over time is increased by 2d10. Your stricken damage is increased by 4d6.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Steal Life Force
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You cause [4d6/8d6/12d6] Chaotic damage to your target and heal for [4d6/8d6/12d6] positive energy (or negative if you are undead.) This damage and healing scales with 150% spell power. Cooldown: 20 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Immortal Will
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to the DC of Enchantment, Illusion, and Necromancy spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Eldritch Wave
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You create a cone of eldritch energy that strikes all opponents in the area with three consecutives Eldritch Blasts. The damage from these Eldritch Blasts scales with 150% spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Supreme Hunger
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Consume damage over time is increased by 2d10. Your Stricken damage is increased by 4d6.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Feed On Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Attacking with melee, ranged, and Eldritch Blast gives a 10% chance to gain 10 temporary Spell Points +1 per Warlock level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Spell Tearing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +3% chance to critically hit with your spells and Eldritch Blast

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Soul Eater: Finger of Death
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Finger of Death Activation Cost: 40 Spell Points. Cooldown: 8 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Tainted Spellcasting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate for 10 Depravity: +25 Universal Spell Power, +2 bonus to all Spell DCs. Lasts 20 seconds. You gain 1 Depravity each time you damage enemies with Eldritch Blast or spells (except with Positive Energy). You can gain 1 Depravity every 6.5 seconds. Each additional trained tainted Scholar Core enhancement reduces this cooldown by 1 second, to a minimum of 1.5 seconds. You can have up to 10 Depravity, which disappears on rest, death or entering public spaces. You build up depravity charges over time and you use those charges to activate the abilities in the tainted scholar tree. Cooldown: 1 minute. Passive: Each point spent in Tainted Scholar provides +0.75 Universal Spell Power. Feather Fall is added to your known Warlock Spells at level 1.

Effect.DisplayName: Tainted Scholar: Spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Tainted Lore
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10% Spell Critical Damage +1 Spell Penetration +10 maximum Depravity (Spell Critical damage also applies to criticals with Eldritch Blast) Web is added to your known Warlock Spells at level 2

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Stanch
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate for 7 Depravity: Gain temporary hitpoints equal to 50% of your maximum hitpoints. These last for 1 minute. You have -3% maximum hitpoints until you rest, which stacks up to 33 times. +10 maximum Depravity Crushing Despair is added to your known Warlock Spells at level 3.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Tainted Lore
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20% Spell Critical Damage +1 Spell Penetration +10 maximum Depravity (Spell Critical damage also applies to criticals with Eldritch Blast) Death Ward is added to your known Warlock Spells at level 4.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Blood Component
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your eldritch Blast Shapes attack 10% faster. +10 maximum Depravity -25 Maximum HP Greater Heroism is added to your known Warlock Spells at level 5.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Heretical Lore
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Eldritch Blast deals +1d6 damage +30% Spell Critical Damage +4 Charisma +1 Spell Penetration +10 maximum Depravity Energy Drain is added to your known Warlock Spells at level 6.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Planar Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/90] Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Feigned Health
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you cast spells on yourself or allies, you grant temporary hitpoints equal to [33/66/100]% of your Charisma. These last for three minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Command
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate for [3/2/1] Depravity An enemy is commanded to fall to the ground and lie prone. A successful will save negates this effect. This is a Spell-Like Ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Strong Pact I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1d4 Pact damage with Eldritch Blast

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Eldritch Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spellcraft and Concentration

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Utterdark Blast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Eldritch Essence Stance: Your Eldritch Blast base damage is now Evil instead of Force. (Evil Damage from spells is usually boosted by alignment-based Spell power, and normally deals full damage to enemies regardless of enemy alignment, though particular enemies may have special defenses).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Eldritch Blast Shape: Chain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Eldritch Blast Shape: Toggle on to turn your automatic attack into a ranged magical bolt dealing Eldritch Blast damage, which then jumps to two more nearby enemies. While active you have -1 Eldritch Blast Pact damage die, and this spell scales with 95% Spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Stunning Blast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate for [6/4/2] Depravity: Attacks an enemy with an Eldritch Blast that stuns your target into helplessness for 12 seconds on a failed Fortitude saving throw vs. DC (10 + Warlock Level + Charisma Modifier). This damage scales with 150% spell power. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

DC.Name: Tainted Scholar: Stunning Blast
DC.Description: Activate for [6/4/2] Depravity: Attacks an enemy with an Eldritch Blast that stuns your target into helplessness for 12 seconds on a failed Fortitude saving throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Strong Pact II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1d4 Pact damage with Eldritch Blast

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% to the effectiveness of your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +[1/2/3] to the DCs of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Faltering Blast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Eldritch Essence Stance: Your Eldritch Blast attacks have a 10% chance to slow enemy movement speed by 50% for 6 seconds. This does not affect bosses.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Efficient Heighten
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Using the Heighten Spell Metamagic costs you [1/2] less Spell Points per heightened level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Confusion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate for [3/2/1] Depravity: Target non-boss monster becomes Confused on a failed Will Saving throw. Confused monsters attack and are attacked by both monster characters and player characters. Spell-Like Ability: This ability benefits from your Metamagic Feats (such as Quicken Spell) without paying the normal additional spell point cost. This is an Enchantment SLA.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1d4 Pact damage with Eldritch Blast

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Enervating Shadow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Eldritch Blast Shape Stance: This makes your basic attack seek out enemies, and inflicts a negative level 10% of the time. Your Eldritch Blast damage scales with 150% spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Bewitching Blast

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Eldritch Ball

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Tainted Scholar: Mass Confusion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate for [12/8/4] Depravity: A group of non-boss monsters each become confused on a failed Will saving throw. EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arch-Mage: Master of Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Through extensive training and countless hours of study, you have mastered the application of metamagic feats to your spells. You gain +2 Intelligence, +5 Spellcraft, and all metamagic feats cost 1 fewer spell point to use. (Heighten Spell costs 1 fewer spell point per level of heightening.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arch-Mage: Subtle Spellcasting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your damaging spells generate 10%/20%/30% less hate than they normally would, making enemies less likely to attack you.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arch-Mage: Energy of the Scholar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your studies have increased your maximum Spell Points by an additional 30/60/90.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arch-Mage: Traditionalist Caster
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3/+6/+10 Universal Spell Power when wielding an Orb or Staff.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arch-Mage: Spell Critical: Elemental and Force I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, Force and Untyped damage spells have an additional 1% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arch-Mage: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25%/+50%/+75% effectiveness from your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +1/+2/+3 to the save DC of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose another Metamagic feat. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, Force and Untyped damage spells have an additional 1% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arch-Mage: Arcane Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Arcane Bolt (Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell Points. Cooldown: 15/10/5 seconds) Scale with 100% Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arch-Mage: Spell Penetration

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arch-Mage: Arcane Blast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Arcane Blast. (Activation Cost: 12/8/6 Spell Points. Cooldown: 18/12/6 seconds.) You fire a ball of raw energy from your hand that explodes on contact with its target, dealing 1 to 6 hit points of force damage per caster level to all within its radius. A successful Reflex save reduces the damage by half. This ability counts as a level 4 Wizard spell. Scale with 100% Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arch-Mage: Arcane Supremacy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your offensive spells gain a 10% chance to trigger Arcane Supremacy. Arcane Supremacy: +25% Spell Critical Chance, +100% Spell Critical Damage. 12 seconds duration. This effect may trigger only once every 90 seconds.
