EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Cleave Attack: Sheathe your weapon in eldritch energies, striking foes in front of you for +1[W] damage. If this attack hits, your weapon also releases a blast of magical energy, dealing an additional 1 to 2 Force Damage per character level to all nearby foes. This additional Force damage is affected by your Force Spell Power. Cooldown: 12 seconds Passive: You gain proficiency with Simple Weapons. Every Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants +10 Maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Spellsword
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain four elemental toggles that each imbue your weapon with elemental power. Only one may be active at a time, causing them to deal an additional 1d6 (element) damage on hit. You gain an additional 1d6 every 3 Wizard levels (at 6, 9, 12, 15 and 18). This damage scales with Spell Power. While active, your Eldritch Strike deals 1-2 additional (element) damage per Character Level which scales with Spell Power. Passive: +2% Doublestrike, +10 Universal Spell Power. You also gain proficiency in Light Armor and Martial weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Imbue the Blade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee weapons are considered Spellcasting Implements in your hands. You gain the Quick Draw feat, reducing the time between spellcasting and weapon use. -15% Arcane Spell Failure from equipped Armor, Shields, and Warforged Body feats. +2% Doublestrike, +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Subtle Force I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the benefits of the Deflect Arrows feat, knocking aside one incoming projectile that would have struck you every 6 seconds. Your Spellsword dice are now D8s instead of the original d6s -20% Arcane Spell Failure from equipped Armor, Shields, and Warforged Body feats. +6 Resistance to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire and Sonic damage. +2% Doublestrike and +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Subtle Force II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5% Stacking Incorpreality. Your Deflect Arrows now triggers every 2 seconds. Your Spellsword Dice are now d10s (Replacing previous d8s). +2% Doublestrike. +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Blade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Eldritch Strike now grants you a Power Charge. When you have 5 Power Charges, they are removed, and you gain Eldritch Power. Eldritch Power: +10% to your damage with weapon attacks, +4 Spellsword Dice, +25 Universal spellpower. Duration: 30 seconds. Passive: Your Spellsword die size is now d12 +1 Spellsword die +2 Intelligence, +2 Constitution +2% Doublestrike +10 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Mage Armor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Mage Armor. You gain Mage Armor as a spell-like ability. In addition, while you are under the effect of the Mage Armor spell, you gain a +3%/+6%/+10% exceptional bonus to your total Armor Class. Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Arcane Siphon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack: +1/2/3[W]: On Hit: Gain +10/20/30 Competence bonus to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a 25%/50%/75% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Toughness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5/+10/+15 maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Battlemage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration, Intimidate, and Spellcraft.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Shield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Shield You gain the Shield spell as a spell-like ability. In addition, while you are under the effect of the Shield spell, you gain +3/+6/+10 Physical Resistance Rating. Shield: +4 Shield bonus to Armor Class and Immunity to Magic Missiles. Activation Cost: 8/6/4 Spell points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Mystic Wards
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3/6/10 Magical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Action Boost Spellpower
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +10/20/30 Action Boost bonus to Universal Spell Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Shield Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency with all shields except Tower Shields, and your Arcane Spell Failure chance from equipped shields is reduced by 5%. This enhancement does not count as a prerequisite for Feats which require shield proficiency.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +25%/+50%/+75% effectiveness from your wands, scrolls, and other items that cast spells, and +1/+2/+3 to the save DC of your offensive wands.

RequiresNoneOf.DisplayDescription: Any other Wand and Scroll Mastery enhancement

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Arcane Barrier
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: When your HP drop below 50% of maximum, you are immediately protected by an Arcane Barrier that reduces all incoming damage by 25% for the next 20 seconds. This effect may only trigger once every 90 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Accuracy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You get Intelligence to hit with weapons and shield bashes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Synergetic Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you activate Action Boost: Spell Power, you also gain an equal Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Critical Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/2/3 to confirm critical hits and critical hit damage (before weapon multipliers)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Knight's Transformation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Toggle: While this is turned on, all your spells and SLAs that are affected by Metamagics have their range reduced to touch range. You gain +30 Universal Spell Power and +3% Spell Critical Damage. Your Base Attack Bonus equals your Character Level. You gain +5 to hit with Melee Weapons and 3% Doublestrike.
Exclusive from the Enlarge Metamagic and any Eldritch Blast shape stance. This stance works with other offensive and defensive stances, as well as Rages.

Stance.Name: Knight's Transformation
Stance.Description: While this is turned on, all your spells and SLAs that are affected by Metamagics have their range reduced to touch range. You cannot enable the Enlarge Metamagic while this is active. You gain +30 Universal Spell Power and +3% Spell Critical Damage. Your Base Attack Bonus equals your Character Level. You gain +5 to it with Melee Weapons and 3% Doublestrike.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Offhand Defenses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick between Shield and Orb bonuses.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Orb Saves
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1/2/3 to saving throws and +3/6/10 Universal Spell Power while holding an Orb

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shield Striking
EnhancementSelection.Description: On Hit: +5/10/15% chance to proc an immediate Shield Bash attack with an equipped shield.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Force's Point
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you cast an offensive spell, you gain a stack of Force's Point: Martial (+1 to Hit and Damage). This stacks up to 5 times. When you hit with a melee weapon, you gain a stack of Force's Point: Magical (+2 Universal Spell Power). This stacks up to 10 times. Stacks last 12 seconds each. You may only gain each effect once per second.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Armored Arcana
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain proficiency in Medium Armor, and you no longer suffer Arcane Spell Failure from Light Armor, Medium Armor or Mithral Body.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength, Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Improved Knight's Transformation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier with Melee Weapons, +3 Damage and the Mobile Spellcasting feat, allowing yout to cast while moving at full speed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Knight's Arcanum
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a focus for your spells while in Knight's Transformation

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knight's Controller
EnhancementSelection.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain: +2 Enchantment DCs, +2 Illusion DCs, +4 Spell Penetration and +20 Melee Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knight's Striker
EnhancementSelection.Description: If you have Knight's Transformation active, you also gain: +2 Evocation and Conjuration DCs and +20 Melee power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Force's Edge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you cast an offensive spell, you gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range for 12 seconds. When you make a Melee Attack, you gain +5% Spell Critical Chance for 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Radiant Forcefield
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Radiant Forcefield Activation Cost: 30 Spell Points. Cooldown: 3 Minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Eldritch Knight: Eldritch Tempest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Perform a spinning melee attack, dealing weapon damage +5[W] to all nearby enemies and knocking them prone for 1 second. This attack has +10 to Critical Threat Range and +3 to Critical Multiplier. Enemies affected are knocked prone for one second and Slowed by 50% for 6 seconds. If any foes are struck by Eldritch Tempest, your weapon also releases an explosion of magical force, dealing an additional 1d6 Force damage per character level to all nearby enemies. This additional force damage is affected by your spell power. Activation Cost: 25/20/15 Spell points. Cooldown: 60/45/30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Dark Reaping
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For each point spent in this tree you gain +0.75 Universal Spell Power and +0.75 Negative Energy Spell Power (for a total of 1.5 Negative Energy SpellPower per point spent).

Effect.DisplayName: Pale Master: 0.75 Universal Spell Power per AP
Pale Master: 0.75 Negative Spell Power per AP

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Shroud of the Zombie
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shroud Toggle: You shroud yourself with negative energy and assume many of the traits of a zombie. (Activation Cost: 25 Spell Points. Cooldown: 30 seconds) While in this form, you hunger for brains and gain +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, -2 Intelligence, -4 Charisma, and Damage Reduction 5/Slashing. Your unarmed damage is increased by 1[W], but you attack 20% slower than normal. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by negative energy, and are unaffected by positive energy or repair effects, but take double damage from light effects. You are considered undead rather than your original type for the purpose of most effects.

Stance.Name: Shround of the Zombie
Stance.Description: While in this form, you hunger for brains and gain +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, -2 Intelligence, -4 Charisma, and Damage Reduction 5/Slashing. Your unarmed damage is increased by 1[W], but you attack 20% slower than normal. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by negative energy, and are unaffected by positive energy or repair effects, but take double damage from light effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Shroud of the Vampire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shroud Toggle: You shroud yourself with negative energy and assume many of the traits of a vampire. (Activation Cost: 50 Spell Points. Cooldown: 30 seconds) While in this form, you gain +2 Strength, +2 Charisma, +2 to the DC's of your Enchantment spells, and generate 25% less threat from spells and attacks. On Vorpal Melee Hit: Your attack causes Energy Drain, inflicting 1 Negative Level on your victim. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by negative energy, and are unaffected by positive energy or repair effects, but take triple damage from light effects. You are considered undead rather than your original type for the purpose of most effects.

Stance.Name: Shroud of the Vampire
Stance.Description: While in this form, you gain +2 Strength, +2 Charisma, +2 to the DC's of your Enchantment spells, and generate 25% less threat from spells and attacks. On Vorpal Melee Hit: Your attack causes Energy Drain, inflicting 1 Negative Level on your victim. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by negative energy, and are unaffected by positive energy or repair effects, but take triple damage from light effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Shroud of the Wraith
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shroud Toggle: You shroud yourself with negative energy and assume many of the traits of a wraith. (Activation Cost: 75 Spell Points. Cooldown: 30 seconds) While in this form, enemy attacks have a 25% chance to miss you due to your incorporeality, you float as if affected by featherfall, have a +20 bonus to the Move Silently and Balance skills, and your attacks funcion as if they had Ghost Touch. On Critical Melee Hit: Your attack deals 1d6 Constitution damage to the victim. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by negative energy, and are unaffected by positive energy or repair effects, but take double damage from light effects. You are considered undead rather than your original type for the purpose of most effects.

Stance.Name: Shroud of the Wraith
Stance.Description: While in this form, enemy attacks have a 25% chance to miss you due to your incorporeality, you float as if affected by featherfall, have a +20 bonus to the Move Silently and Balance skills, and your attacks funcion as if they had Ghost Touch. On Critical Melee Hit: Your attack deals 1d6 Constitution damage to the victim. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by negative energy, and are unaffected by positive energy or repair effects, but take double damage from light effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Shroud of the Lich
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shroud Toggle: You shroud yourself with negative energy and assume many of the traits of a lich. (Activation Cost: 100 Spell Points. Cooldown: 30 seconds) While in this form, you gain +4 Constitution, +2 Intelligence, +2 Wisdom, +2 Charisma, +1 to DCs of your Necromancy spells, and occasionally gain temporary hit points when damaged. On Melee Hit: Your attack inflicts 2-9 points of Negative Energy damage to a living target. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by negative energy, and are unaffected by positive energy or repair effects, but take double damage from light effects. You are considered undead rather than your original type for the purpose of most effects.

Stance.Name: Shroud of the Lich
Stance.Description: While in this form, you gain +4 Constitution, +2 Intelligence, +2 Wisdom, +2 Charisma, +1 to DCs of your Necromancy spells, and occasionally gain temporary hit points when damaged. On Melee Hit: Your attack inflicts 2-9 points of Negative Energy damage to a living target. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by negative energy, and are unaffected by positive energy or repair effects, but take double damage from light effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Master of Death
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 intelligence and deathblock. When you have a Shroud toggle active, receive 5% more healing from Negative Energy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Necrotic Touch
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Necrotic Touch (Activation Cost: 2 Hit Points. Cooldown: 12/8/4 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Deathless Vigor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The power of undeath has toughened your flesh, providing you with an additional +10/+20/+30 Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Spell Critical: Negative Energy I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Negative Energy damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Skeletal Knight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Summon the reanimated body of an ancient knight to do your bidding once per rest. (Activation Cost: 10 Hit Points and 10 Spell Points. Cooldown: 5 minutes.) The Skeletal Knight is a very strong Fighter with a level equal to your current Wizard level plus any Epic levels. You can summon it in addition to any Summon Monster spell you might be using. Additional ranks in this enhancement increase your Knight's Damage, Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and Fortification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Negative Energy Conduit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your vulnerability to Negative Energy is increased by 6% / 12% / 20%. This increases the amount by which you are healed from Negative Energy while you have a Shroud toggle active.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Efficient Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of the following Metamagic feats. Reduce the spell point cost of using that Metamagic.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Empower Spell Metamagic costs you 2/4/6 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Maximize Spell Metamagic costs you 3/6/9 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Efficient Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you 1/2/4 fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Spell Critical: Negative Energy II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Negative Energy damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Corpsecrafter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Skeletal Knight gains a +2/+4/+6 Profane Bonus to Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Bone Armor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While under the effect of Shroud of the Zombie, Vampire, or Lich, you gain 3/6/10 Physical Resistance. While under the effect of Shroud of the Wraith, you gain 1%/2%/3% Dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Necrotic Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Necrotic Bolt (Activation Cost: 5 Hit Points. Cooldown: 15/10/5 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Cloak of Night
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: While active, Cloak of Night reduces the effectiveness of Positive Energy, Negative Energy, Repair, and Light damage on you by 20%/35%/50%. (Activation Cost: 25 Spell Points. Cooldown: 1 second.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Spell Critical: Negative Energy III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Negative Energy damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Eternal Servitude
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Skeletal Knight gains +2/+4/+6 Profane Bonus to AC, and a +5/+10/+15 Profane Bonus to Physical Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Spell Critical: Negative Energy IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Negative Energy damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Dark Furor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Skeletal Knight gains 15%/30%/45% Doublestrike, and its attacks bypass 5%/10%/15% of enemy Fortification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Necrotic Blast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell Like Ability: Necrotic Blast (Activation Cost: 10 Hit Points. Cooldown: 18/12/6 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Animate Ally
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to Animate a dead ally, restoring 100% of the target's hit points. (Cooldown: 5 minutes. Metamagic: Quicken, Enlarge. Spell Resistance: No) Your ally is considered an undead zombie (gaining the benefits and drawbacks of Shroud of the Zombie) and will rot for increasing damage over time until death reclaims it.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Necromantic Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You benefit from dark knowledge, granting you a +1 DC to spells from the Necromancy school.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Pale Master: Improved Shrouding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Undead Shrouds gain the following additional benefits: While in Shroud of the Juju Zombie, you gain +2 Constitution, 15 Physical Resistance Rating, and your Damage Reduction increases to 10/Slashing. While in Shroud of the Master Vampire, you gain +2 Dexterity, your vulnerability to Light damage is reduced to 200% (from 300%), and your melee and unarmed attacks heal you for 1 point of Negative Energy damage. While in Shroud of the Dread Wraith, you gain +2 Dexterity and your Incorporeal Miss Chance increases from 25% to 35%. While in Shroud of the Archlich, you gain an additional +2 Intelligence and +10 to Negative Energy Spellpower.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Just Cause
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain Cleric, Favored Soul, and Paladin Caster Levels equal in your level in Divine Crusader. +25 Spell Points, +10 Hit points, and Your Base Attack Bonus is equal to your total Character Level. Passively Provides: +3 Melee Power and +2 Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Aura of Purification
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: (Cooldown 3 seconds) Toggle: Every 3 Seconds While Active: Nearby enemies gain a stack of Purification. Purification: -1 Attack Damage, -2 Spell Power, stacks up to 25 times. Passive: +25 Spell Points, +10 Hit Points, +3 Melee Power and +2 Ranged Power. Note: Attack damage cannot be reduced below 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Extraordinary Virtue
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +20 Positive Healing Amplification, +10 Positive Spell Power, +25 Spell Points, +10 Hit Points, +3 Melee Power and +2 Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: No Remorse
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever an enemy who was recently affected by your Aura of Purification is slain, nearby allies are healed for Positive Energy equal to the CR of the slain enemy. Passive: +25 Spell Points, +10 hit Points, +3 Melee Power and +2 Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Sword of Justice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: +4 damage with all attacks, +25 Spell Points, and +10 Hit Points, +3 Melee Power and +2 Ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Zeal of the Righteous
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: Gain 50 stacks of Righteous Zeal. Righteous Zeal: +1 Spell Power, +1% doublestrike, +1% doubleshot, +1 Melee Power, +1 Ranged Power. Decays by 1 stack every 3 seconds, and is not lost by resting. (Cooldown: 4 minutes) Passively provides: +2 Melee Power and +2 Ranged power.

Stance.Name: Zeal of the Righteous
Stance.Description: Gain 50 stacks of Righteous Zeal. Righteous Zeal: +1 Spell Power, +1% doublestrike, +1% doubleshot, +1 Melee Power, +1 Ranged Power. Decays by 1 stack every 3 seconds, and is not lost by resting. (Cooldown: 4 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Bane of Undeath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: You gain the Turn Undead feat. Weapons you equip gain undead bane (+2 enhancement bonus and +2d6 damage against undead).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Endless Turning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +[1/2/3] Turn Undead per rest. Turn Undead uses regenerate every 2 minutes, or [10/20/30]% faster if it already regenerates.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Interrogation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +5 Universal Spell Power and +1% Spell Critical Chance. Your offensive spells cause enemies to gain a stack of Purification. This affects each enemy up to once per 2 seconds. Purification: -1 attack damage, -2 spell power. Stacks up to 25 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Purge the Wicked
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +2 bonus to Confirm Critical Hits and Critical Hit Damage. Your Critical Hits with weapons also cause enemies to gain a stack of Purification. This affects each enemy up to once per 2 seconds. Purification: -1 attack damage, -2 spell power. Stacks up to 25 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Strength, Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Confront Any Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: (No Cooldown) Melee Attack: Expend one Turn Undead: Deals 10d10 extra Light Damage on a successful hit. Note: Strikes multiple enemies in a small arc three times and may doublestrike for a fourth strike.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Consecration
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: The ground you are standing on is consecrated. Evil creatures standing on consecrated ground are burned every 3 seconds, gaining a stack of Purification and taking 1d6 damage per character level. This damage is half Fire, half Good. Both damage components are affected by Fire Spell Power. (Cooldown: [30/25/20] seconds). Duration 15 seconds. Activation Cost: [50/40/30] Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Flames of Purity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +[10/20/30] Fire Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Smite the Wicked
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: (Cooldown 15 seconds, activation cost 10 spell points) Melee smite: Gain twice your Charisma bonus to your attack roll and damage bonus of 2[W] + 7 against evil opponents. On hit: 50 light damage against undead and evil outsiders. On vorpal: Destroy undead or evil outsiders under 1000 hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Strength, Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Stand and Be Judged
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: A targeted foe must make a Will saving throw or be stunned for 30 seconds. (DC: 30+Wisdom Modifier) (Cooldown [30/25/20] seconds) Activation Cost: [25/20/15] Spell Points.

DC.Name: Divine Crusader: Stand and Be Judged
DC.Description: A targeted foe must make a Will saving throw or be stunned for 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Sacred Ground
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: While standing on consecrated ground you and your allies are healed every 3 seconds for 1 point of positive energy per character level. This is affected by your positive spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Empyrean Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: Whenever you cast a fire, light, or healing spell you gain a stack of Empyrean Fervor. Each stack of Empyrean Fervor gives you +2 Sacred bonus to Universal Spell power, +1% Sacred Bonus to Critical Chance with all spells. Duration: 10 seconds. Stacks 10 times.

Stance.Name: Empyrean Magic
Stance.Description: Each stack of Empyrean Fervor gives you +2 Sacred bonus to Universal Spell power, +1% Sacred Bonus to Critical Chance with all spells. Duration: 10 seconds. Stacks 10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Blessed Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: Any weapon you wield and your unarmed attacks are treated as having your alignment for damage reduction bypass purpose. (Has no effect if you are True Neutral.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: No Regret
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever an enemy who was recently affected by your Aura of Purification is slain, other nearby enemies gain 1 to 4 stacks of Purification. This ability also grants +2 Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Crusade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While standing on consecrated ground, you and your allies gain a 10% enhancement bonus to the damage of all your melee and ranged attacks. This is a 4 second buff that activates every 4 seconds when standing on consecrated ground.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Castigation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura of Purification also harms nearby enemies, dealing Bane damage every 3 seconds. Non-bosses take damage equal to 1% of their current health for each stack of Purification they have. Bosses instead take 1d6 Bane damage per stack of Purification. This ability also grants +2 Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Heavenly Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain some abilities of a Celestial. Passive Bonus: Grants you +10 Physical Resistance Rating and 10% Acid, Cold and Electricity absorption. In addition, you are immune to petrification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Celestial Champion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Feat Bonus to Critical Threat Range with all weapons (does not apply in an animal form). When you critically hit with an attack, you gain a stack of Celestial Fervor. A stack of Celestial Fervor grants you +1 Enhancement Bonus to Doublestrike and Doubleshot chance. Stacks up to 10 times, with a duration of 6 seconds.

Stance.Name: Celestial Fervor
Stance.Description: A stack of Celestial Fervor grants you +1 Enhancement Bonus to Doublestrike and Doubleshot chance. Stacks up to 10 times, with a duration of 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Celestial Bombardment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: Evocation SLA. Divine wrath falls from the heavens to smite your foes. This spell calls down three stars at your target, dealing a total of 3d6 fire damage per character level, split into three hits. This damage is affected by fire spell power and may critically hit. In addition, enemies must succeed at three consecutive Reflex saving throws versus a DC of 20+Wisdom mod+Evocation spell DC modifier or be knocked prone. Activation cost is [300/200/100] Spell points and has a cooldown of [3/2/1] minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Divine Crusader: Strike Down
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: Melee smite cleave: Gain a damage bonus of +3[W]. On hit 500 fire damage (does not scale with melee power nor spell power). On hit after damage destroy undead or evil outsiders below 1000 HP. (Cooldown 12 seconds, activation cost: 5 spell points)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Energy Sheath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For [2/4/6] minutes gain 50% [fire/cold/acid/electric] absorption. Enemies that strike you take [1d3+10/2d3+15/3d3+20] [fire/cold/acid/electric] and have a small chance to take 4d20+100 damage of that type. Removes fire shield(hot/cold)[Metamagic: Quicken Spell]. (Cooldown 1min, 10 spell points)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +[2/4/6] intimidate, +[2/4/6] to saving throws of fear based effects, and +[1/2/3] DC to fear-based spells. At rank 3 you are immune to fear. Unlisted effect: +6 to reflex saves

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragonhide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +[1/2/3] natural armor and +[2/4/6] fortitude saves. At rank 3 you no longer automatically fail fort save on a 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Perception
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: +[2/4/6] spot and +[2/4/6] reflex.

Nearby enemies take [1d8+8/1d10+10/1d12+12] [fire/cold/acid/electric] damage per caster level (reflex save DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier for half damage). Then trigger a diplomacy effect and become invisible for 20 seconds. Invisibility doesn't break if attacking or casting spells. (Cooldown 4mins)

DC.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Go out with a bang

Fire spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to deal a blast of [3d6/6d6/9d6] extra light damage Cold spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to deal a blast of [3d6/6d6/9d6] extra sonic damage Acid spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to reduce enemies' Fortitude save by 5 for [10/20/30] seconds Electric spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to reduce enemies' Reflex save by 10 for [10/20/30] seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Flyby Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Executes an abundant step which passes through enemies and deals 2d6 [fire/cold/acid/electric] damage per character level to any enemy struck during the attack. Each enemy is also knocked down (reflex save DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier for half damage; STR/DEX save DC 20 + 1/2 character level + INT/CHA modifier negates knockdown). (Cooldown 1min)

DC.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Flyby Attack (Damage)
DC.Description: Executes an abundant step which passes through enemies and deals 2d6 [fire/cold/acid/electric] damage per character level to any enemy struck during the attack. Each enemy is also knocked down.

DC.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Flyby Attack (Knockdown)
DC.Description: Executes an abundant step which passes through enemies and deals 2d6 [fire/cold/acid/electric] damage per character level to any enemy struck during the attack. Each enemy is also knocked down.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Breath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Cone that deals 1d15 +15 [red fire/white cold/black acid/blue electric] damage per character level (reflex save for half). Can use 5 times per rest. Counts as Evocation spell; gets full Metamagic feats. (Cooldown 1min)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Breath Augmentation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: Adds one of those special effects to your breath: 15% chance that target will sleep. 15% chance that target will be slowed for 10 seconds. 15% chance that target will be paralyzed for 4 seconds. 15% chance that target will suffer 2d8 strength damage.

DC.Description: Intense elemental energy swirl around you dealing damage to enemy in the AoE. Follows you and deal 1d6 [fire/cold/acid/electric] damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 45 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Hunger
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: When you kill an enemy there is a 10% chance you'll gain 15 temporary HP and 10% chance you'll gain 15 temporary SP. If Draconic Fury is active, this chance is increased to 50%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: 'Fearsome Invulnerability' Epic Moment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each time you damage an enemy with an evocation or conjuration spell while under the effect of Draconic Fury, gain 1 charge. When have 20 of these charges, can expend them to activate Fearsome Invulnerability. Triggers an intimidate effect when used, lasts for 30 seconds, and for its duration you have DR 100/Epic, resistance 200 to Fire/Cold/Electricity/Acid and HP regens at a very swift rate. (Cooldown 5mins)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Celestial Destiny
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: Gain 50 sp. Each additional level of Exalted Angel grants 50 sp and +1 to Cleric, Paladin and Favored Soul caster levels if you have any levels in the class

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Mass Cure Moderate Wounds
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Casts Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass as a Spell-Like Ability (benefits from metamagic feats at no additional cost). (Cooldown 9 seconds, Cost 35 sp)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Angelic Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle While above 50% Health you have a +2 sacred bonus to Charisma, and all enemies have a -2 penalty to attack rolls. This penalty counts as a Fear effect and stacks with the Aura of Menace from the Angel of Vengeance enhancement. (Cooldown 10 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Astral Vibrance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle While you are above 50% health enemies below 50% health take 1d4 Light damage every 2 seconds, increasing by 1d4 every 2 seconds they remain in your aura (up to 20d4 per 2 seconds) and nearby allies below 50% health receive 1d4 Positive Energy healing every 2 seconds increasing by 1d4 every 2 seconds they remain in your aura (up to 20d4 per 2 seconds). Having this ability active costs 1 sp every 2 seconds, increasing by 1 every 2 seconds. (Cooldown 1 minute)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Transcendental Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus:+3 to the DC of all your spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Ascendance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Transformation Assume angelic form (type outsider good, angel). Any time you cast light damage spell, chance to gain temporary spell points. Any time you cast single target cure spells on a target, chance to give the target temporary HP. Any time you smite an enemy, chance to gain temporary HP. Your Angelic Presence and Astral Vibrance abilities do not have health requirements while in Angelic form. Astral Vibrance has no spell point drain while you are in Angelic form. Duration 2 minutes. Costs 50SP (Cooldown 5mins). Notes: When in angelic form, you have an undocumented +2 to Wisdom and Charisma.

Stance.Name: Angelic Form
Stance.Description: Any time you cast light damage spell, chance to gain temporary spell points. Any time you cast single target cure spells on a target, chance to give the target temporary HP. Any time you smite an enemy, chance to gain temporary HP.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Judge the many
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: Undead or evil outsiders judged gain "Guilt by association". When target with guilt dies, any undead or outsiders caught in the area have 50% chance to receive the effects of the Judgement epic ability (see above).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Rebuke foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Only usable when Endless Ardor stack >=5. Target enemy tales 5% additional damage from physical and light damage for 30 seconds. Can stack up to 5 times, new stacks add 30 seconds to remaining duration. Endless Ardor stacks reset to zero. (Cooldown 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Blood and Radiance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: Each time you cast a light based spell, you gain Endless Ardor: +1/+2/+3 sacred bonus to positive energy for 10 seconds. Each time you cast a positive energy spell, gain Righteous Fervor: +1/+2/+3 sacred bonus to light spellpower for 10 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times. Each stack add 10 seconds to remaining duration. Stacks decay at 1-2 decrements per second. Successive ranks in Blood and radiance increase both bonus to respective spell power, and increments in Endless Ardor or Righteous Fervor each time a qualifying spell is cast. Each tick of Divine Punishment, and of an Archon's light attack, count as a "spell" for this purpose.

Stance.Name: Blood and Radiance
Stance.Description: Each time you cast a light based spell, you gain Endless Ardor: +1/+2/+3 sacred bonus to positive energy for 10 seconds. Each time you cast a positive energy spell, gain Righteous Fervor: +1/+2/+3 sacred bonus to light spellpower for 10 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Excoriate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive Bonus: When your Righteous Fervor stack is >=5, your light spells and smites have a 3% chance to stun opponents for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Leap through air (like leap of faith). Recharges at a rate of 15 seconds in private areas and 3 seconds in public areas. If you already possess this ability, it now recharges at a rate of 1 every 12 seconds in private areas. (Cooldown 3 second, 10 sps)

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Casts Sun Bolt as a Spell-Like Ability (benefits from metamagic feats at no additional cost). Reflex save (DC 10 + character level + charisma or wisdom mod) for half damage. (Cooldown 12 seconds, 12sp)

DC.Name: Exalted Angel: Sun Bolt
DC.Description: Casts Sun Bolt as a Spell-Like Ability (benefits from metamagic feats at no additional cost). Reflex save for half damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Divine Wrath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Call down divine wrath on foes, dealing 2d6 light damage per character level, will save for half (DC 10 + character level + charisma or wisdom mod). Allies caught within blast are healed for 1d6 HP per character level. Counts as a Light spell for incrementing Endless Ardor. Target must be manually selected. (Cooldown 20 seconds, 40sp, standard Area of Effect)

DC.Name: Exalted Angel: Divine Wrath
DC.Description: Call down divine wrath on foes, dealing 2d6 light damage per character level, will save for half.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Reborn in Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each time you gain Endless Ardor or Righteous Fervor you gain a counter. When it reaches 25, ability becomes available. Epic Moment Transformation: You are healed to full health and activate Ascendance, Angelic Presence, and Astral Vibrance even if they are currently on cooldown. For 2 minutes (or until you leave Angelic form), you are immune to light damage, gain 50% Incorporeality, and gain +100 Light and Healing Power. This ability can be used while dead, bringing you back at full health and in addition to the above benefits, the cooldowns of Light and Positive Energy spells are reduced to 1/5th normal, all spells cost 50% spell points. All of your physical attacks gain On Hit 100 Light damage and On Critical destroy evil undead or evil outsiders under 1000 hit points. (Cooldown 10mins)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Exalted Angel: Ability VI
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Wisdom or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger's Repertoire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For every level of Fatesinger, gain 2 Songs, +10 Melee Power, +3 sonic resistance and 25 Spell Points. If you didn't have "Bardic Ballad" gain that feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Glitter of Fame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 to your effective Arcane caster level, +1 Charisma, +1 Constitution and a +1 to hit. Special Effect: As long as you are above 10% Health, you radiate confidence: gain a +1 to all other Ability scores, except Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Harmonic Resonance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your melee, missile, and unarmed attacks have a 10% chance per hit of building a stacking resonance in your enemies. Each stack increases the creature's vulnerability to Sonic damage by 10%. The effect may stack up to 5 times and lasts up to 20 seconds. You also gain +1 effective Arcane caster level. (Active) You may expend a Song to activate Harmonic Resonance. If you do so, your voice thrums with magic, and you no longer require material components to cast spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Intoxicating Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 to your effective Arcane caster level and a +1 to hit. Special Effect: As long as you are above 10% Health, enemies that strike you have a 5% chance of becoming Fascinated for 12 seconds, with no saving throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Grandeur
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 to your effective Arcane caster level. Special Effect: As long as you are above 10% Health, you project an Aura of Grandeur. This aura grants you a +1 to all saving throws, a +2 to all Charisma-based skills and a +3 Unique bonus to damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Majesty
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to your effective Arcane caster level and a +1 to hit. You also gain a +5 to all saving throws vs. Enchantments and a +10 to the Spell Power of your Sonic, Light and Positive spells. Special Effect: Enemies that strike you also have a 5% chance to become blinded by your glory for 12 seconds (in addition to other effects), with no saving throw.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: O Fortuna
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds to Inspire Courage: You and your party gain +[1/2/3] to saves vs. fear. In addition, you personally gain a +[1/2/3] to your Fortitude and Reflex saves (morale bonus, does not stack with Heroism)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Allure
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3/6/9 Universal Spell Power from Inspire Courage, +2/4/6 to Perform, Haggle, and Bluff. +1/2/3 Song(s)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Music of the Spider Queen
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds to your Fascinate: Your Fascinate gains the power to mesmerize Vermin. Mesmerized Vermin stop acting and behave like they have been fascinated. Unlike truly fascinated creatures, however, they are not susceptible to suggestion.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Dirge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Expend a song to produce a haunting funeral march. You deal 10d[4/6/8] Negative damage and 10d[8/10/12] Sonic damage every 3 seconds for 18 seconds (fort save for half). In addition, enemies may be slowed by 5% if they fail their fort save. Duration 18 seconds (modified by enhancements that increase song duration).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Lucidity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +0/0/1 Attack from Inspire Courage, +2/4/6 Concentration/Diplomacy, +1/2/3 UMD, +1 Song.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Masked Ball
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fascinate or Dirge grants you and your allies [+10/+20] to Jump and Tumble (enhancement bonus), [+0/+1] charisma, and the ability to run over slippery surfaces (duration: 4 minutes). In the confusion, you open up a brief window of opportunity, granting your party a +2 bonus to hit when Sneak Attacking, and an additional [+0/+1d6] Sneak Attack die (duration: 10 seconds).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Reign
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spontaneous Song (expends a song but instant activation): You gain a +[20/40/60] temporary Health. On a vorpal strike, you unleash a thunderclap for [7/9/11]d20 Sonic and [7/9/11]d20 Electrical damage. Procs on melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks. Duration: 5 Minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Aria
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: All your songs gain [30/60/90] Seconds to their duration. Active: Spontaneous Song (expends a song but instant activation): You generate [15%/25%/35%] less threat for spellcasting. In addition, you gain a [20/40/60] Spell Power bonus to your Sonic spells, and a [5/10/15] Spell Power bonus to your Force, Positive and Negative spells. Duration: 5 Minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Echoes of the Ancestors: Arcane
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stance: Grants you either Draconic Incarnation: Gain a +1 Charisma, a +1 Natural Armor and a +2 to your saves vs. Poison. You also gain an additional 9 Spell Power to Acid, Cold, Electric, and Fire spells. Finally, you gain a +20% bonus to the duration of your Songs. Magister: Gain a +1 Intelligence, a +1 to Use Magic Device, a +4 Concentration, a +2 Spell Penetration bonus to your spells, a +2 to the DC's of your offensive wands. Finally, you gain a 1 minute bonus to the duration of your Songs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Chord of Disruption
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When Siren's Song expires, Chord of Disruption focuses your energy to a single disruptive point causing [5d100+700 / 6d100+800 / 7d100+900] disintegrating sonic damage. If a Fortitude save is made effects are halved.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Echoes of the Ancestors: Martial
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stance, 1 song to activate: either Grandmaster of Flowers: Gain a +1 Wisdom, a +2 AC while Tumbling and a +1 to all saving throws. You gain a +2 to your Concentration, a +2 to Balance and a 2% Dodge bonus. Lastly, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +2 to saves vs. Fear. Legendary Dreadnought: Gain a +1 Strength, +10 to your maximum health, +1 to the DCs of all combat feats, +1 to Hit, 1 Extra Action boost per rest. In addition your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to Hit and +1 to Damage. Shadowdancer: Gain a +1 Dexterity, a +2 to saving throws vs. traps and a 1d6 Sneak Attack damage bonus. In addition, every time you are hit, you have a 5% chance of being affected by Lingering Shadows for 4 seconds. Lingering Shadows grants you displacement, a +4 to hit and +2 damage, and +15% attack speed, but is removed if you are damaged. Lastly, you gain a +20% to the duration of your Songs.

EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Wisdom, a +2 AC while Tumbling and a +1 to all saving throws. You gain a +2 to your Concentration, a +2 to Balance and a 2% Dodge bonus. Lastly, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +2 to saves vs. Fear.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fatesinger: Legendary Dreadnought
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Strength, +10 to your maximum health, +1 to the DCs of all combat feats, +1 to Hit, 1 Extra Action boost per rest. In addition your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to Hit and +1 to Damage.

EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Dexterity, a +2 to saving throws vs. traps and a 1d6 Sneak Attack damage bonus. Lingering Shadows grants you displacement, a +4 to hit and +2 damage, and +15% attack speed, but is removed if you are damaged. Lastly, you gain 1 minute to the duration of your Songs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Echoes of the Ancestors: Divine

Exalted Angel: Gain +1 Charisma, +3 Jump, a +4 to Fortitude saves vs. Disease, and +25 Spell Power when casting Positive Energy spells. Finally, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to hit and +1 save vs. fear. Unyielding Sentinel: Gain a +1 Charisma, a +1 to all saving throws, a 2/- DR bonus to blocking, and a +1 to hit. Your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 to hit and +1 to saves vs. Fear. If you possess an Aura of Good, that grants an additional +1 bonus to saves vs. Fear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Echoes of the Ancestors: Primal
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: (-1 song) (Passive, Cooldown 6 seconds) Stance, 1 song to activate: Either Fury of the Wild: Gain a +1 Constitution and +25 to your maximum Health and a +2 to all Fortitude saves. If you have Rage feat, your Rage grants you an additional +1 Strength while raging. You also have a +3% chance to trigger weapon effects on glancing blows. Finally, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 damage and +1 to your saves vs Fear. Primal Avatar: Gain a +1 Wisdom. Gain a +6 Spell Power to Fire, Cold, Electricity, Acid and Rust, as well as a +5 resistance to Fire, Cold and Electricity. Lastly, you gain a +20% to the duration of your Songs. Shiradi Champion: Gain a +1 Dexterity, +5 Spot, +2 Listen and 2 Diplomacy. Your attack speed with bows and thrown weapons is 10% faster. Finally, you gain a +20% bonus to the duration of your Songs.

If you have Rage feat, your Rage grants you an additional +1 Strength while raging. You also have a +3% chance to trigger weapon effects on glancing blows. Finally, your Inspire Courage grants an additional +1 damage and +1 to your saves vs Fear.

EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain a +1 Wisdom. Gain a +6 Spell Power to Fire, Cold, Electricity, Acid and Rust, as well as a +5 resistance to Fire, Cold and Electricity. Lastly, you gain a +1 minute to the duration of your Songs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: A single target must make a Will save with a DC modified by the caster's Charisma modifier. On a failed save, the target is bound briefly to the spot, and for one minute is also [6/10/12]% more vulnerable to magical damage, and has -[6/10/12] Spell Resistance. In addition, the creature deals -[4/6/8] damage on attacks. Duration 45 seconds. Instant cast.(Active Cooldown: 4mins)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Fragment of the Song: Clarity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: All of your Songs gain [30/60] seconds to their duration. (Competence) Rank 2: Your spells cost 5% less SP, +3 Concentration and +20 temporary SP. (Moral)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Masquerade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can switch your Twist of Fate at a Rest Shrine.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Fragment of the Song: Valor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Inspire Courage grants you and your party an additional [+1/+2] to damage. In addition, you gain the following personal bonuses: Rank 1: Inspire Courage increases your melee attack speed by +3% (competence bonus, stacks with Haste spell) and grants you +10 competence bonus to temporary HP. Removes combat penalties for moving. Rank 2: +1 to hit, +10 morale bonus to temporary HP, +2 to Intimidate (Morale bonus). Gives you a 2% chance to cause 5% electric/light/sonic vulnerability (stacks 3 times).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fatesinger: Turn of the Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spontaneous Song (expend a song to activate). Turn of the Tide grants a full BAB, +3 to hit, +40% damage, DR 15/-, a +4 Charisma, and deals +5d10 +75 Sonic damage and +5d10 +75 Light damage per hit. (This magical damage does not affect Bosses.) While under the effects of Turn of the Tide, rolling a 1 on a Will save is not an automatic failure. Duration: 45 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain all of the following: +6 Melee power per core +1 damage per level of Fury of the Wild including this one (up to +6 total at level 5). +1 Druid and Ranger caster level per level of Fury not including this one (up to +5 total at level 5). +2 Adrenaline uses. Active Portion: (Cooldown 5 second): Your next melee or ranged attack deals +300% damage, increases your critical threat range by 2 and you are considered raged until your next attack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Brawn I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Bonus: gain +50 maximum HP

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Adrenaline II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 Adrenaline uses per rest (3 total). Active Portion: (Cooldown: 5 seconds) By consuming 1 Adrenaline use, your next melee or ranged attack will deal +300% damage, increase your critical threat range by 4 and you are considered raged until your next attack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Brawn II

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Adrenaline Overload

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Tunnel Vision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While raged, melee attacks deal +1d[8/10/12] extra untyped damage. In addition, you gain +[1/2/3] intimidate and +[1/2/3] will saves. You also suffer a -5 Penalty to Armor Class and suffer a 10% penalty to fortification while raged.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Primal Scream
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Nearby allies are raged gaining +[3/4/5] morale bonus to Strength and Constitution, and suffer a -2 penalty to armor class. Nearby enemies take up to [10/20/30]d20 sonic damage. [3/4/5] uses per rest. Duration 3 minutes per use.

Stance.Name: Primal Scream
Stance.Description: You and nearby allies are raged gaining +[3/4/5] morale bonus to Strength and Constitution, and suffer a -2 penalty to armor class.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Fury of the Wild: Boulder Toss

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: The Abiding Path
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Immunity to slippery surfaces. Gain +1 to the DC of your tactical feats and +10 Melee power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Ubiquity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tumble allows you to pass through enemies. +10 Melee power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Balance in All Things
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Immunity to most knockdowns. +1 passive ki regeneration and +1 to the DC of your tactical feats. +10 Melee power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Lily Petal
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Project a bolt dealing 80-120 + 8-12 dmg per character level to one target. Cost 10 Ki.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Perfect Balance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Balance, Jump and Tumble and [1/2/3]% Dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Enlightenment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[15/30/45] Ki and +[2/4/6] Concentration. Gain +[0/0/1] passive ki regeneration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: A Dance of Flowers
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[0.5/1.0/1.5][W] to attacks you make while Centered. Note: Works with any weapon as long as you remain centered, e.g. bows with Zen Archery or T5 Kensei focus weapon. Works without monk levels, so long as you meet the requirements for being centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Running with Wind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Electricity resistance [4/8/12] +[10/20/30]% enhancement bonus to movement speed. If you have Monk levels and are in Wind stance, +[1/2/3]% chance to doublestrike.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Serenity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/9] stacking spell resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Hail of Blows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3% chance to doublestrike on melee attacks. Note: Does not require being centered or anything monk-related.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Orchid Blossom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Projects blast of ki, as with Lily Petal, but to multiple targets. 80-120 +8-12 dmg per character level to enemies in area. Reflex save for half (DC 10 + Character level + WIS mod). Cost 20 ki.

DC.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Orchid Blossom
DC.Description: Projects blast of ki, as with Lily Petal, but to multiple targets. 80-120 +8-12 dmg per character level to enemies in area.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Walking with Waves
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain cold resistance [4/8/12] and +[2/4/6] to AC. If you have Monk levels and are in Ocean stance, +[1/2/3]% chance to Dodge enemy attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Light as a Feather
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle. Immune to falling damage; gain Feather Fall.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Perfection of Body
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Fortitude save. Do not automatically fail a save on a 1 against [disease/poison/any Fortitude save].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Standing with Stone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Acid resistance [4/8/12], +[5/10/15] max HP. If you have Monk levels and are in Earth stance, +[5/10/15] PRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Piercing Clarity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks bypass [5/10]% of enemy fortification. Your attacks have Ghost Touch. On rank 2 your attacks bypass concealment as if you had True Seeing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Perfection of Mind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Will saves, additional +[2/4/6] saves versus enchantment, Fear and illusion. On Rank 3, you do not automatically fail a Will save on a 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Drifting Lotus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: 100-160 +10-14 dmg per character level area-of-effect ki blast centered around you. Reflex save (DC 10 + character level + WIS mod) for half damage. Enemies who fail save are knocked down. Cost 25ki.

DC.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Drfiting Lotus
DC.Description: 100-160 +10-14 dmg per character level area-of-effect ki blast centered around you. Reflex save for half damage. Enemies who fail save are knocked down.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Dancing with Flames
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain fire resistance [4/8/12]. Gain +[1/2/3] to attack and damage rolls. If you have Monk levels and are in Fire stance, add [0.3/0.6/1.0][W] to your weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Perfection of Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Reflex saves, and gain +[1/2/3] to Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle and Intimidate. At rank 3, do not automatically fail a Reflex save on a 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: A Scattering of Petals
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Nearby enemies must make a Fortitude save (DC 10 + character level + WIS mod) or become blinded. For the next 12 seconds, gain +25% Dodge. Cost 30 Ki. (Cooldown 1 min)

DC.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: A Scattering of Petals
DC.Description: Nearby enemies must make a Fortitude save or become blinded.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Everything is Nothing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: "Perfect Peace" counter increments each time you use Stunning Fist, Quivering Palm, Lily Petal, Orchid Blossom, Drifting Lotus or A Scattering of Petals. When Perfect Peace counter reaches 25, gain the ability to use Everything is Nothing. On activation, enemies in a large radius from you must make a Will saving throw (DC 10 + character level + WIS mod) or be erased from the multiverse. If they succeed at saving throw they could be paralyzed for 6 seconds (certain enemies are immune from this effect) and then take 1000 damage (Fortitude for half). Bosses take damage immediately.

DC.Name: Everything is Nothing (Erasure)
DC.Description: Everything is Nothing. On activation, enemies in a large radius from you must make a Will saving throw or be erased from the multiverse.

DC.Name: Everything is Nothing (Damage)
DC.Description: Everything is Nothing. On activation, enemies in a large radius from you must make a Will saving throw or be erased from the multiverse.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Shrug Off Punishment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Max Hitpoints and +3 Melee Power per level of Legendary Dreadnought.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Action Hero
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Reduces the cooldowns of your Action Boost abilities by 33%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Unstoppable
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to remove all Crowd Control effects currently restraining you. This ability can be used while helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Action Boost Unmovable
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +20 Action Boost bonus to to Fortitude and Balance saves for 60 seconds. This ability can be used while helpless. This is on a separate cooldown from other action boosts.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Action Boost Thick Skinned
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to take 25% less damage from all sources for 30 seconds. This ability can be used while helpless. This is on a separate cooldown from other action boosts.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Combat Brute
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1[W] damage with melee weapons and deal +50% damage to helpless opponents while any Action Boost is active.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Sundering Swing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For the next [9/12/15] seconds, all attacks you make apply an Improved Sunder effect on hit. (Cooldown 1 min)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Legendary Tactics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to DC's of all tactical feats.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Extra Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Action Boost per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Action Boost Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a [+15/+20/+25] Action Boost bonus to attack bonus for 20 seconds. (This enhancement cannot be taken if you have Action Boost Attack as a class enhancement, and it shares a cooldown with all other action boosts).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Momentum Swing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tactical Melee Attack Perform an attack with +5[W] damage and +[1/2/3] critical threat range. Cleave attacks have a [15/30/50]% chance to reset the cooldown of this ability (this cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds). You must have Power Attack active to perform this ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Improved Combat Expertise
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When Stance: Combat Expertise is active, you gain +20 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Improved Power Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When Stance: Power Attack is active, you deal +0.5[W] damage with weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[20/25/30]% Action Boost bonus to weapon damage for 20 seconds (This epic ability cannot be taken if you have Action Boost Damage as a class enhancement, and it shares a cooldown with all other action boosts).

On Hit Knocks the target down, Balance DC (10 + Character Level + Strength Modifier) Negates. Momentum Swing has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of this ability (this cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds). You must have Stance: Power Attack active to perform this ability.

DC.Description: Perform an Area of Effect attack with +5[W] damage and +1 critical damage multiplier. On Hit Knocks the target down, Balance DC Negates.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Volcano's Edge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack On Hit 100 Fire damage. On Critical Target takes Magma Surge damage. On Vorpal Target takes 10d100 Fire damage. Requires a Dagger, Kama, Sickle or Sword to be equipped in your main hand.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Lightning Mace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Attack On Hit 100 Electrical damage. On Critical Gain +15% enhancement bonus to melee doublestrike for 6 seconds. On Vorpal Target takes 10d100 Electrical damage. Requires a Club (weapon), Greatclub, Heavy Mace, Light Mace, Morningstar or Quarterstaff to be equipped in your main hand.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Anvil of Thunder
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Attack On Hit 100 Sonic damage. On Critical Target is stunned for 6 seconds. On Vorpal Target takes 10d100 Sonic damage. Requires a Dwarven Waraxe, Greataxe, Battleaxe, Handaxe, Warhammer, Maul, Light Pick or Heavy Pick to be equipped in your main hand.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Legendary Dreadnought: Master's Blitz Epic Moment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: For 15 seconds, you gain +7 Melee Power, +7 Ranged Power and select either +50% Dodge (dodge cap applies!) or +30 PRR. Any time you hit an opponent while under the effects of Master's Blitz, you have a chance to gain an additional stack of the melee/ranged damage bonus and restart the duration. When you first activate this ability, you start with three stacks of increased damage. The damage bonus stacks up to 10 times, and decrements by 1 every 15 seconds.

Stance.Name: Masters Blitz
Stance.Description: Activate: For 15 seconds, you gain +7 Melee Power, +7 Ranged Power and select either +50% Dodge (dodge cap applies!) or +30 PRR. Any time you hit an opponent while under the effects of Master's Blitz, you have a chance to gain an additional stack of the melee/ranged damage bonus and restart the duration.

Stacks with Devastating Critical and Overwhelming Critical.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Nullmagic Guard
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you take damage, there is a [2/4/6]% chance that a burst of antimagic energy expands from your body. Nearby enemies are subject to a Dispel Magic effect, which may strip them of their magical protections, and will render them unable to cast spells and lose [2/3/4] Spell Resistance for [10/20/30] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Call Kindred Being
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Summon an epic (CR20) creature to aid you. The creature type depends on school familiarity as follows: Abjuration summons an Animated Armor Conjuration summons a Golem Enchantment summons a Succubus Evocation summons a Living Meteor Swarm Illusion summons a Dream Reaver Necromancy summons a Lich Transmutation summons a Gargoyle. Note--the golem sometimes turns hostile and attacks the party. (Cooldown 60 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Arcane Tempest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: AoE that deals 2d6 force damage per caster level every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. Unlisted reflex save.(Cooldown 3mins, 30sp)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: 'Nullmagic Aura' Epic Moment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each time nullmagic guard or strike activates, you gain 1 charge. When have you 30 charges, can activate nullmagic aura. You and allies near you are immune to harmful spells for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Magister: Arcane Adept
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: All spells you cast receive an enhancement bonus of -10% to their spell point costs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Strength of Spirit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you hit with a melee attack, or cast a spell on an ally, or cast an offensive spell on an enemy, you gain 1 Spirit. Each of these three categories triggers only once every three seconds. You can have up to 30 Spirit. Spirit decays at a rate of one every 9 seconds. Toggle: You gain +30 Universal Spell Power. Costs 1 Spirit to activate and 1 Spirit every six seconds. Active (5 sec cooldown) +10 Melee power per core

Stance.Name: Strength of Spirit
Stance.Description: Toggle: You gain +30 Universal Spell Power. Costs 1 Spirit to activate and 1 Spirit every six seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Magic of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +50 SP per level of Primal Avatar. You gain caster levels equal to your Primal Avatar level for Druid and Ranger spells, if you have any levels in those classes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Primal Travel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You quickly jump backwards several times. For the next 12 seconds you gain +10 primal bonus to tumble and 50% primal bonus to dodge (ignoring your maximum dodge). Costs 1 Spirit. Active (1 min cooldown)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Mighty Among Spirits
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +20 HP. Spirit decays every 15 seconds instead of every 9 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Eternal Return
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: While below 50% health, you gain 12 health and lose one spirit and 4 SP every two seconds. Costs 1 Spirit to activate. Active Ability: (5 sec cooldown)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Walk with the Spirits
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You become 25% incorporeal, invisible and ethereal to monsters, and gain +30 Hide and Move Silently. This consumes 1 Spirit each second. Active (5 sec cooldown) (100 SP, 1 Spirit to activate)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Ephemeral Evolution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you take physical damage, you gain +1 Physical Resistance for 3 seconds. This stacks up to [5/10/15] times, up to once per second. Stacks fade away 1 at a time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Rejuvenation Cocoon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Protect target ally with a shield of [90/120/150] temporary HP for 9 seconds. Heals 5d6 HP every 2 seconds while the shield persists. Costs 12sp to activate. 12 second cooldown. Affected by: Empower Heal, Quicken and Enlarge

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Insidious Spores
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Target enemy becomes contaminated with spores for 18 seconds. Every 2 seconds the target takes [6d6] Poison and Rust damage. Stacks up to [2/3/4] times. Enemies damaged by Insidious Spores become Contagious for five minutes after, spreading Insidious Spores to some nearby enemies when they die. Costs 30sp to activate. 12 second cooldown. Affected by: Empower, Maximize, Quicken and Enlarge

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Friends of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You call forth a small nature animal, providing a bonus to nearby allies. Duration: 3 minutes. Cooldown: 3 minutes. Bat: +10 Sonic Spell Power, +5 Sonic Resistance, +3 Listen Bird: +1 Dodge, +3 Spot Fox: +1 sneak attack damage, +3 Move Silently Frog: +2 PRR, +3 Jump Squirrel: +2 attack while flanking, +3 Hide

EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Seeking Balance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] Reflex Saving Throws, +[2/4/6] Tumble and +[2/4/6] Balance while shapeshifted into an animal form, wielding two weapons, or unarmed. These are Primal bonuses. Skill bonuses required already having at least one rank in the skill.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Supple as Spring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Nearby allies gain +[1/2/3]% Primal Bonus to Dodge if they have been damaged in combat in the past six seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Favored Enemy: Aberrations / Constructs / Undead
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Some things should not be. Gain the feat Favored Enemy Aberrations, Constructs, or Undead, dealing +2 damage to that race per Favored Enemy feat you have. This also increases the damage dealt against any of your other Favored Enemies by 2. (You cannot pick a Favored Enemy you already have.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Aberration
EnhancementSelection.Description: You do 2 extra points of damage against aberrations

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Construct
EnhancementSelection.Description: You do 2 extra points of damage against constructs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Undead
EnhancementSelection.Description: You do 2 extra points of damage against undead

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Natural Shielding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your summoned and charmed pets, hirelings, and monsters gain +[30/60/100] maximum HP and +[10/20/30] PRR. Rank 3: Natural Creatures also gain evasion: When they make a successful Reflex save to avoid damage, they suffer no damage instead of half damage. (Natural Creatures include: Animals, Elementals, Magical Beasts, Plants, and Vermin)

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Balanced Attacks
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[2/4/6] Primal bonus to Attack as long as you are shapeshifted into an animal form, wielding two weapons, or unarmed. Rank 3: Knock down enemies for 2 seconds on vorpal hit. Enemies knocked down by this effect are helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Summer Smoke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Nearby allies have a small chance to deal [5/10/15]d20 extra fire damage with their attacks. Active Ability: (5 sec cooldown)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Tsunami
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Sends forth a wave of water, knocking enemies down and dealing 30 cold damage plus 1d10 per character level and 30 bludgeoning damage plus 1d10 per character level. The cold damage and knockdown are negated on a successful Fortitude save vs. 10 + Wisdom modifier + Character level. Some monsters can resist Tsunami completely, such as Water Elementals and Oozes. Costs 50sp to activate. 7 second cooldown. Affected by: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Heighten and Enlarge

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: The Oncoming Storm
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Attacks by your summoned and charmed pets, hirelings, and monsters gain a 1% chance to knockdown enemies. Rank 2: Attacks by your summoned and charmed pets, hirelings, and monsters gain a 1% chance to deal 20d20 sonic damage. Rank 3: Attacks by your summoned and charmed pets, hirelings, and monsters gain a 1% chance to deal 20d20 lightning damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Autumn Harvest
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You and nearby allies have a 5% chance to heal [10/15/20]d10 when nearby enemies die. Not affected by spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Stormrage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies damaged by your attacks or spells are also struck by lightning, dealing 10d20 electric damage, halved on a reflex save vs. DC 50. Lightning strikes up to one enemy each second. You also gain featherfall and Deflect Arrows. Lasts 18 seconds. Active (50SP to activate) (12 sec cooldown) (SR: No) (Quicken)

DC.Name: Primal Avatar: Stormrage
DC.Description: Enemies damaged by your attacks or spells are also struck by lightning, dealing 10d20 electric damage, halved on a reflex save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Summon Dryad Elder
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Summon a Dryad Elder. She uses her magic for damage spells as well as support and healing (Regenerate on self, Deathward on group, Mass Cure Critical Wounds on others - heals enemies as well). Costs 50sp to activate. 30 second cooldown. Affected by: Quicken
