EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Chill of Winter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Enemies that damage your nearby allies have a 20% chance to become chilled, receiving 1d20 cold and 1d20 rust damage every two seconds and slowing their attack and movement speed by [5/15/25]% for 20 seconds. This damage can stack up to 10 times. 5 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Spirit Boon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Temporarily gain +2 Primal bonus to all physical abilities (Str, Dex, Con) or mental abilities (Int, Wis, Cha). Consumes 1 Spirit to activate and 1 every 6 seconds. Stays toggled indefinitely unless turned off.

Stance.Name: Spirit Boon
Stance.Description: Temporarily gain +2 Primal bonus to all physical abilities (Str, Dex, Con) or mental abilities (Int, Wis, Cha). Consumes 1 Spirit to activate and 1 every 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Nature's Fury / Natural Evasion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 critical damage multiplier on a roll of 19-20, or Evasion, while in animal form, unarmed, or two-weapon fighting.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Natures Fury
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain +1 critical damage multiplier on a roll of 19-20

EnhancementSelection.Name: Natural Evasion
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain Evasion while in animal form, unarmed, or two-weapon fighting.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Avatar of Nature Epic Moment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You become an Avatar of Nature (Wood woad) Every 3 seconds, you gain +1 size, +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, a large bonus to damage based on size, and lose some movement speed, stacking up to size 4. Size 1+: +50 size bonus to PRR (Damage dice: 18.5[1d20]) Size 2+: When you attack enemies they become poisoned, taking 2d10 poison damage every 2 seconds for several seconds. This poison stacks up to 5 times. (Damage dice: 36.0[1d20]) Size 3+: Enemies attacking you have a chance to become diseased, dealing 1d4 Constitution damage every two seconds for 10 seconds. (Damage dice:53.5[1d20]) Size 4: The ground shakes when you put your foot down. Your third attack while standing still knocks down nearby enemies and deals extra bludgeoning damage in an area. (Damage dice:71.0[1d20]) Fighting in this form counts as Unarmed combat, uses Two Weapon Fighting feats and has a base critical profile of 20 x2, regardless of weapon(s) wielded. This costs 1 Spirit every few seconds per size you've gained (Turns off if you run out of Spirit.) Costs 35sp to activate, 5 second cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 Sneak Attack die and +10 Melee and +4 Ranged Power for each level of Shadowdancer.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: For 30 seconds, while sneaking you gain: Full movement speed, +5 Attack bonus to-hit with Sneak Attacks, +2 Sneak Attack dice, +3 Hide, +3 Move Silently.

Stance.Name: Shadow Training II
Stance.Description: For 30 seconds, while sneaking you gain: Full movement speed, +5 Attack bonus to-hit with Sneak Attacks, +2 Sneak Attack dice, +3 Hide, +3 Move Silently.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to use Shadow Walk up to 5 times per rest. Also, while using weapons that qualify for Weapon Finesse, you gain 3% profane bonus to your chance to doublestrike. This doublestrike bonus applies to attacks made by a dagger, handaxe, kama, kukri, light hammer, light mace, light pick, rapier, shortsword, sickle, when unarmed or in druid animal form. Active Ability: (Cooldown: 1 minute) a

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Training V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to use Dimension Door 5 times per rest. The cooldown for Shadow Training II ability is reduced to 3 minutes. Active Ability: (Cooldown: 1 minute)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You now have Evasion. In addition, when you roll a natural 20 on a melee or ranged attack, you envelop the target in shadow, granting it 5% vulnerability to physical damage and removing its immunity to sneak attack for a short duration, if applicable.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Hide and Move Silently skills. +[2/4/6] to Assassinate DC (if you have Assassinate). Hide in Plain Sight at rank 3.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Lance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: Throws 3 spears, each dealing [6/8/10]d3 + [18/24/30] unholy damage and has a chance to blind target (Fort DC [14/16/18] + Half character level + Intelligence modifier) if you have Dark Shrouding charges. (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

DC.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Lance
DC.Description: Active Ability: Throws 3 spears, each dealing [6/8/10]d3 + [18/24/30] unholy damage and has a chance to blind target.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Acrobatic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Balance, Jump and Tumble and a +[3/6/9] bonus to reflex while tumbling.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Technician
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Search, Spot, Disable Device, Open Lock and flanking bonus to attack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spend a Shadow Charge to cloak in darkness, granting immunity to light and negative damage for 5 minutes, or until 120 damage have been absorbed. You can retain +1 maximum Shadow Charges.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shrouding Strike/Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee or Ranged Attack: Perform an attack with +[1/2/3][W] damage. On hit: Mark target. It if dies within the next [6/8/10] seconds, gain a Shadow Charge. You can retain a maximum of [2/4/6] Shadow Charges.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shrouding Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Perform a melee attack with +[1/2/3][W] damage. On hit: Mark target. It if dies within the next [6/8/10] seconds, gain a Shadow Charge. You can retain a maximum of [2/4/6] Shadow Charges.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Improved Invisibility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Invisible for [10/20/30] seconds. Attacking does not break this effect. After it wears off, you retain partial concealment (displacement) for [30/60/90] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Pierce the Gloom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: You are accustomed to seeing clearly even in the darkest conditions. Activate this ability to clear any Blindness effect on yourself. For 30 seconds afterwards you always hit except when you roll a 1 on your attack roll. (Cooldown: 2 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: Spend a Shadow Charge to dominate the target for 1 minute (DC 14 + character level + INT modifier), after which it is subject to instant death if it fails a fortitude save (DC 14 + character level + INT modifier). You can retain +1 maximum Shadow Charges. This effect appears to work only on humanoids, living constructs and some aberrations. (Cooldown: 2 minutes)

DC.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Manipulation
DC.Description: Active Ability: Spend a Shadow Charge to dominate the target for 1 minute, after which it is subject to instant death if it fails a fortitude save.

On hit: You have a 35% chance to kill a living target instantly if the target fails a Fortitude save (DC 7 + Character level + DEX modifier + Number of Shadow Charges). Even on successful save target takes an additional [50/75/100] damage from this attack.

DC.Name: Shadowdancer: Executioner's Strike/Shot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Consume
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: Spend a Shadow Charge to create a field around you for 10 seconds. Every 2 seconds the aura causes one nearby corporeal enemy to be devoured by its own shadow and die (save negates), or take 80-120 damage. You are free to perform other action while the aura is active. You can retain +1 maximum Shadow Charges. (Cooldown: 2 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: Spend a shadow charge to gain 25% incorporeal miss chance (and ignore incorporeal miss chance of targets), float as if affected by Feather Fall, have bonuses to Hide and Move Silently and deal strength damage on all melee and ranged attacks. You also take double damage from light effects. You can retain +1 maximum Shadow Charges. This is a toggled ability that persists until toggled off or leaving a quest. (Cooldown: 1 minute)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: 'Dark Imbuement' Epic Moment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: Each time an enemy affected by your Dark Shrouding mark dies, you additionally gain 1 Dark Imbuement charge. When you have accumulated 20 of these charges, you can expend them to enchant your melee and ranged attacks with shadowy energy. For 30 seconds, you deal an extra 2d6 unholy damage with every strike, the effective range of your melee attacks increases dramatically, and your ranged attacks have a 30% chance to explode, dealing 10d6 unholy damage to all enemies in a large radius around your target. (Cooldown: 5 minutes)

You gain Druid and Ranger caster levels equal to your Shiradi Champion level if you have any levels in those classes. Each time you Vorpal with ranged and thrown attacks you gain Favor of the Fey. You gain Favor of the Fey 7% of the time you cast offensive spells. Favor of the Fey: +1 Luck bonus to Ranged Attacks and +1 Diplomacy. This stacks up to 10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Visions

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Favorable Winds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Sixth Sense

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Favorable Wind

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Healing Spring

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Illusion of Well Being
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Healing spring additionally grants [10/15/20] temporary hitpoints when it heals for at least one HP. Grants one additional use of healing spring per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged or Thrown Attack: Deals [+2/+3][W]. If enemy is not moving, enemy is pinned in place for [9/18] seconds. Enemy is slowed if moving. Note: No saving throw observed for either effect. When pinned the enemy is also helpless. (Cooldown: [20/15] seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Spring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Healing spring additionally grants DR[2/4/6]/Cold Iron and stacking [2/4/6] Spell Power to nearby allies. Grants one additional use of healing spring per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Audience with the Queen
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: Pop off for some tea with your lady, the Queen of Summer, returning a few seconds later. Unusable while incapacitated. Depending on your Diplomacy with the Queen, you may experience effects either favorable or ill, though the tea is always delicious. (Diplomacy check) Diplomacy DC: 20 - Success, 40 - Critical Success. (Cooldown: 2 minutes 34 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Rain of Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active Ability: Call upon a thousand invisible fairies to rain pointy wooden death around you! Every second for thirty seconds each enemy around you has 10% to take 10d100 damage. Damage may consist of up to 10 damage types. Cost: 10 Favor of the Fey. (Cooldown: 5 minutes)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyielding Sentinel: Vigor of Battle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive bonuses: You gain 40 spell points, and each level of Unyielding Sentinel grants +5 Melee Power, +40 Spell points, and +1 Cleric, Favored Soul, and Paladin caster levels if you have any levels in those classes. +50 HP. You gain +1 intimidate for each level of Unyielding Sentinel, including level 0. Sentinel Stance: (Cooldown 20 seconds) Activate to enjoy the Vigor of Battle. +20 Positive Healing Amplification +50 HP Enemies you hit gain Healing Touch for 3 seconds, which grants 10 temporary HP to targets they attack. (You can only be in one Sentinel Stance at a time.)

Stance.Name: Vigor of Battle
Stance.Description: Sentinel Stance: (Cooldown 20 seconds) Activate to enjoy the Vigor of Battle. +20 Positive Healing Amplification, +50 HP. Enemies you hit gain Healing Touch for 3 seconds, which grants 10 temporary HP to targets they attack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyielding Sentinel: Unbreakable

Stance.Name: Unbreakable

Stance.Name: Stand Against the Tide

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Unyielding Sentinel: Divine Energy Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: This SLA grants 35 resistance to acid, cold, fire, sonic, electric for 1 min per character level [225/150/75] sp to all allies in the standard area of effect; centered on the caster. You can apply metamagic feats to this SLA for free (extend, quicken). The effect does not stack with Resist Energy spell.
